He could easily recognize what he was wearing as clothes that resembled one of his Elemental Heroes, his Burstinatrix card. He also couldn't see that there was red painted markings around his eyes.

"Well, this is amusing." Yubel commented with a smirk.

He then heard a surprised gasp, and turned to see Alexis. He also, saw that like him, her clothes had changed as well. She wore a green suit that looked like a costume that also had a pair of wings on its back. He recognized it as resembling another of his Hero cards, his Avian On her head was a sort of green hat. She then turned to Jaden, both of them shocked by what had happened. "Jaden, why are we dressed like your Heroes?"

"You've got me." he said. "But I bet it was that card."
12132222211212.title: Jaden as Burstinatrix and Alexis as Avian

121322222112122.content:
"Well, lets get out of these I don't want anyone to see me like this." Jaden said. He then tugged at his new clothes and discovered something that was cause for alarm. The bodysuit wouldn't come off! It was like they were attached to his body through some kind of magical force or something! He then tried to take off the helmet, but even that was attatched to him somehow. "Alexis, these clothes won't come off of me!" he said, starting to panic a bit.

"What?" she asked, a hint of worry could be heard in her voice. Afraid of what this mean for her, she attempted to remove her own new costume. And just like with Jaden's, hers wouldn't come off either. "Mine won't come off either!"

"Well, this sure went from being entertaining to a problem." Yubel commented.

And though try as they both might, the clothes they now wore just wouldn't come off. They also seemed practically indestructible, as they wouldn't tear off as they even tried to rip them to get them off, and clung to their skin.

"That card must have done this." Jaden said. "But what could have happened to it? Where did it go?" he said as he realized he didn't have it anymore.

"You don't think it just disappeared and is gone for good now, do you Jaden?"

"I sure hope not. I don't want to be stuck in this..."

12132222211212211.content:
As the two were starting to worry about their situation, Yubel noticed something about Alexis's costume: The wings seemed to move slightly.

"Jaden. Look at Alexis's wings." she said.

"Huh?" Jaden questioned, not getting what she meant, then noticed just what the duel spirit meant. "Uh, Alexis. I think you can move those wings." Jaden said.

"What?" she questioned, not sure whether he was serious, but as she put a bit of effort into it, she watched as the wings spread wide. "Woah..." she let out in surprise.

"So are they real?" Jaden asked.

"I'm not completely sure." Alexis responded as she moved one to feel it with her hands. "It feels like a costume, and I can't actually feel it. But I can move them somehow as if they were my own limbs." She then had one thought, and just had to see how much these wings actually worked. With a few quick flaps, she found herself rising into the air, and began to float there.

"Woah, Alexis! Your're flying!" Jaden marveled in surprise, his annoyance at his attire temporarily forgotten.

"I know!" she replied, just as amazed. She didn't actually need her wings to move to be able to fly it appeared, as she wasn't flapping them, but wasn't losing any of her height. She flapped them a bit, when suddenly, feathers shot out from them, and shot downward at Jaden. They also appeared to be razor sharp at the ends. "Jaden, look out!" she warned.

"Ah!" he yelled out in surprised as he raised his hands to protect himself. As he did, fire suddenly blazed up in his hands, and a fireball shot aout and burned the the feathers away before they could hit them. The fireball kept shooting up, and would have hit Alexis if she didn't quickly descend to avoid it.

"Jaden, I'm really sorry about that!" she appoliged.

"Me too, about almost hitting you with that fireball." he replied. The two then looked over themselves. "I'm not sure how, but it looks like somehow, along with these costumes, we somehow got Avian and Burstinatrix's powers." he said, making a small flame appear in his hands for a moment. "If I wasn't Burstinatrix, I might think that this was kinda cool."
12132222211212211.title: They gain the powers and abilities of Avian and...

choices: Meanwhile, the card is found by someone else
121322222112122111.content:
As Jaden and Alexis were discovering their new powers, unbeknown to them, the card that had done this to them had teleported to another part of the island, and would cause others to undergo similar changes. Their clothes would turn into those of another of the Elemental Heroes, and they would gain the powers of the one they were dressed as.

And the ones who would find it were a certain pair of boys and a girl, who had been on their way to meet up with Jaden. Syrus, Hassleberry, and Blair were currently walking together on their way towards the Academy building from the red dorm. Jaden had left early, leaving them behind. On their way there, it was then that Blair noticed something on the ground in thir path. Walking over to it, she saw the blank card lying on the ground.

"Hey guys, check this out." she said as she picked it up and showed it to them.

"Whats with the weird blank card?" Hassleberry questioned.

"What was it just doing on the ground like that?" Syrus wondered.

As the three stared at it, the card suddenly began to glow brightly, and the three were engulfed in a blinding light. After a moment, the light then began to die down, and their vision cleared, and like with the previous victims, the card had disappeared. It didn't take them long to notice their attire had changed. No longer wearing their uniforms, like Jaden and Alexis before them, their clothing had changed into those of Elemental Heroes. Hassleberry now wore large, bulky armor made of rock, and was wearing the ostume of Clayman(http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...). Syrus on the other hand, was in a dark blue suit with light blue armor that included a helmet, a white cape, and and two water tanks on his back with a pump connected to a water hose-like attatchment on his right arm, meaning he was now in the costume of Bubbleman(http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...). As for Blair, she had on a black skintight leotard and armor as wel as a helmet that framed her face and let her hair flow and a white cape going down over her rea, which was the costume of the Elemental Hero known as Shadow Mist(http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...).

"What the!?" Syrus let out in shock at what had just happened.

"What just happened!?" Blair demanded to no one in particular.

"Thats what I want to know!" Hassleberry declared. "What the heck happened to our clothes!?"
121322222112122111.title: Meanwhile, the card has teleported elsewhere, a...

choices: Meanwhile, the card is found by someone else
They find Jaden, Alexis, and the others
1213222221121221111.content:
As the trio took in their changes, the card wasn't done just yet, and its next victims were about to find it.

Making his way to the Academy building, Chazz was alone for now, enjoying one of his rare moments of silence from his Ojama partners. As he made his way there, he spotted a familiar figure, Bastion Misawa, looking down at something on the ground. With him was also Jesse Anderson from North Academy, still on the island after returning from the

"You're sure?" he heard Bastion ask Jesse.

"Of course I'm sure." Jesse replied.

"Saw what?" Chazz asked as he approached the two.

"Oh, hello Chazz." Bastion greeted him. "This card here." Bastion said, pointing to one that was at his and Jesse's feet.

"Its blank? Man, what a waster. Its useless, then." Chazz said.

"Perhaps. But according to Jesse, it just appeared out of thin air a moment ago." Bastion explained.

"What?" Chazz asked. A normal person might not believe such a story, but in his time at Duel Academy, he had seen much stranger things.

"You heard him." Jesse said. "Saw it with my own eyes."

"You sure?"

"Already said I was."

Chazz then kneeled down to pick up the card. "Be careful, Chazz." Bastion warned. "You don't know what it might do."

"Yea, yeah." Chazz said, not really paying attention to his warning. As he did, he held it up for the others to see, when the card suddenly began to glow brightly, and the three were engulfed in a blinding light. After a moment, the light then began to die down, and their vision cleared, and like with the previous victims, the card had disappeared. It didn't take them long to notice their attire had changed. No longer wearing their uniforms, like Jaden and Alexis, and the others, before them, their clothing had changed into those of Elemental Heroes. Jesse was now wearing the blue and yellow armor of Sparkman(http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...), though the helmet didn't cover his lower head and face and his hair stuck out a bit at the bottom of it. Bastion was now wearing golden armor with a helmet that had a pair of horns, and a red cape, which was the costume of Captain Gold(http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...). And as for Chazz, he now wore the red, white, and yellow attire of the Elemental Hero known simply as Heat(http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...), minus its mask.

"What just happened!?" Chazz demanded in shock.

"I've no idea!" Bastion answered.

"Well, he did warn you about touching it." Jesse responded.

As they did, Mindy then noticed something on the ground. "Hey, Jazz, look." she said.

"What a weird card." Jasmine said. "Its blank."

"I know." Mindy said, picking it up to get a better look at it.

The girls looked it over, when the card suddenly began to glow brightly, and the two were engulfed in a blinding light. After a moment, the light then began to die down, and their vision cleared, and like with the previous victims, the card had disappeared. It didn't take them long to notice their attire had changed. No longer wearing their uniforms, like those before them, they were now dressed in the attire of Elemental Heroes. Jasmine now wore the costume of the the E Hero, Lady Heat(http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...), while Mindy was now wearing the costume of Poison Rose(http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...).

"Eep! What just happened!?" Mindy let out with a shriek.

choices: They are all suddenly teleported somewhere else, and become superheroes
They decide to try and find the card
121322222112122111111.content:
As the three groups all took in their sudden changes, they suddenly saw a fireball shoot up into the air.

"What was that?"

"I don't know."

"Maybe we should check it out?"

Was the conversation that played out among the three groups, as they all unknowingly headed for the same location, where Jaden and Alexis were just realizing that they now had powers. With them, they were trying to figure out what to do now. They were stuck in these new costumes, unable to take them off, and had somehow aquired the powers of the Elemental Hero monsters they were dressed as.

"So, now what should we do?" Alexis asked.

"I don't know." Jaden replied. But before they could talk further, they heared noises that sounded like people coming from three different directions. Before they could decided whether to hide or not, everyone seemed to arrive at the same time. As everyone had gathered into the area, they were all suprised to see others dressed as E Heroes besides themselves.

They all looked from one another, taking in the sight. "Let me guess, you all found a weird blank card as well?" Alexis asked, and one by one, everyone nodded. It was also now that everyone else began to take notice of what she and Jaden were wearing, and Chazz couldn't help but snicker at his predicament.

"Wait, so I'm the only guy who wound up as one of the girls?" Jaden asked as he looked over everyone. "Now thats just not fair."

"I have to agree, but for the reverse" Alexis said.

"Anyway, perhaps we should all aquire a change of clothes." Bastion suggested.

"Don't even bother." Alexis said. "We already tried taking ours off. They're stuck on there now."

At this, everyone other than Jaden and her immediately tried to remove their new costumes, but to no avail. They were all now stuck on them, just as with Jaden and Alexis, and with this discovery, some bagen to panic.

"They really won't come off!" Mindy stated, trying to rip off the leaf-like clothing on her.

"Oh man, what are we gonna do!?" Syrus let out.

"Just calm down, eveybody." Alexis said, but everyone was still panicking as they tried to remove their clothes, and ignored here. With a sigh, she intended to get there attention, and with a flap of here wings, an strong gust of wind knoced almost everyone off of their feet. "Now, everyone calm down." she said sternly.

"Alexis, how did you do that?" Jasmine asked her.

"Well, when our clothes changed, it turned out we also gained the powers of the Hero we were dressed as." she explained.

As a demonstration, Jaden formed a fireball in his hand. "See?"

"Woah, thats pretty cool!" Jesse said. And with that, a few of them tried their own powers out, such as Jasime forming her own fireball, Syrus shooting a quick blast of water from his hose and controling its path, and Jesse shooting a quick electrical bolt from his hands.

"Okay, mayve this isn't so bad." Chazz said. "At least I'm not dressed like a girl one like Jaden."

"Thanks for rubbing it in, Chazz." Jaden grumbled.

The two are part of a team with other the Elemental Heroes
12132222211212221.content:
As the two of them stood there, wondering what they were going to do about their current situation, there was suddenly another bright flash of light. This time, the two also lost consciousness this time...

-------------------------------

When Jaden awoke, he stood up, and noticed with a frown that he was still dressed like his Burstinatrix. He also noticed Alexis lying nearby, still dressed as his Avian as well. He then got up, and looked around, and instantly noticed his location had changed. He was no longer near the Acadmey! In fact, they definitely on the island. They now appeared to be in some sort of a forest, with trees taller than any he had ever seen before.

"Good, you're awake." he heard a voice nearby, and saw Yubel.

"Yeah. Where are we, anyway?" he wondered out loud.

"I don't know, but we should probably wake up Alexis." Yubel said.

"Yeah."Jaden agreed. He then walked over to Alexis, and gently shook her to waker her up.

"Jaden? What happened? Where are we?" she asked him. She then noticed Yubel, and was surprised to see her, having not seen the duel spirit since the events of the other world.

Jaden then noticed her staring at Yubel, despite being in her usual intangible form. "Alexis, can you see Yubel?" he asked.

"I guess." she replied. "Its kinda hazy, but yeah. But forget that for now. Where are we?" she repeated.

"I don't know. Lets have a look around." he said, and the three followed a path that was before them, with Yubel floating behind the two humans dressed as Duel Monsters, and lucky enough, led them outside the forest. Once they exited it, they saw what they could only describe as a strange sight. There were many fantastic, and familiar creatures. They all recognized them as ones from various cards they had seen. They saw a huge city in the distance.

"Alexis, I think we may be in some kind of Duel Monster's world." he said.

"Again? But how?" she asked with worry. There last two times in a duel monsters world hadn't gone too well for any of them.

"I don't know." Yubel replied. "But for now, maybe we should head for that city."

"Okay." they both agreed. "At least this place seems brighter and livelier than the last two." Alexis said.

"Hey, is it just me, or does that city look like my Skyscraper and Skyscraper 2 cards?" he said, recognizing the similarities.

"I think it might." Alexis agreed.

As they made their way there, they noticed several of the creatures observing them. As they continued, they eventually reached the city gates, and the monster guarding it, looked them over. "Oh, Avian, Burstinatrix! Welcome back!" it greeted them excitedly. It also didn't seem like it could see Yubel.

As the three walked into the city, Alexis and Jaden exchanged glances. "Did he just call us by the monsters we're dressed as?" Alexis asked.

"I... think so?" Jaden asked, unsure of what else to say. He was just as surprised. He may have been wearing her clothes, but he looked nothing like the Elemental Hero monster hewas dressed as. What he and Alexis didn't know, as well as Yubel was that along with bringing them to this world, the card made it so that the two were now viewed as what they were dressed as, effectively taking the place of Avian and Burstinatrix. And unsurprisingly, both of the monsters were also big time superheroes in the city, meaning that now, Jaden and Alexis were.

121322222121221.title: What happens next

1213222221212212.content:
As the two stood there, worried about their current situation, they suddenly felt disoriented and light headed, though it quickly passed.

Blinking a bit as the feeling went away, the expression on Jaden's face had changed. Moments ago, it had been one of embarrassment. But now, it was much more cheerful. His posture had also changed, and seemed a bit more feminine. Alexis's expression had also changed, and had become more passive, and she crossed her arms on her chest.

Jaden looked around with curiosity. "Where are we?" he asked with interest as he turned to Alexis.

"I don't know." Alexis replied with a shrug.

"Can we explore, teacher?" Jaden asked hopefully.

"I suppose we can." Alexis replied.

"Thank you!" he said as the two began to walk around.

The reason for their new, odd behavior was the card. It hadn't just changed their clothes, but their minds as well. The two of them now believed that they were what they were dressed as. Jaden believed that he was a Dark Magician Girl, and Alexis believed that she was a Dark Magician.

121322222121222.title: What happens next

choices: The villager's treat Alexis as the teacher of magic school there
A few male monsters attempt to flirt with Jaden
1213222221212221.content:
As the two of them stood there, wondering what they were going to do about their current situation, there was suddenly another bright flash of light. This time, the two also lost consciousness this time...

-------------------------------

When Jaden awoke, he stood up, and noticed with a frown that he was still dressed like the Dark Magician Girl. He also noticed Alexis lying nearby, still dressed as the Dark Magician as well. He then got up, and looked around, and instantly noticed his location had changed. He was no longer on the Academy's island! They now appeared to be in some sort of a forest, with trees taller than any he had ever seen before.

"Good, you're awake." he heard a voice nearby, and saw Yubel.

"Yeah. Where are we, anyway?" he wondered out loud.

"I don't know, but we should probably wake up Alexis." Yubel said.

"Yeah."Jaden agreed. He then walked over to Alexis, and gently shook her to waker her up.

"Jaden? What happened? Where are we?" she asked him. She then noticed Yubel, and was surprised to see her, having not seen the duel spirit since the events of the other world.

Jaden then noticed her staring at Yubel, despite being in her usual intangible form. "Alexis, can you see Yubel?" he asked.

"I guess." she replied. "Its kinda hazy, but yeah. But forget that for now. Where are we?" she repeated.

"I don't know. Lets have a look around." he said, and the three followed a path that was before them, with Yubel floating behind the two humans dressed as Duel Monsters, and lucky enough, led them outside the forest. Once they exited it, they saw what they could only describe as a strange sight. There were many fantastic, and familiar creatures. They all recognized them as ones from various cards they had seen. They saw a village in the distance.

"Alexis, I think we may be in some kind of Duel Monster's world." he said.

"Again? But how?" she asked with worry. There last two times in a duel monsters world hadn't gone too well for any of them.

"I don't know." Yubel replied. "But for now, maybe we should head for that village."

"Okay." they both agreed. "At least this place seems brighter and livelier than the last two." Alexis said.

As they made their way there, they noticed several of the creatures observing them. As they continued, a small group of fairies suddenly flew right by Jaden, and waved at him, and they heard a few of them say "Hello Dark Magician Girl!" and the fairies flew on.

"...did they just call you "Dark Magician Girl?"" Alexis asked.

"I... think so?" Jaden asked, unsure of what else to say. He was just as surprised. He may have been wearing her clothes, but he looked nothing like the spellcaster. What he and Alexis and Yubel didn't know was that along with bringing them to this world, the card made it so that the two were now viewed as what they were dressed as, effectively taking the place of the Dark Magician and Dark Magician Girl.

Not long after, the two arrived in the village.

1213321112221.content:
After a moment, the flash of light died down, and his vision returned. Jaden rubbed his eye a bit, and instantly noticed that he was somewhere else. Looking around, he saw that he was no longer with Alexis, and now appeared to be indoors and was now sitting at a desk in the Acadmey's infirmary. "Huh? How did I get here?" he wondered aloud.

"Your location isn't the only thing different all of a sudden." Yubel said with a bit of a giggle. "You might want to take at what you're wearing now."

Wondering what she meant, he stood up and looked down and was met with surprise as he saw in place of his usual Slifer Red uniform was something else. He now wore the white top of the Obelisk Blue girls uniform open over a pink dress, and as he looked down, he felt something near his ears and reached up to find a pair of earrings hanging from his now pierced ears. "What the-!?" he let out in shock. He recognized these clothes as those belonging to Fonda Fontaine, the head of the Obelisk Blue girls dorm, and the Academy's gym instructor and nurse. "Why am I wearing Ms. Fontaine's clothes!?"

"I couldn't say." Yubel replied.

Before he could think further on the situation, there was a knock on the door, and before he could react, the door opened and in walked Chancellor Sheppard. He was so surpsed and embarrassed by being seen like this, he didn't know how to react. Looking right at him, Sheppard didn't react how he was expecting him to, though "Ah, here you are Ms. Fontaine." he said.

'Did he just call me Ms. Fontaine?' Jaden thought in confusion.

"I know that this is your off, but Crowler has come down with a cold, and was wondering if you could teach an extra gym class in his place." Sheppard explained.

'Does he really think I'm Ms. Fontaine?' Jaden thought.

"It looks like it." Yubel said. "I'm not sure whats going on, but for now maybe you should go along with things."

"Uh, sue, Chancellor Sheppard. I guess I could." Jaden answered hestitantly.

"Thanks." Shppard said before leaving the office.

12133222222222222222221.content:
As the blinding light began to die down, something would obviously be different to any onlookers if they had been around. Where two people had been standing a moment ago, there now stood only one person.

This new person had quite the unusual appearance. The facial features was rather androgynous, and one would be unable to tell if this person was a boy or girl. However, it was other aspects of this person's appearance that was strange. The hair was rather odd, being made of two different colors ans styles split evenly down the middle. The right side was long and blond and looked just like Alexis's, while the left side was shorter and brown and resembled Jaden's. The person's eyes were also different colors, with the right eye being a yellowish shade and the left eye was brown. The person was wearing the white top that the girl's of the Obelisk Blue dorm wore, but over it was an open Slifer Red blazer and the blue sailor collar going over it. On the legs was a blue miniskirt, and a pair of sneakers on the feet.

The person standing there was both Jaden and Alexis, their bodies having somehow fused together by the card. "Wh-what just happened?" the new boy spoke, and the sound that came out was both Jaden's and Alexis's voices at once, speaking in perfect unison. "Our body..." This new person that had been created from them knew it had been them, both of their minds and thoughts appearing in its head. Suddenly, the body froze up and its expression glazed over, and a red and blue light came out of the body, and the lights took form and became ghost-like spirits of Jaden and Alexis floating just outside the body. The two spirit bodies looked from one another and then at their new body.

"Jaden? Wh-what is going on?" Alexis asked, how worried she was being evident in her voice.

"I don't know." Jaden honestly replied.

"What should we do? I mean, this is too weird." Alexis said.

"Perhaps first, you should find out a few things about your new body since you don't know how long it will be like this." Yubel suggested as she appeared. Alexis was a bit surprised to see the duel spirit, but then again, she was also a spirit right now. "For example, maybe you should find out if both of you need to be in this body at once for it to work, or if either of you can be alone in it."

"That does sound like something we should try." Jaden said, and Alexis nodded. Touching the body, his spirit turned into a red light and entered the body. Unlike before, his it was his mind his mind alone in the body right now. Moving the body, everything moved normally. He then turned to where Alexis and Yubel's spirits floaed nearby. "Well, everything is fine for me. Well, other than the bosy." he told them, his voice alone speaking. The body then froze and its expression glazed over as Jaden's spirit exited body. "Your turn." he said to Alexis.

Nodding, she touched the body and her spirit body became blue light as it entered the fused body. Like with Jaden, it was currently her alone in the body, and everything moved for her normally. "It works fine for me." she said to the two spirits, the body speaking with just her voice. And once again, the body then froze and its expression glazed over as Alexis's spirit left. "Now what?"

"There is something else to try." Yubel said. "Since I'm a part of Jaden's soul, thi new body is technically mine as well. You can even see it seems to take some influences from me, such as with the hair and eyes. I want to see if I can use it as well. If you'll allow me that is."

"Well, I don't have a problem." Jaden said. "What about you, Alexis?"

"Well, if you're okay with it, I'll let her." Alexis agreed.

Nodding, the duel spirit touched the empty shell of a body, and became a white light as she did and enterd it. The body moved and then turned to the two human spirits. "It looks like I can also use it as well." Yubel said, the body speaking in her voice.

"So then, now what?" Alexis asked.

"Enter the body, both of you." Yubel said.

"Huh?" the two let out in unison, confused.

"I'm curious what would happen, what it would be like if all three of us were in it."

"Well, I guess we should find out. C'mon, Alexis." Jaden said, and Alexis nodded. The two human spirits touched the body, and Jaden became a red light and Alexis a blue one, as they both entered into it.

Instantly, it felt as if all three of their minds were one, and it was slightly hard to tell which thoughts were whose, though it was possible. But at the same time, it all felt natural. Thoughts of Jaden also felt as if they were their own to Alexis and Yubel, and the same was true of theirs to the other two. Currently, the three were of one mind, and was almost as if they were a single person. "This is kinda strange, but it feels normal." they said, all three of their voices speaking in unison. "It feels like we're only one person, but at the same time, we still feel like a 'we' rather than and 'I.' We identify ourselves as Jaden, Alexis, and Yubel while we're like this." They then thought about what to next. "Should we start looking for a way to fix our body problem, or should we tell our friends and have them help us." they said, sthinking out loud.

12133222222222222222222112.content:
As the light died down and their vision cleared, Jaden and Alexis immediately realized a two things were wrong. For starters, rather than standing on their feet, they were both hunched over on all fours. And secondly, and the most important of the differences, their clothes had disappeared, leaving them both completely naked. The only things on them were collars, a red one on Jaden and a blue one on Alexis.

Blushing brightly, Alexis attempted to cover herself, but found that her arms weren't working right. Trying to get up, they also found that they couldn't stand up properly; they could balance on their feet for a few moments, but it was shaky, and they both ended up falling back onto their hands.

"Jaden, what's going on!" Alexis screamed with fear, "Why am I naked?! Why can't I stand up?! Wha-" She cut herself off as she realized something else. Despite her screaming, she wasn't hearing her words - she was hearing barking.

Jaden meanwhile noticed something else. While he clearly heard Alexis barking, he found that he somehow undersood exactly what she was trying to stay. "What is going on?" Jaden gasped, and was greeted by a "Woof!" of his own.

"Jaden, why are we barking like a dogs?! And why can we understand it!?" she screamed in another series of barks.

"I don't know." Jaden said as calmly as he could. "But lets try to stay calm here. We can't panic." His words were still coming as a series of barks and woofs.

"Well, this is pretty strange." Yubel said as she appeared next to Jaden. Like with Jaden and Alexis, her spirit body was also currently forced on all fours, and was in a sitting possition crouched over with her hands planted in front, and was basically sitting like a dog. "Whatever is affecting you two is also affecting me as well." the duel spirit barked.

As they were confused by these strange turn of events, they suddenly heard a voice speak, and one using words and not barks. "Ah, there they are!" Somehow managing to blush even harder, Alexis's head whipped up - and her eyes widened in further shock. There were some dogs walking towards them - dogs that were walking upright and wearing clothes! There was a dog in a Slifer Red blazer, one in a Ra Yellow blazer, one in an Obelisk Blue boys uniform and one in an Obelisk Blue girls uniform.

As the two continued to stare in shock, the dog wearing the Ra Yellow uniform said, in perfect English, "I'm glad they didn't go too far. Looks like they just wanted some fresh air."

"We were worried about you, Alexis." the dog in the girl's uniform said as she pet Alexis on the head, much to her shock.

"Yeah, and we were worried about you too, Jaden." the dog in the Slifer Red uniform said.

"Okay, now that we found your humans, Spike, now can we head back in?" the dog in the blue boys uniform said.

"Yeah, I'm just happy my two humans are safe." the dog in the Slifer uniform, Spike, said.

As this all went on, Jaden and Alexis, as well as Yubel, were just confused.

121332222222222222222221121.content:
"Actually," Spike suddenly said, "Now that I think about it, as long as they're out here, we should probably take them for a walk. Otherwise, they'll just beg us for one later."

"What's this 'we' business?" the dog in the Obelisk boys uniform asked.

"Come on Rover, you know you like them too," the dog in the Ra Yellow blazer said.

"Oh, shut up Fido!" Rover snapped.

While this was going on, Jaden, Alexis and Yubel just stared in confusion.

"Jaden, what is going on?" Alexis asked.

"I think these things think we're their pets, or something," Jaden replied.

"Actually, I think you two are their pets. I think that card either altered reality or sent us to another one," Yubel commented.

'Oh great,' Jaden thought with a wince, before saying aloud, "I think it's a good idea for us to play along, at least until we can find that card or figure out something else.

"Okay, but I get the feeling this is only going to get worse," Alexis said.

While they were talking, the dogs came to the conclusion that Rover and Fido would return to their dorms while the girl dog (whose name was apparently Precious) would help Spike walk the humans. So, Spike took Jaden's leash while Precious took Alexis' and started leading them away, with the humans reluctantly following.

1213322222222222222222211211.content:
As the two were walked by the dogs, Yubel faded away as she disappeared for now. Alexis couldn't help but feel completely mortifed by her current situation. Here she was, currently naked and she couldn't do anything to cover up. And on top of that, she was being treated as if she was a dog, and by real dogs no less! At least she had Jaden here to help her through this.

And as for Jaden, he thought about the current situation. It was definitely weird, and he knew he had to find some way for him and Alexis to return to normal, though he currently had no idea, other than maybe finding that card again. He also payed a bit of attention to Spike and Precious, who were chatting a bit with each other about various things such as dueling, their friends, things going on, and each other. He also got the feeling that the two might like each other as more than friends. As he looked around boredly, he suddenly noticed something nearby.

"SQUIRELL!" Jaden barked out loudly as he realized what it was.

"WHERE!?" Alexis yelled out excitedly as she instantly turned her head in the direction Jaden was looking.

Both Jaden and Alexis were excited now, there worries completely forgotten for the moment. It was a squirrel, and they knew they absolutely had to chase it. The two of them tried to run after it, but were held back by their leashes, though that didn't seem to disuade them as they struggled to try to go after it, though the dogs didn't give in.

"Squirrel! Squirrel! I wanna chase it! I wanna catch it!" The two of them barked, and continued to yell/bark at the animal, who had heard them, and had started to take off in fear.

"Woah, realx boy." Spike said to Jaden.

"Easy, girl." Precious said to Alexis.

"Let go, its getting away!" Alexis complained.

"I wanna chase it!" Jaden barked.

But unfortunately for the two humans, their desire just wouldn't come true, as the teo dogs held the leashes firmly, and prevented their pursuit. Eventually, the squirrell had ran out of their sight. "Awwwww." the two whined with disappointment. After they had calmed down, only then did they realize what had just happened.

With a look of what was practically horror, Alexis turned to Jaden. "J-jaden, why t-the hell did we just do that?" she asked him fearfully.

"I don't know. For some reason, I just really wanted to cath that squirrell, and was overwhelmed by that desire..." Jaden told her. "Alexis, I think the longer we're like this, the more we're gonna act like dogs!"

"Things just keep getting worse for us..." Alexis groaned as the two dogs resumed walking the humans.

1213322222222222222222222222222221.content:
As the bright flash of light died down, and their vision cleared. And now, their clothes were different! Jaden now wore the uniform of the Obelisk Blue girls, with the white sleeveless blazer with blue sailor collar, blue miniskirt, blue high heel boots, and even wore Alexis's fingerless gloves. As for Alexis, she now wore a Slifer Red blazer that was open to reveal a black shirt under it, a pair of jeans, and sneakers. They were now dressed in each other's clothes However, even though they were now dressed in each other's uniform, they didn't seem bothered by that.

"That sure was weird." Jaden commented, putting his hands on his hips.

"I'll say." Alexis agreed. "Good thing it didn't seem to do anything."

"Yeah." Jaden agreed. "Anyway, I think we should get going to class. You don't want to be late."

"Yeah, you're right." she agreed. "Don't want Crowler getting on my case again." And with that, the two headed to class. Jaden was walking much more femininely, with his hips swaying, while Alexis had a more maculine stride.

Both of them were completely unaware of what had happened to them, and that was that they had swapped lives with one another. Jaden Rhodes as he was now known. had taken Alexis's place, and despite not having physically changed in the slightest, now had everything about her life. He was now the top student in the girls dorm, had the best grades in school, and was nicknamed by the other students as the Queen of Obelisk Blue. And of course, he was also the most attractive one in the girl's doem, and had many male admirers.

As for the occupant of his own life, now known as Alexis Yuki, who also hadn't changed physically, now had everything about his life. A bit of a slacker when it came to schoolwork, and not the brightest sometimes, but despite her grades, she was a great duelist, and one of the best in the whole school. Though she was in Slifer Red, the dorm regarded as the worst, she was better than most in Obelisk Blue. And like Jaden had been just moments ago, it was now her soul that Yubel was fused to, and the duel spirit was also completely unaware of the change.

To these two, and anyone else, the two of them had always had their current lives, and nothing was different.


But what about the card that did this?

1213322222222222222222222222222222222112.content:
As the light died down, Jaden and Alexis rubbed their eyes to clear them. Jaden recovered first and looked around.

"Well that was weird. What just- Whoa!" he said, turning red at the sight that greeted him.

While Jaden hadn't been affected, Alexis' clothes had disappeared, leaving her completely naked. As Jaden stared, dumbstruck, Alexis finished rubbing her eyes and blinked in confusion at the sight of Jaden staring at her.

"Jaden? What's wrong, what are you staring at? ...And why is so cold all of a sudden?"

Jaden only continued to stare; still confused, Alexis looked down to see what he was staring at... then turned bright red and shrieked.

"WHAT THE HELL?!" she screamed, quickly covering herself, "WHY AM I NAKED?! AND STOP STARING AT ME!!!"

Blushing brighter, Jaden realized what he was doing and quickly turned around.

"Smooth move," Yubel said sarcastically, "And since you were too busy oogling Alexis to notice, I should probably point out that that card appears to have disappeared."

"We'll deal with that later. We can of have a bigger problem right now," Jaden replied, still blushing, as he took off his jacket and held it behind himself, "Alexis? Here, put this on. It's not much, but it's better than nothing."

Jaden felt Alexis take the jacket. A few minutes later, he felt it was safe enough to turn around, and saw that Alexis was now wearing his jacket wrapped around her like a towel; as he'd said, it wasn't much, but at least she was partially covered.

Suddenly, before either of the two still-blushing students could do anything...

When the bright flash of light died down,

However, they were now joined by another person. And that person was Yubel. Her body was phsysical once more, and she was not restricted to her spirit form. She was also now wearing some clothes. She wore a white sleeveless blazer with red trimming and a red miniskirt. It looked like a Slifer version of the Obelisk Girls uniform.

"Yubel? How are you like that all of a sudden?" Jaden asked.

"I'm not sure." she replied. "I'm just as confused by this as you."

"I'm not sure whats going on either, but it was probably the card." Alexis said. It was very strange for her to see Yubel again after the whole mess in the other dimension, but she and the others had been told before that she was no longer a threat and had changed. But she still felt slightly tense seeing her again after everything that happened.

Jaden looked at the card that had seemingly done this, and it was still blank. He then turned back to look at Yubel. "I wonder why you're wearing clothes and dressed like that.

"Hey guys!" They heard someone call out to them, and saw their friends, Syrus, Hassleberry, Chazz, Jesse, Blair, Jasmine, and Mindy walking over to them.

"Hey Jaden." Jesse greeted him.

"Hey Alexis. Hey Yubel." Mindy greeted the others.

The three exchanged looks of surprise. Apparently, they were the only ones who noticed how strange the current situation was. It was because reality had altered. Now, in this new one, Yubel had been a student as long as Jaden, Alexis, and some of the others, and the events in the other dimension hadn't happened. She was also friends with the rest of the group, and no one else found her non-human apearance strange. Only Jaden, Alexis, and Yubel were aware if the previous reality.

As the flash died down, Jaden blinked his eyes to clear them.

"Huh, that was weird. What just - WHOA!" he yelled, seeing the sight before him.

Alexis was now on all fours and completely naked, except for a collar attached to a leash Jaden realized he was suddenly holding in his hand. Alexis had a strangely vacant look on her face, eyes wide and glazed, while her tongue was sticking out slightly from her mouth.

Blushing and feeling a nosebleed coming on, Jaden couldn't help but stare as he asked, "Wh- how- Alexis, what happened to you?!"

"Woof, woof!" Alexis barked in response, tongue wagging.

"Huh?" Was all Jaden could say.

"Hmm, interesting," Yubel said, "It appears her mind has been altered so she thinks she's a dog. Yours, in particular."

"Well, we have to do something! We can't leave her like this!"

"Why not?" Yubel asked with a smirk, "You seem to be enjoying the view."

Jaden could only blush some more at that, while Alexis continued to bark at him.

As the flash dimmed, Alexis suddenly became aware of two things: 1) she was on all fours, and 2) more importantly, she was completely naked, save for a collar attached to a leash Jaden was suddenly holding.

Completely shocked, Alexis could only gape at herself and blush as she tried to process this, while Jaden rubbed his eyes to clear them.

"Well that was weird," he said, "This card just flashed and nothing happened."

That was enough to snap Alexis out of her shock, and she stared at Jaden in surprise.

"What do you mean, nothing happened?!" she yelled, "I'm naked! And on a leash, and-"

She stopped yelling as she suddenly realized that while she could understand herself, she was hearing barking sounds.

"What? Why am I barking?"

"Whoa, what is it Alexis?" Jaden asked, squatting down and taking her head in his hands petting her head soothingly, "Calm down, girl. It's okay, just calm down, that's a good dog."

Alexis could only stare at Jaden in further confusion. "You think I'm a dog?"

"Good girl," Jaden said, getting to his feet and picking up the leash again, "Now come on, let's go home."

It was a normal day at duel academy. The sun was shining and Syrus was walking on the Acedemy grounds, hoping that nobody strong wants to challenge him to a duel. His short stature, large eyes and shy personality gave many the impression that he was a little kid. He certainly looked like one to the point where if you put him around everyone else who looks older but in the same age group as he was you would think that he was a small boy, which lead many to underestimate his dueling skills. But he was very fortunate to have friends like Jaden, his best friend, Alexis who he acts as a sisterly figure to him, and even Hassleberry who actually does look like a general in comparison to him. Being so small and little boy like wasn't all bad however.He had to admit that many of the obelisk blue girl students thought of him as the cutest little boy in the academy. Seeing as he had the stature of one and didn't really look like anyone else his age the girls called him a little boy.

“Oh man” Syrus said, walking around being cautious as ever. He was heading to the Slifer red dorm to meet Jaden when something caught his eye while he was on the path to the dorm. “Huh, hey what’s this” Syrus said to himself, looking down to his right he saw a peculiar blank card. It was green so he knew it was a spell card but he didn’t know why it was blank. “That’s weird” he said, picking up the card with his little boy looking fingers. “Hmm” he exclaimed. He stared at the card for a few seconds, but at that moment, “Hey half pint” said a voice from behind Syrus. “Aaah” Syrus screamed wide eyed in shock when Hassleberry came from behind him and put his buff arm around Syrus’s neck in a playful friendly hold. “Whatca got there”. “Haven’t you ever heard of saying excuse me before you scare someone like that?” “I’ve gotta make sure you stay alert ‘cause you never know if danger could be coming in any direction” Hassleberry said in his Sergeant lingo. “You’re the only danger around here” Syrus said while still holding the card. Hassleberry then released his grip. “So what’s that blank card you got” he asked. “Beats me, I just found this.” Suddenly the card began glowing. “Huh” Syrus said as he stared at the light. Suddenly a bright flash of light blasted and enveloped both of them.

What happens next?

As the light enveloped both of them, only Hasslebery was able to make out what was happening. Throug squinting from the sheer brightness of the light he noticed that the light only hit syrus. "Truesdale, whats happening" the buff Ra yellow duelist asked the small boy like teen. "Aaaaah" Syrus was screaming as the light was affecting his body. There was a bluish glow outlining him along with what could be identified as a male symbol being projected. Although he himself couldn't see it, he was changing. Hassleberry stood in disbelief at what was happening. The glow surrounding Syrus was also changing colors. The blue around him grew lighter as it changed into a reddish pink. His voice had changed as well, from his screams of pain it could be heard that his voice was becoming higher pitched than usual. The next change was his hair. Usually an upside down W it grew and went down. He now had girl like bangs and his hair flowed down to his back. The blue on it was also a bit lighter. His eyes while closed had their eyelashes combed and grown a few centimenters. His fingers became more slender and toned along with his arms and his fingernails sharpened and grew a bit as well. Now came the lower body. His waist constricted and his hips flared out as his backside grew a bit further and stretched his currently male pants, giving him an hourglass shape similar to Alexis, Jasmine and Mindy. His chest swelled into 2 fair sized breasts that were approrpriate for a person his...or her age, pressing against his blazer but not to large to reveal cleavage through it. His legs had their thighs grow and like his arms become slender and toned. As the change finished the symbol was now changed from male to female and Syrus' new aura was a bright pink. Syrus had now officially become a girl with the only physical resemblance to his male form being his glasses. The glow and female symbol had disappeared and the card fell to the ground.

Newly feminized, Syrus was exhausted from his transformation and passed out on the ground, the card laying next to him/her. "Truesdale" Hassleberry said while managing to get out from the trance Syrus' transformation instilled on him with its unimaginable sight. "Uh Sy" Hassleberry asked, nudging on his shoulder, only recieving quiet grunts from syrus' new and strangely soothing girl voice. Not sure what to do he didn't want to wake Syrus up and have him see he's a girl, so he did the only thing a chivalrous man would do for a lovely lady, so to speak. He picked him/her up in his arms and decided to run over to Mrs Fontane, the school nurse and ask her for help, leaving the card behind.

As Hassleberry ran he looked down at Syrus, his new female face's eyelashes long and glistening in the sunlight. Hassleberry had to admit, even though it sounded weird, Syrus was quite a pretty girl, his/her long hair drooping down, glowing a bright blue, his glasses on his new small nose and his skin smooth and unblemished. "Man, i've gotta get this shrimp turned back to normal or I'm gonna go thinking the weirdest things", he said, still carrying Syrus' female body to Ms fontanes office.

"Ughh where, where am I" Syrus said in a soothing light female voice, still too groggy to notice. He woke up and saw something unusual, he was wearing a pink nightgown and his hair was obscuring his vision a bit. When his vision cleared he saw that he was in a bed in Ms Fontane’s office lying quite comfortably. “Hmm,” Syrus said as he turned around, long hair swishing from left to right. Next to him were Jasmine and Mindy, two girls from the Obelisk blue dorm. Mindy thought Syrus was cute and now that he was a girl he was 10x as cute. They were sitting by his side, big happy smiles on their faces. “Hi Syrus, giggle” the two of them said, giggling and putting their hands over their mouths in amusement of something. “Uh, hey Jasmine, Mindy, how are you? What’s so funny?” Syrus asked, not knowing that “he” was the joke.“We’re good Syrus” Mindy said “but your definitely different now” Jasmine said giggling. “Huh” Syrus replied, not sure what she meant by that, until he felt something brush on his hands. As he turned around he saw what he had felt and saw it was hair. “Wha-what the” Syrus said, feeling the flock of hair in his hand as he realized it was his hair. His hair was now long and smooth, going down to his back. It spread on the bed in all directions as he sat up in it. Also his arms were toned, with feminine hands and long fingernails. He now had breasts that pushed against his new girly nightgown that he was wearing, his waist was thin and his hips wide just like Jasmine and Mindy as he felt his gown being pushed from the sides by his larger hips. “Wha, what happened to me” Syrus said with his even higher pitched girl voice. He felt his face with his new feminine hand, his cheek now smooth. “I’m, I’m, a girl”. “You sure are cutie”. Mindy commented. “You’re so beautiful” Jasmine said, stroking Syrus’ smooth hair. Both her and Mindy had smiles on their happy go lucky faces. “Stop that, I’m a guy. I am not a girl” Syrus protested, to which Jasmine and Mindy replied with two smiles. “Hate to break it to you Sy but, you are a girl” Jasmine said. “You see, Hassleberry said that you turned into a girl and passed out when you found some card” Mindy said to the newly feminized and overwhelmed Syrus. “We didn’t believe it at first, but after seeing how you looked we believed it” Jasmine added. “So then we just had to get you out of those boy clothes and into a cute little gown to sleep in, it really fits you, giggle” Mindy said. Syrus couldn’t believe it. He had to accept that he was now a she. Syrus grabbed a flock of her hair and held it in her hands, rubbing it on his long nailed fingers. “So then, I really am a girl” Syrus said sadly. Mindy and Jasmine however decided to cheer him up. “Aww don’t be upset Syrus, you look pretty” Mindy said endearingly, her hand on Syrus’ shoulder. “Yeah, your one of us girls now. We’re gonna help you out, Ok Sy?” Syrus blushed and cheered up. “Really” she said hopefully. “Totally, you’re so cute with those adorable eyes and that lovable smile we can’t say no” Mindy said, pinching Syrus’ cheek, admiring its smoothness. “Ok Syrus, first things first” Jasmine said. “Let’s get you-they suddenly started talking together and holding hands “In uniform” they said giggling. Syrus however, had a very uneasy feeling about this. With her new long hair, breasts and girly nightgown, she wasn’t sure how she was going to handle all this change with being a girl, let alone dressing like one. Jasmine suddenly pulled out an Obelisk blue girls uniform from the closet in the nurses office, a sleeveless button top with a blue miniskirt and blue high heel boots. Syrus looked at the shirt with disbelief, not believing he was going to have to wear that with his new girl body. He couldn’t help but feel ridiculous with his female body. As Mindy held the shirt in front of Syrus with her manicured fingers she said “You’ll look totally fetch with this on, and don’t worry, we’ve got plenty of other outfits too, cutie” she kissed him on his now smooth cheek with her clear lips. Despite being a girl, his mentality hadn’t changed(yet), so he couldn’t help but blush at the feeling of being kissed.



Afterwards, Syrus had gotten out of bed. Taking a moment to take in his new form he looked down, his breasts pushing a little bit against his gown, which went all the way down to his legs, slim and toned like Jasmine and Mindy. The weight of his breasts heavy a bit, not as heavy as Jasmine and Mindy’s probably were but still weighing him down a bit. He was still a boy at heart so he didn’t mess with his new features. Suddenly the clacking of high heels was heard. Mindy and Jasmine had come back and looked at Syrus with adorement. “Aww, shes so cute standing up”Mindy said, her hands together adoring Syrus’ cute little eyes and small size. He would have to get used to being called a she. “Ok, your gonna have to go change in there, Sy” Jasmine pointed, her hand on her thin hip, pointing to the room that was next to one of the beds. It was a girls changing room. Syrus couldn't help but freak out knowing he'd have to go in there. "B-but thats the girls changing room" he sputtered with his high pitched girl voice. Jasmine then added "Um, hello, what do you think you are" she said, her hands on her hips. "Oh yeah..." Syrus said, still not used to being a girl. “Well, alright” Syrus said, her female voice a bit nervous. As she took the first step she suddenly felt two arms wrap around her waist and pull her into a warm embrace. “Oh Syrus, you’re so cute, you’ll look great in this uniform. SMOOCH”. Mindy said one last time as she kissed her with a big love filled kiss on her cheek, still admiring her now cuter girl form. Syrus however stood blushing from the kiss. She liked Mindy and Jasmine as friends and she had a feeling she was going to like them more as friends now. So she went into the changing room. "I'll do this but i have to get back to normal soon" she said and began to get dressed.

123321.content:
It was a nice day outside as Syrus was casually strolling around the forest. He, Jaden and the rest were ready to start their third year at Duel Academy while Hasselberry and Blair were about to start their second one. There was also something about a promotion for him going into Obelisk Blue after his performances and high grades he scored last year. He knew he would feel a bit lonely with him moving to a new dorm, since while he was still in Ra Yellow he had more opportunities to visit Jaden and the gang at Slifer Red.

But currently, he was looking at a blank card he found near the gates of the academy. His issues with moving out were obscured by a curiosity about the card.

"Is this the real deal? I never thought I'd found this here."

"And what exactly did ya find Truesdale?"

Syrus yelped at the sudden question as he turned around to see Hasselberry with a grin on his face.

"Don't scare me like that!"

"Heh. Sorry 'bout that. But what's with that blank card in your hand? Did you find a misprint at the shop?"

"No, I found it near the gates."

"Huh. Odd place for this to be."

"Well actually....", began Syrus with his explanation. "Remember that magic show we had not that long ago?"

"You mean the one with the magician brought by Crowler? Yeah, I do. It was pretty neat. One of the few good things he did as a principal..."

"You know that moment when he called a few students to hold these blank cards on the stage and said they can make wishes come true? Like make money appear and getting to find your old stuff.... I have been thinking. What if we tell it we want to become Obelisk Blue students? I mean we could finally be at the top with the big guys. And we won't have to hear from Crowler that we are lazy in that situation. It works only three times if I remember. So we could have two more wishes left..."

With the possibility to move with his friends into the Obelisk dorms would be perfect as they wouldn't be fragmented and they would benefit from the comfort of the place as well. But Hasselberry gave a sigh at this.

"C'mon Sy. You know things like that don't happen. The guys who went on stage either were in cahoots with the magician or simply had good luck. First there is Jaden with the spirits and now you with this magic stuff?"

"But... what if it's real?"

"I doubt it... I mean..." He then took the card from Syrus's hand to look at it. "It's just a blank card. I can't see something like this granting wishes. It's like with the magic well thing... But I do wish the two of us could be in Obelisk... as improbable as it is." He then gave the card back, with neither noticing a faint glow from it.

"I guess you're right... It does seem a bit outstretched."

"Of course it is... But I was wondering one thing."

"What is it?"

"I know the guys in the blue dorms get in there due to their grades... But I wonder how did the girls that hang with Alexis got in there."

"You mean Jasmine and Mindy?"

"I'm not surprised Alexis is in there, but those two make me wonder how easy is the entry there. I mean, the don't Duel unless it's either a test or a demonstration and seem more interested in the basics than in actual Dueling."

"Well, I know they have high grades... but when it comes to Dueling, they are a bit unexcited. And I've heard they remade their Decks recently as well, but I haven't seen them Duel anybody."

"Exactly. And not to mention their obsession with boys. They always talk about getting boyfriends instead of Del and such. Even Alexis is tired of that."

"... That's true...They might think this is just a regular academy where we could find romance and such... I admit it makes me curious. I wish I would know exactly what they are thinking." Just then, the card glowed again, but a bit stronger this time. Hasselberry thought he saw a light come out of the card, but merely thought it was just an optical illusion or something. "Anyway, let's head to class. The supplementary classes are about t begin."

"Tell me again why are we going? I know Jaden needs to go since he is still in Slifer, but why do we go?"

"We may need some new strategies. Cards are being made non-stop. Who knows what types of decks we mind find in the future. A bit of preparation doesn't matter much... And I kind of feel bad for Jaden."

"I think I will go for the latter more than anything else.", joked Hasselberry as Syrus put the Card in his pocket as the two went to class.

With two wishes already made, the Card was now ready to make them real. But since both were vague, it decided to accomplish them in a special way...
123321.title: Yes

1233211.content:
While walking back towards the academy, the two felt a small shiver.

"Did ya feel that?"

"I did. But there is no wind. But it wasn't so bad."

"Maybe it's just me since I have no sleeves... By the way, does Chazz and Blair go to the session as well?"

"No, they don't. Since they were the last two standing in the tournament they have the day off from the session. Chazz said he needed more time anyway to get all his stuff back from when the Society of Light was still a thing. And Blair wants to get accustomed to the place since this is technically her first year here."

As the two were talking, they were now ignoring the slightly colder sensation of their skin as they lost any bits of hair that they had. Also, their shoes began to change color with faint traces of blue starting to appear on them as they began to get a tad smoother, with Hasselberry's boots more so.

"But I am amazed she picked Slifer. I would've guessed she wanted in Obelisk since it was the only dorm that had girls sleep separate from the guys."

"I am guessing because she may have a crush on Jaden."

"You thought so too? She did seem a bit clingy before... Wait, but you said she came here before dressed as a guy. Was she also like that then?"

"No, last year she had a crush on Zane. She dressed herself as a boy and then began following my brother around. But Jaden caught her when she sneaked into Zane's room and found out her true gender. Then they Dueled for having Jaden keep his mouth shut about the whole thing, as we found out she also was younger than normal to attend the academy. In the end, Jaden won and she had to go back home. But at the end, the confessed that she began to have a crush on Jaden."

"I'm guessing that made him freeze in place."

"No joke. He hadn't said a word about it for a week before he was again comfortable with the subject."

As the two were laughing a little, their footwear continued to change as the black, and in Syrus's case the yellow, were now replaced with a dark blue color. They then began to change physically. Their feet began to get daintier as their nails got trimmed and gained a thin layer of gloss. Syrus also climbed in height a little bit while Hasselberry's muscles lost a tiny bit of their definition. These changes were currently unseeable, thus the two remained unfazed by the changes.

"But you gotta admit, that the whole thing is a bit cute. I mean, Blair did come back for Jaden, didn't she?"

"Yeah... But it's also a bit sad. She is a few years younger than him, so I don't think it will work."

"Hey, you never know. Atticus always said romance comes in many shapes and forms, that age isn't important... or whatever. She may get a chance."

"Maybe..."

The subject of romance wasn't something the two would ever talk about. Especially Syrus, after the whole academy found out about his crush on Dark Magician Girl... But at the moment, the two seemed a bit interested in it. They felt something was off by the conversation, but they shook off their heads as they approached the front gates.
1233211.title: On the way

12332112.content:
Right as the gates came into view, they noticed someone in front of the entrance. Once they got closer, they found out it was Jaden with a somewhat miserable expression on his face. Once they got closer, Syrus saluted him.

"Hey Jay!"

"Oh, hey guys! Are you coming for the course too."

"Yeah. We didn't want ya to be alone in this mess as Chazz and Blair are not coming."

"Thanks. But it's not like it will be that much of a hassle. I'll just snooze my way through the lessons. I'll just have to pretend to be awake once we get to Crowler's lesson.", said Jaden with a carefree smile.

Normally, the guys would gave an awkward laugh at this, would sigh or would try to convince Jaden to at least be awake during classes. But new thoughts went into their heads as new opinions were forming regarding their friend's behavior.

While processing the new thoughts, their pants got tighter on them, which made their legs a bit more visible, especially in Hasselberry's case. His hairless skin also began to lighten a little bit from its deep tan while Syrus did the reverse and became slightly more tanned. Jaden thought something was off, but before he could ask what was wrong, Syrus told him:

"Geez Jaden, you could try to pay attention. As boring as it could be, if you can get onto the teacher's good side, it would benefit you a lot."

"Why? As long as I pass the practical exam with flying colors, for the written exam, I will just score enough points for a D."

"You do realize we won't help you with the test right?"

"Why not? I am sure there is a way to peek-"

"Sorry Jay. But Hasselberry is right. We don't want to get in trouble. No offense, but... I think the reason why the teachers give you such a hard time besides sleeping in class is because you are a Slifer. You could try and study so that you could get in another dorm. You know that the teachers put less pressure on the guys from the yellow and blue dorms."

"Yeah. I mean, if Chazz managed to do great before he got in Slifer, I am sure you can do better as well. Ya aren't dumb, but you are kind of lazy. I think it's high time for you to begin studying."

Jaden was literally shocked. He knew his friends wouldn't always help him on a whim if that would put them in trouble. But never before he thought they would try and lecture him to be more studious.

"In any case, let's just head to class for the moment.", said Syrus as the three went inside, with Jaden still thinking about what was going on.

As they walked, the shoes continued changing, without Jaden or the two noticing. Syrus's shoes got a bit longer as they began to cover his ankles while both his and Hasselberry's lost their usual method to close them, as both gained a side zipper.

"Man, what is with them today? Don't they know how boring some of these lessons could be? I even saw them sleep in class before. I wonder if something happened... And was it just me or did Syrus seem a little taller? And I swear Hasselberry doesn't wear pants like those... Anyway, if they are upset or something I'll just ask them later. Right now, they seem a bit out of it."
12332112.title: Meeting Jaden

123321121.content:
Once inside, they took a glance at theamphitheater who was for the lesson. To their slight surprise, besides the Slifer students, there also were some Ra and Obelisk students as well.

"Huh? Why are some Obelisk and Ra guys here?"

"Well...", started off Jaden. "When Saritorius took over Obelisk, his students didn't participate at all the classes and even had their own schedule, separate from the rest of us. That's why the brainwashed people, after the whole thing was over had to take a few extra lessons to recover the lost ones. But the guys who did well at the tournament got excused for today, including Alexis. The same goes for the guys from Ra who got unlucky."

"Well that explains why some people were waking up early this morning... But it seems like students from different dorms sit differently. Slifer at the bottom, Ra in the middle and Obelisk at the top. "

"Really?! Oh, man... So I'll be on my own...?"

"Cheer up Jay. It's not like it's a test."

"Yeah. It's not like we aren't here. We're just up a few seats."

"Thanks guys..."

Jaden wanted to go on with the discussion a bit more, but the teacher just so happened to arrive in the class. Syrus and Hasselberry waved at Jaden as they went to their seats, with Jaden going lower.

The class then began, with teacher beginning explaining different strategies to counter Burn Decks. Syrus and Hasselberry weren't enthusiastic about the lesson, but listened anyways as it could prove useful to some future Duels. As they were listening, more changes happened to them. While writing down a few things here and there, their hands began to slim down. Their fingers became longer and daintier. Despite taking a few glances at his now smaller hands, Hasselberry didn't seem to notice the changes, nor the fact that his armbands vanished. Meanwhile, Syrus's blazer and top began to slowly recede as his wrists were now visible.

As the lesson went on, the two began wondering where the earlier comments about Jaden's laziness came from.

"Why did I go that far? I mean, I know how lazy Jaden can be. But he is right about some classes being boring. And I know he already knows a lot about Dueling..."

"Why in Sam Hill did I get so upset? It's not like Jaden finds lesson boring to annoy people. Some actually are, the teachers continue nagging at him..."

Just then, their legs finished their transformation into slim, athletic feet that seemed a bit smaller than they should got a boy. Their pants, also began to shift color. The original colors were slowly turning a pale blue as the material got a tiny bit softer.

"...But he should at least try to please the teachers. He must know by now how hard is to make yourself liked. If you say lessons, are not your thing, that's fine, but sleeping in class is just stupid."

"... And he still doesn't care. If he wants to go and sleep, he should study hard and gain a promotion. I don't know if the teachers will accept him snoozing, but at least he will have less pressure on him... And all he does is grinning at all this... Honestly..."

Their perception of Jaden were slowly getting warped as the lesson passed. They still considered him a great friend, but were beginning to get a bit annoyed at his laziness.
123321121.title: The first class

1233211211.content:
Down at his desk, Jaden was yawning. While he knew that what the teacher said was somewhat important, he would rather learn about the things he said by Dueling. While he didn't caught any attention at the moment, he was getting increasingly bored with the lesson, thus his napping time might come soon.

"Man... This sucks.", he humbled to himself. Next to him, Winged Kuriboh appeared in spirit form, looking at him with curiosity. "Oh hey pal. How are things going?", he murmured to not draw any attention.

Winged Kuriboh made a few noises which made Jaden understand that everything was all right.

"I see. Good for you. I kind of want to chat with you and the others, but I am stuck here... By the way, did you feel that something was wrong with the guys? And I mean not just what they said, but also how they looked. It's not just me, right?"

The winged creature looked a bit surprised as well, but with the noises it made, it also didn't know what to make out of it.

"So you don't know either. Maybe they are trying to change their attitude a bit, but it is a bit much. Oh well, I guess I should ask them once this lesson is over.", he said as Kuriboh nodded before disappearing.

Back with the others, the two were silently listening to the lesson as they scribbled whenever they found something interesting. But as time passed, Syrus began getting taller. For every 20 minutes that passes, he would go up another inch. The opposite happened to Hasselberry as he got a bit shorter, though nowhere near as much as Syrus grew. But in his case, his muscles were slowly fading away. It was barely noticeable at the start, but his biceps were gradually getting smaller as his legs also got the same treatment, his thighs getting a bit smaller.

In their minds, their thoughts seemed to shift from taking Jaden's side to finding faults in his logic and trying to make him understand why he should study harder. Their reasons for going to the lesson also seemed to oscillate between going for Jaden's sake to actually trying to score some points for the teachers, as they seemed to hold in regard those that came for supplementary lessons. But there was something else that happening to Syrus's mind. Some of the memories of his past with Zane seemed to fade here and there as a few new ones, after he went to the academy, where he was admiring him appeared. This made him pinch the bridge of his nose as he tried to regain focus.

"Are you alright Syris?", asked Hasselberry as he looked at him a bit worried, not noticing the way he called him.

"Yeah, I am fine Hasilberry. Just a little headache."

"It's nothing grave, is it?"

"Nah, nothing too important. I may be getting a bit tired, that's all."

"Oh, I see. Sorry for interrupting."

"It's fine. Don't worry."

The two gave a small smile to each other as they went back to their thoughts. As class continued, their hair began changing. Syris's became a bit fuller as it started to become less frizzy while the roots of his hair began to turn brown. Hasilberry on the other hand, seemed to have his hair get bigger under his bandanna, as it seemed a bit poofier while his dreads were slowly starting unravel as the ends seemed to get wilder.
1233211211.title: Continue the lesson

12332112111.content:
Eventually class finished and after the teacher thanked them for listening, after taking a glare at Jaden, who was actually dozing off at the moment and sighing, the students began talking or left the classroom for the small recess they had.

"Say, can we go a bit to the bathroom?"

"Sure. I also need to go. Should we wait for Jaden?"

"Nah, I am sure he's sleeping. Let's go just the two of us."

"You're right. And it's not like it is necessary for him to come either."

Syris nodded as the two began walking towards the restrooms. Their speech patterns seemed to change a bit as Syris seemed a bit more laid back while Hasilberry got a bit more sophisticated with his words. But that didn't seem to be noticed by them. As for the other students, with the exception of Jaden, the two didn't seem in terms of appearance any different.

They were compelled to head for the women's restroom for a second, but they quickly shook that thought off as they headed for the men's. Once inside the stalls, they had a feeling they should sit down, but just as before, they took their mind off this quite quickly.

As they did their business, more changes happened to their hands. Their nails grew longer and became polished as the rest of the hand became quite small in comparison to the rest of their arms. But that was quick to change. Syris's seemed to get a bit thinner, but also became a bit toned, while Hasilberry's did the opposite, as it started to lose more mass, the muscles compressing down. After finishing up, they pulled up their pants as they began to grow smaller, currently showing their ankles as the blue hue from before began to deepen for both of them.

After that, the two then got outside and began washing their hands. As they did, Hasilberry looked at himself in the mirror with a slight confusion on his face.

"Say... Do you think we look a bit different?"

"Huh? How so?"

"Well, it might be just me, but I feel like our hair is... a bit off."

Upon looking, the Syris also found out that something seemed different. His side points were now pointing lower as the back spikes, expect for the lower ones seemed to straighten. As for Hasilberry, his bandanna was having a bit of difficulty covering his hair as it seemed to poof out a bit more as his dreads were starting to break as the the ends continued getting spikier.

"You're right. It does look a bit weird... Do we have time to go back to our rooms and style it?"

"I don't think we can. The recess isn't long enough."

"Rats... I guess we have to go out like this then. It doesn't look too bad."

"Yeah. Besides, wetting our hair is a big no. We would have a nightmare of a mess by tonight."

"I don't know if it will be that bad. But you're right, it's not worth the risk. Let's just roll out for now. If it gets bad later we will see what we can do."

Hasilberry accepted the suggestion as the two left the bathroom. Normally, the two would never pay this much attention to their hair or looks, but they seemed more and more interested in their aspect as time seemed to pass.
12332112111.title: To the bathroom

123321121112.content:
On the way back, Syris took a glance at an Obelisk student who was talking with his friends. Nudging Hasilberry, he gestured towards the boy.

"Doesn't he look nice? If only we had half his charm, we would be able to get a girlfriend much faster."

"Where are you getting the whole girlfriend thing? And why now?"

"Doesn't it bother you? How some nice-looking guys get fan clubs like Atticus while we don't get fans. Jaden might not be bothered by it, but I want to be in the center of attention for once. And besides, this really should boost your popularity enough to get a girlfriend as well."

"I guess you're right. Having a girlfriend sounds really good. I don't know why I haven't thought of it before..."

Being in a relationship never crossed their minds thus far, and such it should feel weird for them. On top of that, given how much effort they put into Dueling, they really didn't had much time to even consider this. But now, the two seemed quite eager to try having girlfriends. Even Syris seemed to grow out out of his feelings for Dark Magician Girl as he began embracing the idea.

In the meantime, their footwear began to grow a heel in the back as they raised up by a couple of inches. Also, the tops folded themselves as the dark-blue began to be more dominant. Also, the white side of their collars began turning blue as well. Even though quite a few students passed by, no one seemed to see the clothes changing, thinking everything was normal.

Syris then remembered the card from before as Hasilberry looked at him a bit confused.

"I know I said it sounds impossible, but what if this card is real? We could ask for girlfriends..."

Hasilberry sighed as he shook his head.

"I told you. Don't believe things like those so easily. That magician may have been really good at his job, but it's impossible he used real magic."

"... You're right... A card that grants wishes does sound pretty crazy..."

"So what are you going to do with it?"

"I don't know... I may take it to the shop at leave it there. As far as I know, this could be just a misprint or something like that, not necessary one of the magician's cards... But I don't know if we have any time left."

"We can go next recess. It is a bit longer, and we could stop there for lunch as well."

"I guess so. I just wonder how did this card get next to the gates though..."

"Maybe someone opened a pack and found it blank and threw it out in frustration. Or maybe it was from that batch of wrongly printed cards that were sent back a little while ago."

"Maybe. I mean, the management was pretty shaky last year with all that happened. Maybe Crowler supplied cards from a different source... But man I really wanted to have a girlfriend."

"Me too."

As the two once again let their minds wander over having a partner, their calves began reshaping themselves. Syris's became more slender and sleeker as they grew a bit while Hasilberry's seemed to do the reverse, losing a bit more muscle on them, as they became smaller.

But while they were thinking, the image of the guy from before seemed to change slightly as they went from jealous to slightly admiring his looks. The two were getting a bit confused over this, and they tried to recover their thoughts as a small tingling feeling was developing in their necks.

Eventually, the two returned to the amphitheater, with Syris still holding onto the card, and upon looking down, they saw that somehow Jaden was still asleep.
123321121112.title: Talking about the card

1233211211122.content:
"Ugh... I can't belief that Jaden is still asleep.", groaned Syris in a slightly higher voice.

"Me too. There's no wonder why Crowler even calls him "Slifer slacker". You would think that after two years, he would at the very least not fall asleep so often... I wonder why Alexis wants to hang out with him so much. I mean, other than his Dueling skills, there's rally no reason to.", replied Hasilberry in a higher pitched voice as well. "I can't say he isn't talented, but he seems so irresponsible and childish at times..."

"Yeah. Sometimes even I ask myself how we have this much patience with him... I wish he would be like Alexis. That way he would be a lot more responsible."

As the wish was made, the card glowed a little, with Syris thinking he saw a light come from the card, but decided to brush it off. He and Hasilberry then went to their seats, but surprisingly enough, the seats they took were a bit higher than before, right at the border between the place the Ra and Obelisk students would stay.
