And speaking of memories, even the weird memories with Atticus were slowly starting to feel normal, as his perception of him was also changing. While he was a cool and smart person with a slightly goofy side, he was now becoming childish, exasperating and silly as well. But most importantly, he was starting a different kind of bond with forming. He couldn't place what that bond was, but at the moment, that was mainly the thing that was on his mind as well.

"... That's odd. I thought there were more things that seemed odd before. Maybe my mind was just muddled a bit... Or maybe I was a bit too tired. Still, I made those two worry about me for nothing. I was really out of my stride today for some reason. I should apologize for sleeping as well. It's not that I usually do something like that... Wait... Then why do I have the feeling that there was someone who sleeps in class. If it isn't me, then who...?"

As he was thinking, his pants went further up his legs, as they now reached the middle of his thighs, losing their pockets in the process. They once again darkened, as they were almost dark-blue as well. His face changed further as well as his ears and nose grew smaller while his eyes became bigger as well. Lastly, his figure was also nearly done, as together with a little more mass being transferred from his narrow waist to his hips and butt, there was little to be done before it would be finished.

Sasmine and Hindy on the other hand were meanwhile discussing their plans and ideas for the tournament.

"So, do you think we should dress differently for the event?"

"Maybe. I mean, a bit of diversity wouldn't be bad at all. It's just that it comes down to whether the teachers accept it or not. And since Crowler's vote is the most important, I highly doubt it will happen."

"Yeah, good point... But it's okay. It's not like dressing up nicely it's the only way to draw attention. We just need to show them our awesome Dueling skills!"

"Yeah! And with Mr Instructor on our side, we would surely have a chance to make a great first impression on the newcomers too.", joked Hindy as both exchanged a small laugh.

The two were almost ready to integrate into their new roles, their previous memories already being gone. Whatever previous even he had with Zane before the academy was now gone for Sasmine, but strangely enough, both of them now remembered that they actually knew each other by the time they attended the school, as well as meeting Aldeis too.

Their faces finished changing, with their lips plumping, their cheekbones growing higher and their eyes changing color to gray for Sasmine and an olive color for Hindy. Their underwear also changed more, as their legs were almost gone as Sasmine's blue lines became more visible and bigger, while Hindy's were starting to gain a pinkish hue.
123321121112211211112121211121111.title: To the dorm

1233211211122112111121212111211111.content:
"By the way...", said Sasmine a bit louder, breaking the silence and drawing Aldeis' attention. "Are you feeling better? Do you still feel out of it like this morning?"

Aldeis wanted to comment on that statement, but instead he was starting to think on the meaning of his words. As he did, Sparkman became Cyber Angel Idaten, insdie his Deck. At this point, most of the cards he had became completely different than they were before, and if he would open his case and take a look at the cards, he would see how his Deck was starting to resemble the Deck of someone he knew. There still were some cards which didn't change such as Polymerization, but right now, only a part of his cards were making sense with the current build.

"... I guess I am. Sorry of I scared you this morning... You seemed to act a slightly different to me as well..."

"Really? Huh... We never noticed... But I guess we did what we did because we were a bit concerned with you."

"Most likely. I mean, I suppose we aren't that persistent at talking with you like that... Even if we forgot to go with you to the bathroom..."

"Oh, right... Sorry about that. We thought you would follow us so I didn't pay that much attention... Maybe we should have woken you up at the start of the recess."

"It's okay. I don't mind that. I just hope the teacher didn't get too mad."

"Well, he kind of frowned a bit upon noticing you asleep, but I am sure he didn't get mad or anything. I think he just assumed you were tired. I mean, you never actually do that."

"Yeah, besides you aren't like those Slifers who sleep all the time. Even a few of the Ra students began doing it at some classes."

While they were talking, their hair changed again. Aldeis got a few bangs covering most of his forhead as it grew once again longer, stopping at about his mid-back, as the color once again lightened, to a dark blond color. As for his friends, their haircuts were now done. Hindy not had a poofy hairdo with a few bangs being a bit frizzy and spiky in the front, right above his forehead and the hair I the ponytail was a bit spiky and wild as the color became an ashen gray. As for Sasmine, his mane was now fully brown with multiple spikes pointing downwards and two strands standing upwards a little on top of his head.

As for their clothes, the collar and chest line that were on Aldeis' top fully became blue while the underwear his friends were completely lost their legs and softened further until they became two pairs of panties: white with blue stripes for Sasmine and pink for Hindy.

This once again happened beneath everyone's radar, as none noticed anything. As for Aldeis, the thoughts he was having before his friends were now attributed to how they reacted to his tiredness rather than acting differently than their usual personalities. But there was something else that was now on his mind.

"C'mon. Don't be like that Sasmine. You know that not all lessons are that exciting as the ones we had today. In some the teacher only talk too. It's really not that surprising."

"Maybe. But still, it is really dumb to do it. I mean, an angry teacher is the last thing anyone should want. Syrus and Hasselberry too, need to stop doing that. They just act like they shouldn't care... even if Ra is the dorm where they put knowledge above everything.", huffed Sasmine with Hindy nodding in affirmation, and Aldeis simply sighing.

As things were right now, the two boys no longer considered themselves to be the ones they were at the start of the transformation, as their minds were now completely integrated in their new characters.
1233211211122112111121212111211111.title: They talk for a bit

12332112111221121111212121112111111.content:
As they reached the Obelisk Blue dorm, Jaden's, Syrus's and Hasslebery's continuing transformations into Alexis, Jasmine and Mindy paused for a few moments.

While their transformations are on pause, there is an important question to be answered: what has happened to the real Alexis, Jasmine and Mindy?



Option 1: While Jaden, Syrus and Hassleberry have been slowly transforming into Alexis, Jasmine and Mindy, then Alexis, Jasmine and Mindy has been slowly transforming into Jaden, Syrus and Hassleberry! (So as not to have three pairs of twins running around.)

Option 2: Err........ okay; I can't come up with anything else...... This is a free choice.

131.content:
It was a seemingly normal day, and Yusei was currently working on his Duel Runner in the garage. Crow was out on deliveries, and Jack was elsewhere, most likely at his favorite coffee place, leaving Yusei the only one in their home.

As he was working, he heard the sound of the door opening. "Yusei? Are you here?" he could Akiza ask as she entered.

"Yes, I'm here. I'm just working on my Duel Runner." he replied.

"Jack and Crow aren't here?"

"No. Crow is working, and I don't know where Jack is." he said as he stood up and walked over to her.

"I see. By the way, I found this strange card on the way here." Akiza said as she held out the blank card.

"Its blank?"

"Yeah. I just found it on the ground and picked it up and figured that I'd show it to you." she explained. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

131211.content:
The card emitted a massive flash of light, robbing Yusei and Akiza of both their senses and strength. Akiza's knees buckled underneath her and she fell to the floor where she stood, but Yusei stumbled backwards, knocking over a can of Duel Runner engine oil. He slipped on the frictionless liquid, causing him to fall flat on his face, sending him straight into a dreamless sleep. Nether of the two felt or even realised the changes that their bodies were currently going through.....


Yusei stired from his faceplant induced knockout not fully awake yet, despite all the tingling in his nerves and muscles. "Grah.....my head...god, my whole body hurts...." were his first coherent thoughts.
After enough of his senses had returned to him, he immediately realised something was amiss. "Okay, that's freaky. Why do I feel like I have three extra limbs? Or am I still half asleep... he thought with well placed concern. He went to rise up, but the sound of something clattering around behind him caught his attention. He turned his head to look behind him, but what he saw shocked him fully awake.

"......WHAT THE?!" There, extending form where his spine connected with his pelvis, was a thin, white dragonesque tail, very similar to the tail of Stardust Dragon- hell, it looked exactly like it!

131331112222221.content:
As the flash of light died down and his vision cleared, Yusei instantly noticed that his location had changed. No longer in his garage, he now appeared to be in an office, sitting at a desk. "What happened? And how did I get here?" he question out loud.

Getting up from the desk, he couldn't help but geel that something felt odd. Looking down, he saw exactly what it was. His clothes had changed, and he was no longer in his usual attire. He was now wearing a white blouse and white skirt and a gray-blue jacket that ended in the front abdomen above a brown belt, but fell past his new skirt in the back. He also wore a pair of brown heels and he though he couldn't see it, his crimal mark was gone, and in his ears were blue dangle earrings. He immediately recognized what he now wore as the clothes of his friend and Jack's old secretary, Mina Simington who worked as for Sector Security as the Chief of Special Investigations.

"Just what is going on here?" he questioned out loud.

131331112222222221.content:
As the flash of light died down and his vision cleared, Yusei instantly noticed that he was in a whole new location. No longer in his garage, he saw that he was now in what appeared to be a very luxurious hotel room. "What happened? How'd I get here?" he questioned out loud, though since he appeared to be alone, he received no answer. "And just where is here, anyway?" he said. As he turned his head, he saw that behind him was a larger window. And looking out of it, he discovered that he was definitely no longer in New Domino anymore, as he saw what was unmistakably the Eifel Tower! "How did I end up in Paris?" he questioned wth surprise.

As he looked ut the window, he noticed something odd about his reflection in the glass. His marker wasn't there, and it looked like he had make up on his face, as well as a teardrop shaped piece of jewlery on his forehead. He also saw that what he could see of his refection below the neck seemed off, so he backed up a bit and took a look downward, and was met with a second surprise. He was dressed completely different, and now wore a red spaghetti strap shirt and a long white skirt that was wraped so that it showed of part of his legs in the front. On his feet were a pair of silver 4 inch stiletto heels, and on his arms were a pair of white elbow length gloves.

"Just whats going on here?"
131331112222222221.title: Misty

1313311122222222212.content:
As Yusei thought about what had happened, he heard the door open, and turned to see a man in a suit enter, and saw Yusei by the window. Before Yusei could say anything about the situation, he man had already began soeaking to him. "Ah, here you are, Misty." he greeted him as he approached himBe.

'Did he just call me Misty?' Yusei thought in confusion.

"You're looking beautiful, as always. But thats to be expected of Misty Tredwell." he said to Yusei. "I just wanted to let you know that its almost time for the photo shoot today, so we need to get going soon."

'He thinks I'm Misty?' Yusei thought to himself. He knew Misty Tredwell, of course. She was currently one of the world's top fashion models and also a friend and aquaintance of his. Luna was also a fan of hers. She kept in contact with Akiza and Carly regularly through postcards and such, so he knew that she had been in Paris for a while. But this was still so strange. Somehow, he had seemingly switched places with her; and he was now somehow living her life, though he was still himself physically. 'It must have been that card...'

"Are you ready, Misty?" the man asked.

'I guess I should go along with things for now.' he thought to himself. Misty was a friend, and he didn't want to mess up her life. "Yes." Yusei told the man.

"Great. The limo is waiting for you by the hotel's entrance." he said as he headed out o the room with Yusei following. And though Yusei didn't seem to notice it at the moment, he now appeared to be walking with a new, and more feminine gait. He was now unconciously walking the same way that Misty did.
1313311122222222212.title: Misty's manager comes in, telling him to ge...

13133111222222222121.content:
Yusei followed Misty's manager outside, where as he had said, a limousine was waiting by the hotel entrance for him. As he approached it, a man standing near the lim opened one of the doors near the back for him.

"Thank you." Yusei said to the driver.

"Its no trouble at all Ms. Tredwell." the driver replied. Yusei couldn't help but feel weird being addressed as such.

Yusei entered into the Limo and the driver closed the door behind him as he took a seat, while the manager and driver sat up front, leaving him to himself for now. Not that Yusei minded. He wanted to be alone for a bit so that he could think about his situation. This whole situation was just so strange. Even stranger than any of the other weird events that had happened to him in the past. Here he was, now somehow living the life of another, and a female at that. And even though he was clearly male, as a quick inspection confirmed, people still seemed to believe that he was a woman. His physical features hadn't beem changed in the slightest, and yet here he was, with people still believing he was Misty. And if he was here living Misty's life, then where was Misty? Was she back in New Domino City, similarly living his life in his place? And if so, was she as confused as he was?

He also couldn't help but notice the bilboards and other such advertisements as the limo drove through the streets of Paris. Advertisements featuring Misty were very common, and he had seen more than a few of them in New Domino City. But just like he seemed to have replace Misty in her life, he had also replaced her in the pictures on the bilboards. He recognized several as ones he had seen before, only with him in Misty's place, and in the same poses. Even his facial expression in the pictures mirrored the ones Misty had when he had seen them. He really had somehow replaced Misty as her. This also reminded him that he was now a fashion model for as long as he was Misty. He didn't know how he was going to get through all of this. And it was strange, as though he still looked like himself, he was still somehow considered a very beautiful woman.

Everything about all of this was just so sureal and strange.
13133111222222222121.title: On the way there

choices: He says that he has a call from a "Yusei Fudo"
He has the clothes that Yusei will model for the photo shoot
131331112222222221211.content:
After a while, the limosine pulled up in front of a building, and the driver got out and opened the door for Yusei. "We're here, Ms. Tredwell." he said. Getting out, he followed Misty's manager inside to what was Misty's private dressing room.

"Just wait here until we're ready for you, Misty." he said, and Yusei agreed and entered the room.

Inside, it looked like one would expect. The decor was very high class, and there was a vanity and even a sofa to relax on. There was also a set of full length mirrors for someone to see themselves from different angles. Walking over to them, this was the first chance he had to get a full look at himself. He still found this all so strange.

As he looked at himself in the mirror, his keen eye for details instantly picked up on something strange: His posture was different. Instead of how he would usually stand, it seemed more... elegant, graceful, and feminine. Deciding to test something, he walked away from the mirror, then turned around and walked towards it one more. He watched as the steps he took were graceful, with one foot in front of the other, and his hips swung with each step. He wasn't putting any thought into the actions, just walking forward. His actions were completely unconcious, like he was used to walking this way and it was a force of habit. Yusei sighed. "I guess I somehow acquired some of her mannerisms as well, and they've replaced my own."

A few minutes later, there was a knock at the door, and Misty's manager announced it was him, and Yusei gave him permission to enter.
131331112222222221211.title: The limo arrives at the photo shoot

choices: Yes, but they can't seem to get it to work again
No, it seemed to have disappeared when Yusei and Misty swapped lives
1313311122222222212111.content:
"Ah, excuse me Misty, I'd hate to bother you, but theres a call for you from a friend of yours by the name of 'Yusei Fudo.'" Misty's manager said as he held out the phone.

"'Yusei?'" he questioned, and the man nodded in confirmation. "Thank you. I'll take this." he said as he took the phone from the man. After handing it to him, he left the dressing room, leaving Yusei alone once more. After he was gone, Yusei put the phine to his ear. "Hello?"

"Hello.'" a familiar female voice replied. "I wanted to know if anything... strange, has happened to you recently, 'Misty.'"

"So you really did replace me, Misty." Yusei said.

"So you're aware of whats going on as well, Yusei." Misty replied. "Yes, I suppose I did. Though I am more than a bit confused by the circumstances that lead up to switching places with you."

"I'm just as confused. I take it everyone believes that you are me like they now seem to think that I'm you?"

"Not everyone." Misty replied. "Akiza is also aware of what seems to be going on. Everyone else though believes that I am you."

"So Akiza is aware as well?" Yusei asked. "I have do have an idea about how all this might have happened."

"The card, right? Yes, she told me about it and we came to the same conclusion." Misty said.

"Do you two still have it?"
1313311122222222212111.title: He says that he has a call from a "Yusei Fudo"

choices: The manager returns with the clothes that Yusei will model for the photo shoot
Switch to New Domino, and follow Akiza and Misty
13133111222222222121112.content:
"Unfotunately, no." Misty replied."It seems to have disappeared when we were apparently switched." Yusei frowned at that. "Perhaps it might have gone with you?"

"Thats possible. It might be back at the hotel. I didn't get much of a chance to look before I had to leave." Yusei said. "However, theres also the possibility that it didn't and just ended up somewhere else entirely."

"I'd rather not think about that." Misty said with a shiver. "That card is our only clue. Without it, why might not be able to return to normal."

"Yes, that would be bad." Yusei agreed.

"I agree. I mean no disrespect to you, but I'd rather not be forced to live as you for the rest of our lives."

"Its all right. I do agree." Yusei said.

"So, how have things been for you?" Misty asked.

Yusei heaved sigh before he replied. "Well, I've been just going along with things. I'm not too thrilled with this situation, but I didn't want to ruin anything for you. As you probably know, right now I'm at one of your photo shoots."

"You're too kind, Yusei. Thank you for your consideration." Misty said. "I am sorry about this. But please bare with it for now."

"I'll try." he said with another sigh. "Anyway, for now, you should both keep an eye out in New Domino City for the card. If I can't find it back in the hotel, theres no telling where it could have ended up."

"Yes I agree. And you do the same in Paris, for now. Though I want to let you know something else. In a month, I was scheduled to finally return home to New Domino City. After all, I've been rather homesick lately. Of course, I never thought I'd come home like this."

"Okay."Yusei replied. "For now, though we might not like it, we'll just have to pretend to be one another."

"Agrred. We'll call if we find anything about the card." Misty said.

"I'll see you later." Yusei said, and they both hung up.
13133111222222222121112.title: No, it seemed to have disappeared when Yusei an...

choices: Yusei gets dressed in the next outfit
131331112222222221211121.content:
Not long after he hung up, there was a knock at the door once again. "Misty, its me again. We're almost ready for you." the manager annouced his presence. "We've brought everything you need to wear for todays shoot."

"Come in." Yusei said.

At that, the door opened, and the manager entered once more, and was followed by a woman who wheeled in a rack with several outfits hanging on it, and a few boxes on its bottom.

"I'll be waiting right outside once you're ready and I'll show you the room where everyone is waiting." he told Yusei before exitting with the woman.

Undressing out out of his current attire, he stripped down and saw he was wearing a pair of lacy panties and a matching bra that seemed to fit him perfectly despite his flat, male chest and having nothing to support, as if it had been made specifiaclly for him. He then slipped off the high heels and neatly folded the clothes he had taken off. He then headed over to the clothing rack. Everything had a number on it, so it was easy to figure out what they wanted him to wear first. The first was a simple black spaghetti strap dress that would give people a good look at cleavage if he had any breasts to begin with. To go with it, there was a pair of matching black heels and white stockings. With a sigh, he reluctantly put everything on. Everything fit him perfectly, though he wasn't surprised at this point. Once done, he exittid the room. "I'm all set." Yusei said.

"Great, follow me." And the two of them walked a few doors down. Entering, he saw a few people, lights, and a white backdrop all set up.

"Misty! Its lovely to see you again. Its always a pleasure working with you." a man greeted Yusei as he entered the room. "Anyway, lets get this show started! You know what to do from here."

Yusei walked over to the backdrop, thinking about what he was going to do now. As he was worried about what to do next, he suddenly realized that he knew exactly what he was doing, and everything he was supposed to do. As if he had been doing this his entire life, he put one foot directly forrward in front of the other, and put one hand on his hip and smiled for the camera. The photographer then took a picture of it, and Yusei switched to another pose as he bent over slightly and brought his hand up to his hair to brush a lock out of his face. After the photographer took a picture of that pose, he switched to a pose where he stood to the side, but turned his head to face the camera.

Pose after pose, he seemed to find every action natual, and he beyond the poses, he also knew many other aspects of the modelling world, such as various fashions. Afraid of what this meant, he thought about how Duel Runners worked, and various other mechanical and technoloical things. While he had once been very gifted in those fields, none of it was making any sense to him at the moment. 'So on top of her mannerisms, I've also got her talents, skills and knowledge pertaing to them. And as for my own...'

After a while, he was done. "Thats all we need for this outfit, Misty. You did great as always!' the photographer said.

"Thank you." Yusei replied, still uncomfortable about this situation.
131331112222222221211121.title: The manager returns with the clothes that Yusei...

choices: The card isn't in the room
Yusei finds the card, and then calls Misty and Akiza to let them know
1313311122222222212111211.content:
Heading back to the dressing room, Yusei entered and walked over to the clothing rack and undressed. He hung the black dress up, and looked for what they wanted him to wear next.

Once he found it, he began putting it on. It was a yellow, floral print sundress, and a white sun hat to go with it. He then slipped on a pair of shoes with a low heel to complete the ensemble. Once he had several photos taken in that, he returned to to the dressing room, and this time put on a red cocktail dress and a pair of white gloves, and a matching pair of red heels. After that, a lght blue evening gown was used in the next photos. After that, he was on his final outfit, which was a white halterneck dress.

During each photos, he continued to pose perfectly, all the while thinking about how strange this was. He had seen himself in the mirrors in the dressing room, and he thought he had looked ridiculous in each outfit. And yet, other people seemed to think he looked beautiful, as he had overheard a few males whisper to each other how attractive they thought he was.

Once he had finished the last set, he returned to the dressing room, and undressed once more before putting on the clothes he had came here in. Once dressed, he exitted the dressing room to find the manager waiting outside for him.

"You did great today, Misty. But thats to be expected of the world's top model." he complimented. "Are you ready to go?"

"Yes, I'm ready." Yusei said, and with that, they returned to the limo, and it drove back to the hotel. Once he got back, he began to search everywhere in the fancy and luxurious room he was staying in for the card that had put him in this situation.
1313311122222222212111211.title: Yusei gets dressed in the next outfit

choices: He heads out and searches for the card
He stays in and relaxes for the night
13133111222222222121112111.content:
Searching every in and every corner of the hotel room, the only cards he found were Misty's own Reptilianne deck. After an hour of searching, he had covered everywhere, and the card that had put him in this situation was nowhere to be found in here. Yusei sighed in frustration at this.

Looking outside, he thought that it could be out in Paris somewhere. He could get to searching today. On the other hand, it was getting late, so he could just stay in for now and relax, and would start searching tomorrow. After a bit of thought, he made his decision.
13133111222222222121112111.title: The card isn't in the room

choices: He wakes up next morning, and has also aquired a bit of Misty's personality
131331112222222221211121112.content:
Deciding he was getting pretty tired, he decided that he was gonna stay in for now and start searching tomorrow. Sitting back in a chair, he laid out Misty's Reptilianne deck on a table in front of him and decided to take a look through it. Like with the other skills and knowledge he had acquired from Misty in exchange for some of his own, he found he knew all of the cards inside of it, and all of its strategies and combos, and like with others, he had trouble remembering the contents of his own deck. All he could recall of his cards were his most commonly used ones, such as Stardust Dragon, Junk Warrior, and the ones that anyone could tell you were the ones he was known for. He felt bad that he couldn't recall his trusted deck.

After a while, he saw that it was getting late, and decided to take a shower before heading to bed. Once he undressed, headed into the bathroom, and then into the shower. Once done, he stepped out and dried off, then wrapped the towel around his chest seemongly instictively, only realizing after he had done so. He then saw a feminine pae green bathrobe hanging nearby and put that on instead.

Looking around for the bedroom, he entered and searched for something to wear. Only finding lacy panties in her drawers, he reluctantly slipped into them on. After that he found a green nightgown, and similiarly put that on. He then sat in the bed, and laid down, ans it didn't take long for him to fall asleep.
131331112222222221211121112.title: He stays in and relaxes for the night

choices: He goes for a walk around Paris to look for the card
He takes Misty's car for a drive around Paris as he looks for the card
1313311122222222212111211122.content:
The next morning, Yusei awoke with a yawn. Getting out of bed, he felt a bit different today, though he couldn't place why. Brushing the thought off for now, he stepped into a pair slippers near the bed, and headed out to kitchen. Looking around, he spotted a fancy kettle, and decided that he would make some tea. Once done, he enjoyed a cup.

He then went back into the room and took off the nightgown he had slept in. He then put on a matching lace bra and panty set. Then he looked through his clothing for something to wear... Wait, no, this was all Misty's clothing, not his. He wondered why he had briefly thought of them as his own. Resuming looking for something to wear, he settled on a light green dress. And after that, slipped on a white cardigan, and then slipped his feet into a pair of green heels. Once dressed, he took a look at himself in the mirror, but felt something was missing, and took a seat at the vanity. Noticing the makeup, without giving it much thought, he began to expertly apply a foundation, followed by some blush, eye liner and mascara, and some lipgloss. Once done, he admired his handiwork for a moment before he realized what had happened.

With all the other skills that he had gained from Misty, he wasn't surprised how he had known how to apply the makeup. What did surprise him though was why he had done it. He had thought he would look better with it, and from there, he just started aplying it all. Even now after he had regained himself a bit, he still thought that he did indeed look better with the makeup. He also did like what he was wearing, which at the time, he hadn't given much thought to putting on, but realized that did like the way he looked. He even had to stop himself from doing a spin so he could see the back. "Am I starting to get a bit of Misty's personality as well?" he wondered aloud. This was even more of a reason that he had to find a way to return to normal.
1313311122222222212111211122.title: He wakes up next morning, and has also aquired ...

13133111222222222121112111222.content:
Yusei knew that he needed to move quickly, but at this point he was pretty stumped as to where he should look. Since the card was not in his room or back at the garage, he didn't really know where else he should search. And there was no call from Misty or Akiza, which meant they didn't find it either. But given he swapped places with Misty specifically, that gave him an idea.

"Maybe I should look at the places Misty usually goes. It's not much, but it is more plausible it would be somewhere she would be familiar with. I doubt it would have ended in a random place in this massive city." It wasn't much, but it definitely would beat searching every nook and cranny of Paris. Not to mention that it wouldn't really make sense for it to be in an unrelated location to either of the people affected. But there was another problem. "Misty is a renowned celebrity though, and I doubt I will have time to look around if I am going to have to deal with her fans. But I don't want to take the limo, it would be too strange to ask the driver to take me everywhere I should go. Maybe I could take her own car and be on my own for a bit to clear my head... I guess this is one of the drawbacks of being famous. I wonder if other models go through this as well." Yusei spoke those words almost like it came from his experience, although he knew that it was once again because his and his friend's personalities were overlapping once again.

Shaking his head, Yusei got out of his room and began going downstairs for breakfast. On the way, his phone vibrated from inside the green designer pursed he took with him. Pulling it out, he saw that his manager told him that he would be free today, but the designers would leave some swimsuits to try out for tomorrow's summer shoot. This made him sigh a little in relief remembering the many dresses he had to wear the previous day. "At least now I have more time to look around. It sure is brutal being a model..."

As he was having a light breakfast, Yusei couldn't shake off the weird feeling that persisted ever since he woke up. His body simply felt a little odd, and he couldn't tell why. He looked at himself several times already, but there were no visible changes that would indicate something was different. While there were no physical changes, Yusei noticed his mannerisms were becoming more womanly, from his smaller bites and slower chewing speed to his eating preferences, the usual full breakfasts he usually being replaced with a only a fruit salad.

After finishing eating, he went down to the main lobby to talk with the receptionist. Upon seeing him, they greeted him with a smile.

"Good morning Ms Tredwell, you must be here for your car, aren't you?"

"Yes, I decided I should take a drive around the city... But how did you know?"

"Your manager already told us you would be free today, and normally you would go to you favorite relaxation spots on your own to cool down a little after long days of work."

"Thanks you... Say, can you give me the addresses of some of these places... The GPS didn't work too well recently, and I don't really know the streets too well..."

"But of course. Even I get lost times. It takes to time to memorize all the roads, and without the GPS it could get a bit tricky at times. Please wait a moment."

After thanking the receptionist, he finally went outside to see a vintage and elegant white car being brought by the valet. It certainly suited Misty quite well as even the interior was really nice without looking tacky. As he walked, he once again noticed the swaying of his hips, which made him groan a little inwardly. "I can't seem to stop doing that... I can't stop acting like Misty and everything feels more natural by the minute I need to find the card fast." Once Yusei thanked the valet, he got inside the car and began going on the main road.

In the meantime, the card continued working its magic on Yusei and Misty, continuing to shift their minds to fit the other's place. And with the changes progressing smoothly, it could now begin its next phase. After all, they couldn't fit their new positions by only switching their lives and habits.
13133111222222222121112111222.title: He takes Misty's car for a drive around Par...

131331112222222221211121112221.content:
"Okay, so the on the list there were several shops, a café, a restaurant, a spa, an art gallery... There sure are a lot of places Misty frequented, although these might just be the whole list of the places she went to rather than her usual hang-out spots. I am still surprised the guy at the hotel just told me all of these places like I didn't know them even if supposedly I should. He even gave me a description of the places... Maybe whatever that card did made a slip somewhere down the line, or maybe it made whoever thinks I am Misty to give me info on what I don't know...", mused Yusei as he continued to drive. It felt a little odd to be behind the wheel of a regular car instead of a D-Wheel, but he couldn't really complain right now.

As he thought of where exactly he should go, his body began changing to accommodate Misty's role. His muscles tingled as they were slowly losing their definition. Before, he had quite a toned figure and he was considered to be in the same group as Jack and Crow, if he were to believe Leo's words. But now, his frame was diminishing rapidly and his muscle mass was gradually withering away.

"I think I should go and check out a few of the shops first... It's not much, but I doubt it would be at an art gallery or a restaurant when they are so many people around. If it happened in public, it should have affected more people, and perhaps Akiza may have had some immunity since she was a Signer and only I got hit because I was the one holding the card... I may be looking too deep into this, but if this would have happened in a changing room, it would sound more plausible... Maybe I should head to the one she frequents the most."

He put on the address on the GPS, without noticing his hand slimming down as he did that, and then followed the direction to reach the destination. As he continued to drive, he tapped his fingers on the steering wheel, his fingers growing longer and daintier while he gained a manicure. Yusei looked at the window, admiring the architecture of the city, and the various shops that were right next to the street.

"It is a shame that I can't really have the luxury to go and look around town for a bit. I could check out some of the stores Sherry went to buy parts for her D-Wheel... and maybe look at where she bought some of her dresses..." The last part he thought once again made Yusei sigh, as the feminine parts of his mind were once again working against him. However he didn't bothered him as much as before, getting used a little to these impulses. He didn't know that this was a sign he was getting used to another lifestyle entirely.

His body continued to vibrate without his notice until his frame became thin and lithe, with his arms and legs looking a lot slimmer than before. The yellow streaks from his hair also disappeared, leaving it pure black. As for his mind, the elements of Misty's life were overshadowing his own, but in the process, some of the earlier memories of his past such as his childhood living in Satellite were slowly being erased.
131331112222222221211121112221.title: On the road

1313311122222222212111211122211.content:
After a peaceful ten minute drive and passing through the Champs Elysees Boulevard, where Yusei couldn't help but be slightly mesmerized of the various shops on the street for a few seconds, before groaning inwardly at letting Misty's tendencies take over again, he reached his first destination. It was a small, discrete shop that was at the edge of the boulevard, in a more secluded area, but judging from the elegant exterior of the building, he assumed it was one of the more expensive shops.

"This has to be it, right? "L'allure de diamants"... It looks fancy, but nothing too gaudy by the looks of it.", noted Yusei as he stepped out of the car. He once again noticed his feminine walk, which at this point felt almost natural, and thus decided to simply ignore it for now. What he didn't know was that his feet became as petite as his hands, fitting better into his footwear while his calves slimmed down and became a lot curvier too. While they maintained a level of athleticism, they now looked a lot more feminine than before.

Upon entering the shop, Yusei was immediately taken aback. Not only did the place looked bigger on the inside, but there was a lot of variety in what was on display. Dresses, cardigans, blouses, jackets, skirts and even underwear and swimsuits. This place was a lot more packed than he thought it would be, the clothing options definitely outclassing the stores in Satellite. As for the customers, there weren't that many women around, but he noted that all of them were dressed rather stylishly.

"Oh Miss Tredwell, I wasn't expected you so early in the morning." Yusei turned to see a young woman in her twenties with brown eyes and short black hair styled in a bob cut coming up to him. Her friendly smile and casual approach made her look like she was one of Misty's acquaintances than only a mere clerk. To prove that, he already knew her name.

"Hello Annette. Sorry if I dropped unannounced, but I wanted to ask you a favour."

"Please go ahead Ms Tredwell, tell me what are you here for. Is it a new sundress? We still haven't brought the model you asked for, but we did receive some new ones which might interest you. And I can assure you, all of them highlight your skin perfectly, just as you would want from a summer dress."

Yusei's skin tone lightened as it also became hairless and softer. He took note that it belt a bit colder now that his body was hair-free but paid really no mind to it as he replied back to Annette. "Thanks, but it's not that. I was wondering if you found a card here since the last time I came over."

"A card? As in a Dueling card? Did you by any chance dropped it here?"

"I am not sure. That's why I wanted to ask if you or someone else found it."

"Hmm... I have to ask if someone saw a card or not. Please wait a few minutes until I return."

"Thanks Annette. I appreciate it."

"Don't mention it. In the meantime, look around if something catches your eye. We have plenty of new clothes brought in and perhaps you might see something you like."

Yusei nodded and let the young woman leave to ask her colleagues. He wanted to tell her a bit more about the card itself, but for some reason the details of it were getting a bit cloudy in his head. He brushed it off with him thinking that it's just him being tired from acting like Misty, unaware that his mind was being reworked.
1313311122222222212111211122211.title: Reaching the store

13133111222222222121112111222111.content:
"I should look around a little... Akiza might like a few of the clothes that are here maybe I can ask Misty to help me buy something for her when all of this is over.", thought Yusei as he began looking around.

The shop certainly had diversity as a key quality. Yusei didn't often frequent clothing stores in the past, as he never thought of changing his wardrobe too often and if he really needed, he could ask Jack for some tips, given his former expensive way of living, which unfortunately transitioned into the current one. As for women's clothes, he had almost no experience in that department. Sally didn't bother going to anywhere else but at second-hand stores, which while the prices were smaller than usual, he couldn't really call hat they had on display as "high-quality". This time however, he could tell that the dresses, shirts and so on were made with the utmost care and used rare or expensive materials to be made. He would normally feel very lost in such circumstances, but for once, he had to thank for having Misty's experience, as he could better tell the value of the designer clothes than ever before.

After a few minutes of searching, his gaze fell onto a red off-the-shoulder silk dress that covered the chest, but revealed a bit of the back. Yusei had to admit, even if he wasn't a fashionista, it still looked really good. "This really looks something Akiza might like. It is a bit fancier than what she usually has, but I can see putting this on for special occasions. It even has the same color as her hair and is not too revealing. I am sure it's expensive, but I think I can ask Misty to split the bill if possible. I have some money at home saved for more spare parts, but I think there's enough for my share..." He began to move towards towards the rack to examine it further, but the second he did, his vision became a little blurry.

He needed a few moments to regain his bearings because as quickly as it came, his sight came back to normal just as fast. "What was that? Did something get in my eyes? I don't... Huh?" Yusei was a little confused when he saw that the dress he picked up wasn't red, but rather green, unaware that the shade of his irises changed into a lighter shade of blue. "There was a green one too? I haven't noticed it before... Well, maybe I should put it back, this color doesn't suit Akiza that well. Although... It still looks pretty..."

There was something that made Yusei not want to put down the dress, as he continued to look at it and touch the soft texture in his smaller hand, almost like he was in a trance. A small voice in his head told him: "You should try it on and see if it suits you.", but he was reluctant to do so. But even if he was a man, everyone around him still thought of him as being a woman, so would it really be that wrong for him to wear it, especially after the photoshoots? He had to admit that the voice was right in a way, but he didn't want to change into other clothes again, remembering the embarrassment from before.

At the same time, his earlier memories of his life in Satellite shifted with him no longer living on the streets, but in a spacious suite without any major hardships happening in his childhood and he grew a vague sense of brotherhood with a figure which didn't resemble Jack or Crow, but the bond between him and said boy seemed to be more familial... His now fully back hair, which no longer had any of his yellow highlights began to flatten out, the previously unique hairstyle changing to a more normal one as it also began to grow.

He was snapped out of his trance when he heard a ringing sound from his purse. Putting the dress back on the rack, he picked up the phone to see who it was.
13133111222222222121112111222111.title: Looking around

131331112222222221211121112221111.content:
He was slightly surprised to see Akiza calling him, but it was nonetheless a pleasant surprise to distract him from the weird thoughts he had a few moments ago. There was also another emotion that began to bud in his heart when her name was brought up, but thinking nothing of it and brushing it off as another impulse, he answered the call.

"Hello. Yusei, are you free right now?"

"Yes, I am Akiza. Did you find the card by any chance?"

"Unfortunately, no. We've looked everywhere, including race track and Leo and Luna's place, but it wasn't anywhere. We've pretty much exhausted the location you could have gone recently before you disappeared, and it wasn't anywhere. It means the card must be there with you."

"If it is, I didn't find it yet. Today however I managed to get some free time to check the places Misty usually goes to. By the way, is she there to help?"

"Not at the moment. Jack and Crow picked her up and took her to practice a few laps. With how everyone is thinking she is you, she didn't really have much time for herself, but I've kept her company and she seems to adjust better by the looks of it. When she first came she was almost overwhelmed, but after I told her about you, she began to get into stride."

"Looks like she's lucky she has you there for her."

"Well, we didn't talk much after she left, but I am happy we caught up. She's surprisingly a pleasant company."

Yusei smiled a little hearing that the two were on much better terms than before. After all that happened with the Dark Signers and clearing up the mess Sayer made in regards to Misty's brother, it was nice to see the two young women finally be friendly with each other, even if the circumstances that they managed to talk with each other again weren't really ideal...

During their talk, Yusei ignored a faint tingle on his face, as it began to morph. His masculine features softened with his eyelashes extending, his nose becoming smaller and his lips plumping up into a natural cupid's kiss. Without noticing, a new question came up in his brain, that he felt an urge to ask.

"And what's your opinion of her?"

"Of Misty? She is in my opinion a great person that I believe is very strong for being able to move on past her inner demons and I am happy I got to know her a bit better. I am really grateful that she forgave me for my mistakes which put her brother in peril and I really wish we could get along..."

His smile grew a bit wider as his cheekbones rose higher on his now feminine face as a small fluttering sensation developed in his chest, as his visage now resembled resembled a certain model's. He didn't know why, but he seemed to value Akiza's opinion a lot more than before for some reason..."I am sure you two are going to get along just fine. You may even become best of friends."

"I hope so. I'll call you back if I find something. Hope you have a great day Yusey."

"You -ahem- too Akiza. Bye." After ending the call, he paused a little. It wasn't how high pitched his voice sounded at the end which threw him off, his Adam's apple receding quite a bit in the process, but the way Akiza addressed him. "Did she pronounce my name a bit differently? No, it could be just my imagination... Although, maybe I should have asked her if Misty was also behaving like me or not... Well she said she was "adjusting", but perhaps it could be that she's used to act out like someone else. Maybe I should call her later and ask her to let Misti on the phone.", thought Yusey to himself as he too pronounced the model's name a bit differently.
131331112222222221211121112221111.title: Akiza

1313311122222222212111211122211111.content:
A few minutes later, Annette returns to Yusey, but upon seeing the small frown on her face, it was obvious what answer she would give him.

"I am sorry Mrs. Tredwell, but we haven't found any card anywhere. Checking the footage on the security camera, we didn't see you drop any card, nor did we find someone turn it up to us ever since you last came here. I apologize for not being able to help you."

"It's okay Annette, I understand. Truth be told, even I am not sure where I dropped it. I just thought this place as one of them."

"Sorry for getting into business that mind not involve me, but what kind of card are you looking for exactly? Is it one from your deck?"

"You... can say that. It is a pretty new addition though."

"I see. But do you have any matches scheduled? I didn't think you had time since you seemed to be very busy lately. I find it a little hard to believe you could have the opportunity to duel so soon after the day you had your shoot. Did your agent finally let the leash loose a little?"

"Uh, not quite, it's just I need to find it as soon as possible..."

During their conversation, Yusey's body changed further, as his slim frame became even smaller as his shoulders rounded out and his waist started to pull in. He also lost a few inches, making him as tall as Annette, if not slightly taller, although some of the height difference could be attributed to his heels. As for his mind, it got a bit cloudier when it came down to remembering about the card that he described. It was obvious that telling the whole story behind it was a sure hit to have the woman in front of him either laugh or look at him suspiciously, but he had quite the bit of trouble giving her even the basic details about it. And yet, he didn't seem nowhere as concerned about finding it as he was before.

"Honestly dear, you should try and convince them to have a break every now and then. I know very well how busy the life of a model is, but it wouldn't be too difficult for them to squeeze in more free days."

"I know, but these last few days have been so hectic and I have scheduled another shoot tomorrow."

"Another reason to ask for a small vacation later on. You said that after that gala the next month things would quiet down a little. Why not take that chance to go and visit that boy?"

"W-What do you mean?"

"You know, the one you said you met a while ago, when you were abroad. I don't remember his name, but you said you wanted to see him again."

Yusey looked at her oddly, as he didn't know what he was talking about. So far, there wasn't anything in Misty's memories about her having a boyfriend, although it could be just Annette jumping to conclusions. And yet, there was an air of excitement that wouldn't go away the more he thought about it. It felt similar to the strange sensation he felt when talking to Akiza, but slightly stronger. He didn't seem bothered by it though.

His waist compressed down to a waspish size as well, making him appear even slimmer than before while at the same time, his pelvis suddenly widened, as his hipbones popped outwards. The clothes which before were tailored to his masculine frame shrunk down together with him, as they began to look more and more normal on his changed body. They also started to feel better on him, the idea of them being something that he would normally wear entering his brain at the same time.
1313311122222222212111211122211111.title: Annette doesn't find the card

13133111222222222121112111222111111.content:
There were a lot of questions Yusey wanted to ask in regards to a potential suitor Misti would have, but he didn't want to rush things and have him ask questions that he should probably know about said person and make Annette suspicious of him. Not to mention that it wasn't really something on top of the priority list right now. Even if he somehow gained some of Misti's feelings about her boyfriend, he thought it would be easy to suppress them, given that so far there wasn't any issue in controlling his emotions.

"We will talk about this later. For now I need to leave and keep searching. I hope you don't mind."

"Not at all Ms Tredwell. I hope by the next time you'll visit us, we would have received your dress."

After a quick goodbye, Yusey left the shop and went to the car, finding his new womanly way of walking more bearable. It still was upsetting he was getting used to shaking his hips so much, but he decided he should ignore it, as it would be too problematic to keep worrying over his mannerisms at this point. He didn't know that the reason he couldn't revert back to the old way he walked was because his pelvis stretched out, making his regular walk a bit uncomfortable before switching to the more feminine stride without him even thinking about it.

Once inside the car, Yusey went to check on the list of places he wrote down. "Hmm... So it's not here... Now that I think about it, Annette said she didn't see me... I mean Misti drop the card on the camera so I doubt it would be in places where the security would have notified my if they found it. I guess that takes the art gallery and the other stores from the equation..."

As he went through the list, Yusey had an increasingly hard time making the difference between himself and Misti, with him thinking he was in her shoes for more than just the small amount of time he did after being transported to Paris. Once again however, he chalked it up to her memories overshadowing his, and didn't thought much about it, unaware that his own memories weren't suppressed, but actually erased. More of his childhood in the slums was replaced with a more comfortable way of living, his younger years now being mostly peaceful and uneventful. There was also the slight nag of him having a sibling, so far it was a pretty subdued feeling.

In the meantime, his hair grew quite a bit, with his now silky black locks reaching below his shoulders. It also became straighter with two longer bangs starting to frame his face and another two lengthening in the front, slowly covering some of his forehead.

"...Could it be at one of the cafés or restaurants? I doubt I could have left it behind there without a waiter noticing... I could try looking at a few of them though, although I don't want to go each and every one of them...Hm?" As he looked down at the paper, he saw that there was an hour marked next to one of the locations as well as a few notes mentioning that he had an appointment there today. "Huh? I don't remember writing this down? Did the receptionist say something about it and I didn't notice?", wondered Yusey to himself as he looked again at the place he had to go.
13133111222222222121112111222111111.title: Leaving

131331112222222221211121112221111112.content:
Yusey's eyebrow rose a little as he saw there was a spa treatment scheduled to him today. How the receptionist knew about it was beyond him. He doubted Misti would just tell someone something like this so causally, but given how friendly he was it wasn't outside the realm of possibility that she might have dropped that information during one of their conversations prior to the switch.

"Odd... But it is one of the places the card could have gone to. And cine it's the only one underlined from the list as well, maybe her muscle memory took over again. Maybe it was there from the start and this would be Misti's way to tell me that?... Well, I don't have anything to lose at this point, so I might as well head there to see if I have any luck...", said Yusey to himself as he put on his belt and began driving. It didn't click to him however that he didn't input any address in GPS as the location of the spa embedded itself into his mind.

The road also seemed more familiar to Yusey as he continued driving, getting more comfortable with being behind the wheel of Misti's car while his experience with driving a D-Wheel gradually vanishing from his head. Meanwhile, his hair continued to grow, getting to his upper back and kept lengthening. Yusey however didn't think there was anything off about it when he briefly gazed at his mane in the mirror. Actually, it seemed to be shorter to him than it should be.

He ignored the view from outside, including many landmarks such as Eiffel Tower which could have been seen in the distance for a few seconds, however as he kept thinking about what Annette said at the end. He didn't seem to mind what potential boyfriend he... no, Misti had, but it seemed like it bothered him quite a bit now. It made him feel something akin to what he felt when he was on the phone with Akiza, but slightly stronger.

"What's up with me? Why did that stick with me?... There wasn't any talk about Misti liking someone when I was modeling. Her manager didn't know or he didn't approve of it?... Still, there wasn't any gossip in any of the tabloid magazines I've read about a potential lover, just some talk of how her perfect partner would be like... But I have a feeling I know who he would resemble..." More of Yusey's mind changed as the feeling of butterflies in his stomach made him blush a little, unaware that his already washboard flat torso started to cave in. His sides pressed inwards, which caused him a bit of discomfort, which he ignored without much thought, as his waist continued to compress down to a waspish size.

"But still... Why do I feel something like that for Akiza too? Am I homesick already and I wish to see her again? Or is it because of something else...?" Yusey was so absorbed by his thoughts that he almost didn't look at the road properly, before widening his eyes and stopping right that second.
131331112222222221211121112221111112.title: A spa

1313311122222222212111211122211111121.content:
Yusey had less than a moment to stop the car when he saw the red light, and fortunately for him, he managed to do so just in time before he could hit a young woman crossing the road. He breathed in relief as he shook his head at the blunder he was about to commit.

"That was way too close... What is with me today? I've been absent-minded almost the entire morning and I've had these weird thoughts too... Am I getting too on edge about this? Nothing bad happened ever since I got here and other than the loaded schedule there wasn't really any problem. Maybe the spa appointment is what I needed after all. Maybe that will calm my head a little.", mused Yusey as he closed his eyes to clear his mind.

He didn't know that by doing this, his worries and confusion over not just today, but the entire time he spent in Paris over his situation to vanish, his anxiety over living someone else's life being replaced with the sensation that there was nothing out of the ordinary with what he has been doing, the idea of him being a model not sounding so ridiculous to him anymore. In addition, the amount of time spent in France seemed to have extended for him, from just a few weeks to almost an entire year, enjoying the fact he got back into modeling after so long. Yisey's memories got a bit murky when he tried to remember what happened before getting to Paris, but figured that whatever the reason was, it had to do most likely with his hiatus. In this time, Yisey's hair finished growing, the black mane reaching his lower back while it styled itself in the front, longer bangs framing his face and covering his ears while the small bangs that grew in the front arranged themselves to come down diagonally before stopping right above his brows, perfectly showing the small blue jewel on his forehead.

After calming down a little, Yisey decided he should just ignore the weirdness for today and to relax a little. It was perhaps one of the few free days he had lately after such a busy schedule in which he could have some time for himself. And if it wasn't tied to the card he had to find, there was no reason to get agitated since he was in no rush to find it, given he was slowly adjusting to his work. Too bad he didn't really remember what the card he had to find was...

As he waited at the light, he looked better around his surroundings for the first time since he jumped in the car, a small smile coming to his features as he say the people enjoying the sunny day. His sight lingered for a few seconds on a family, specifically at the two younger siblings the parents had and how happy they were. It reminded him of the days past, when he was spending time with his brother figure in his vision and also thinking about his desire to start a family one day too. But before he could ask himself where these thoughts were coming from, he spotted something in the corner of his eye.

"That's..." He saw a billboard which featured him as Misty Tredwell once again, but rather than normally seeing his face, he saw Misty's instead, albeit with his own criminal mark on her face. "Does this mean... the spell is being undone? Then maybe things would be solved on their own. I must call Akiza and tell her..." His gaze became unfocused as he clutched his head. Both on his face and on the billboard the jagged criminal mark that marred his features slowly disappeared leaving behind only smooth and healthy skin behind as his gaze refocused. "Strange... That sure came out of nowhere... Perhaps this is a sign I need to unwind.I never thought I was so tired... What did I want to call Akiza? I think it can wait until after the appointment. I feel like it is something important, but if it is urgent she will call me...", said Yisey to herself as she started up the car once she saw the light turn green. "But honestly, they need to change the photo on those billboards. They are starting to get a little old. I could swear I saw myself with a mark on my face... I sure hope it was just my imagination... Even if it was graffiti, it would give the paparazzi all the reason to create make-up stories again..."

As he sighed, he didn't know that his image was as flawless, as it perfectly matched his own look. It seemed however that he didn't realize that he shouldn't have any issue even if he had a mark, given that only he would see something was wrong...
1313311122222222212111211122211111121.title: Red light

13133111222222222121112111222111111211.content:
After another 20 minutes of driving and looking at the Parisian life around him Yisey finally reached the spa, located towards the outskirts of the city center, on a small hill that overlooked the town. The place looked very modern, with a small sign which read "Small Paradise" in French in front of the establishment. Despite being the first time he came here, Yisey felt the place was familiar to him. But rather than chalking it up as another influence from Misty's memory, he actually now believed he visited the place before.

"Okay, I may have arrived a bit earlier than I was scheduled, but this should be fine. I got time to ask about the card I was looking for... Although for some reason I can't really remember what was it called... I know I parted with it some time ago and that this last week was quite hectic, but it is a little strange that I can't recall its name... Still, it's not like I am in a hurry...", said Yisey as he went out of his car, the sense of urgency he had before disappearing completely.

As he strode towards the building, he casually swayed his hips as he walked, no longer questioning the feminine gait at this point as it felt natural for him to walk this way. His wider hips also started to look less bony as they got some mass on them, his underwear feeling better against his privates. Speaking of his panties they continued to morph throughout the day to better fit the physical changes that Yisey went through, but now they started to get a bit tighter around his manhood, starting to show the faint outline of a bulge.

Once inside, he noticed the décor immediately. It looked both fancy and elegant at the same time white and green being the dominant collars, the occasional placement of some plants in the room giving it a "greener" vibe while the light green couches in the waiting room next to some of them perfectly complimented the atmosphere. Walking up to the front desk, he saw two older women who looked to be in their late twenties. One had long black hair that went down to her back while the other had light brown-hair which was neatly styled in a bun. Recognizing the pair, Yisey called out to them as they noticed him.

"Good afternoon Maria, Ingrid. I hope I didn't arrive too early."

"Oh miss Tredwell! Welcome! And of course not, we are happy to welcome you any time!"

"Indeed. This place is always open to one of our most loyal customers such as yourself."

Yisey giggled a little at their reply. They were as friendly as Annette but they still were a bit too formal even now. Sometimes she wished they would address her more causally given that she knew both of them for quite some time, but she assumed it was mostly due to how strict their boss was with them that made them act more professional. He had to remind herself to talk with them and give them an easier time, given they were very good at their jobs... Maybe he could even "borrow" them for a few hours and go out into town with them.

"Still, it is quite rare for you to arrive so early. Did something happen on the way here?"

"No, nothing like that. I actually wanted to ask if you found a card here by some chance?"

The question was a bit unexpected for the two and looked at each other in slight confusion before Ingrid asked: "As in a credit card?"

"No, it's actually a Duel Monster card. I... must've dropped it from my deck somewhere and I was wondering if it was here."

"No, sorry. I don't think I saw anything like that."

"Me neither... Wait. No, I think I found one."

"You did? Where is it?"

"I left it in the back room I'll come right back with it."

As Maria went away, Yisey began getting a little excited on the inside. He was really lucky to have found it already. He should call Akiza and-

"Mmmm!"

Yisey stifled a light moan as he felt his panties tightened around his manhood. The space which was initially left for his manhood was now gone, the underwear pressing against his groin as it started to be pulled inside. The gentle and soft touch of the fabric however distracted him enough, making his thoughts blurry and unfocused. But Ingrid didn't seem to notice any of this, and remained unfazed by his soft groans as they both waited for Maria to come back.
13133111222222222121112111222111111211.title: Reaching the spa

131331112222222221211121112221111112112.content:
Yisey's head was washed with new information and memories which initially were foreign to him, but at the expense of his original ones, the new thoughts started to make more sense to him. He no longer considered himself someone who was poor or lived in the slums as his new history showed him having a regular upscale lifestyle where both his parents were quite wealthy and thus he never had any major hardships in his early years. He received a good education, made many friends at school and despite not playing Duel Monsters too often he quickly grew to enjoy the game at its fullest especially in high school. He expressed mild interest in Speed Duels when he was younger, but found the regular duels to be more comfortable to him and while he still watched those matches on TV, he only enjoyed the ones where the duelists actually put effort in them. He kind of wished he had more time playing, but after being scouted by a modeling agency once he got out of high school, those times became more seldom. He loved his job, but sometimes he wishes he would have a bit more freedom.

During this time, his privates continued to shrink, with his testes slowly burrowing inside of him. Misey knew something was wrong with the way he was feeling but as the new thoughts became less vague, he was having a hard time discerning what exactly was wrong, with only a lack of sleep being the only possible option he could think of at the moment. He didn't have time to ponder however as Maria rushed back to the front desk.

"Sorry if I took too long. I forgot where I put it initially, but luckily I managed to find it. Is this the card you've been looking for Miss Tredwell?"

The tingly feeling wasn't gone entirely but was enough for Misey to pay attention and grab the card Maria showed to him. Looking at it for a few seconds, he was surprised to see that it was...

"Reptilianne Lamia?"

"I found it on the floor near the locker room. Initially I thought it belonged to a member of the staff but none of us play any Reptile Deck before I remembered you leaving in a rush a few hours earlier and I thought it belonged to you. I tried contacting your agency but I didn't manage to get in a direct line with you. Is this yours?"

For a few second Misey wanted to say "no", but with the appearance of the card he was looking for being blurry in his head he wasn't sure. Then a new set of memories appeared in his head which made him reach a conclusion just as the buzzing of his mind and body stopped.

"Yes it is. Thank you for keeping it safe for me."

Picking up the card, she smiled at it before picking up her purse and taking her deck case out. He gently placed it in the box as she made a note to scold her crew for not telling her about someone finding his card, especially now when he had a duel exhibition the following week. Although she was partially to blame as well since she only noticed the card gone just this morning.

"Oh, I remember now. You showed the card to me a few days ago", said Ingrid. "You said someone lost it but I don't know why I didn't think it was Miss Tredwell. Good job for making the correlation Maria."

"Thanks, but it wasn't much."

"It was quite a lot Maria. I have reworking my deck recently so I really appreciate you keeping it for me."

"Haha... It was my pleasure Miss Tredwell."

Lamia wasn't on its own a strong card, but Misey always needed to play strategically when it came down to using the Reptilianne deck. Some burn damage would suffice if it meant dropping more monsters on the field, and Tuners were always good to have out. She was thankful more Reptilianne cards were released recently so strengthen her playstyle. It was a tricky deck, it was hers, and she always liked to challenge herself when dueling others.
131331112222222221211121112221111112112.title: Maria brings a different card

1313311122222222212111211122211111121122.content:
"In any case, should we get started? I don't want to rub you of too much of your time Miss Tredwell."

"Don't worry, you aren't. But I guess we should begin.", nodded Misey as he placed the card in the deck before putting the case back in his purse. He wanted to talk a bit more with Maria and Ingrid, but she supposed this was fine as well. He would be able to talk with them during the treatment anyway.

"Great! Then we will head and make the final preparations until you get ready."

With that, the young women went ahead while Misey headed to the changing room. He was already familiar with the place as his mind felt actually at home, the spa becoming one of the better places to unwind whenever he felt stressed out or simply wanted some time for himself. The price wasn't exactly cheap, but given the service it gave, it was worth every euro. Upon entering the changing room, he gave a small sigh as he observed the empty room. He already knew that the place wouldn't be full today and that he booked himself at an hour clients wouldn't normally come, but being able to lay back a little and not be always preoccupied with the image he had to uphold around the paparazzi made him a little relieved.

He slowly began to take off his clothes, noting how better they felt against his skin than they did in the morning. They also felt like they were a bit ill-fitting as well, but Misey attributed to his tiredness after the long photoshoot the previous day. Once he took the dress off his body, he looked at himself and raised an eyebrow as he noticed a few things. The bra seemed to be oddly loose on his chest, the cups of his undergarment leaving quite the space between itself and his chest, which also felt like it was smaller. As for his panties, while his hips seemed to accommodate him quite well, the butt still was smaller than the size of his underwear. And he also felt something pushing against the fabric in the front leaving a noticeable bulge in them.

"...My body still feels a little strange. It did so all day, but things have started to felt normal after a while... Although I can't help but think that something is still off. Was my chest always so small?... Maybe I'm imagining things... The massage may really be what I need right now after all...", mused Misey as he decided not to think about his appearance anymore as he also stripped of his undergarments. He took a towel from a stack that was on a table right next to the lockers and quickly wrapped it around his body to not grow cold. As he used it to cover up his chest as well, the bulge in the front of the towel seemed to grow even smaller. While Misey didn't consider himself a woman yet, right now he completely ignored the tiny manhood that rested between his legs as if it didn't even existed.

After putting his clothes and purse in the locker, he slowly went out of the room and walked along the corridor. After a few minutes, he finally reached Maria and Ingrid once again, just as they finished setting up the massage table.

"Yes. I am ready to get myself fall pray to your "magic".", said the almost woman with a chuckle to which the girls became a bit flustered at his response, Ingrid managing an answer somehow.

"W-We appreciate your praise. Now let us begin then..."

"Can you call me Misty from now on?", inquired Misey, or rather Misty, to the two girls. Even if the name obviously belonged to a girl while he was still biologically male, he found nothing wrong with it. There was a small voice in his head that said it belonged someone else's but he quickly brushed it away, thinking it belonged to some of his acquaintances that he didn't remember right now.

As for the two masseuses, they looked surprised at the request as they exchanged a glance, before Ingrid attempted to ask back sounding as professional as usual, although a she couldn't get rid of a small stutter.

"W-With all do respect, can I ask why? We are mere employees here, there is no need to call our customers in such an informal way."

"That's the problem. You're more than that to me.", replied Misty, which made the two pause. Even if the massage temporarily stopped, the changes did not, as his hips added some more meat to them, making as inviting as they could possibly be, many models he worked with the past being unable not to feel the tiniest bit jealous of them and his small and fit waist. But there were two more elements he usually that made him the picture of perfection and one of them was slowly beginning to appear as his rear started to expand.

As the duo stood there unsure of what to say, Misty continued: "I've been a customer of this place for almost three years and every time I came here I felt comfortable knowing there are people here that I can talk to like we are friends. You two are ones of the few that never commented on me being famous, asked for autographs or acted like my fans. You two treated me like a normal person and I greatly appreciate that. But whenever I tried to invite you to drink a cop of coffee or to go shopping together, you always refused m, saying you can't. Even now you're talking to me like I am just a customer here."

"B-But Miss, we aren't allowed to-"

"I already talked to your boss about this. He didn't say anything like you two being unable to make friends with the customers. Sure, his rules and kind of strict and I think he should give you two a raise for how much you work, but he is a good man and he has nothing against us keeping in touch. So I want to know the real reason why you always seem to reluctant to take up my invites."

Maria and Ingrid looked at each other, both being more than a little nervous while Misty waited their response. As he did that, he had to slightly move, a small discomfort being felt around his privates. His manhood was a little squashed between his plump thighs and the bed and it was quite uncomfortable even with its smaller size. And once again it shrunk, its size being reduced by half as his head fogged up for a few seconds, thoughts about what gender was he plaguing his mind before he decided to cast them aside for the moment.

After about a minute of silence, Maria finally spoke.

"We... are sorry for our behaviour. We knew you were trying to be nice with us, and yet we refused your attempts to approach us."

"It's okay. It's not as much what you did, but rather why you did it that interests me. You always were so open-minded, so I find it odd you would not want to talk about it."

"Well... the truth is that..."
