153322222221222221.content:
As the bright flash died down and their vision cleared, they each found themselves in a different location, with not all of them being together.

Yusei found himself looking right at a beautiful woman with long brunette hair in a state of undress, wearing only a lacy white bra and matching panties. "I'm sorry." he let out in embarrassment, and watched as the woman's lips moved in perfect unison to his words. Confusion rising and having a bad feeling, he raised his arm and reached forward, and his hand met the solid reflective surface of a mirror as he was afraid of. Even more confused then before, he looked down, but rather than seeing a woman's body, he saw his own male one only wearing the same bra and panties as the woman.

"So only my reflection is different...?" he thought, looking back and forth from the wedding dress he wore and the woman that was now his reflection.

"What the hell is going on here!?" he heard a voice demand beside him, and saw Jack, only he was wearing a white dress and had make up on his face, and a pair of feminine earings in his ears. He was looking into the same mirror as Yusei, which seemed to cover the entire wall. Next to him was Leo, also wearing the same thing as Jack, with the white dress, makeup, and earings. Like Yusei, the image of their reflections in the mirror were replaced by women instead of their own, with Jack's being a blonde woman, and Leo's being a redheaded woman much older than himself.

---

Elsewhere, but in the same building, Akiza was also dressed different, and was confused by her new attire, now wearing a tuxedo instead of her usual victorian-inspired dress. Looking around, she saw Carly standing nearby, also wearing a tuxedo, and was just as confused as she was. They then spotted a mirror, and in it, instead of seeing themselves, they saw a pair of men in their place instead, comletely moving in sync with their actions.

"Uh, whats going on here?" Akiza questioned her.

---

Elsewhere, Crow, Sherry, and Luna were just as confused, and in Crow's case, extremely embarrassed. Crow found himself wearing a white dress that looked to be slightly childish, while Luna and Sherry were both wearing tuxedos, with Sherry's seeming slightly more childish.

"Geez, what am I wearing!?" Crow let out.

"And whats up with our reflections?" Sherry asked.

"Huh?"

Looking into a nearby mirror, they saw instead of themselves, completely different people as their reflections dressed like them. For Crow it was a young girl, Sherry a young boy, and Luna's was a grown man.

"What is going on here?" Luna questioned.

153332221.title: Personality change

1533322211.content:
As the light dies down and everyone's vision cleared, they all looked around in confusion. Nothing appeared to have happened to them. But while they weren't aware of it, something had change.

"Like, what just happened?" Leo wondered aloud. His tone of voice was different than normal, though he, nor anyone else seemed to notice.

"I dunno." Luna replied casually with a shrug. She also spoke with a differen tone than normal, but it was still not noticed by anyone.

"Well, if nothing appears to have happened, I guess nothing nothing happened." Jack said. He also appeared to be acting calmer than normal.

"I guess not." Carly said.

"Well thats boring." Akiza pouted. Like the others, she was acting differently.

"Well, what did you want to happen Akiza?" Yusei asked, sounding more cheerful than usual.

"I dunno. Something really cool!" she said waving her arms a bit for emphasis. Yusei giggle a bit at her.

"That sounds pretty childish." Crow commented as he

"Hey, you know what?" Jack asked everyone. "Its such a nice day. Why don't we spend it outside the garage?"

"What did you have in mind, Jack?" Carly asked.

"I don't know. We could go for a walk around the city, maybe get something to eat later." he said with a gentle smile.

Leo, who was currently looking at his reflection in the mirror, turned over to Jack. "Hey, would anyone mind if we also stopped to do some shopping? I was just thinking about getting some new clothes."

"I don't see why not." Jack said. "Anyone up for a trip into the city?"

"Sure, why not?" Sherry said. "I guess I could join you guys since I've got nothing else to do today."

After agreeing on what to do, the group of eight all left the garage to head to their destination. The group was completely oblivious that their personalities had been altered, and now viewed as they way that they each acted to be completely normal. Yusei and Akiza were the first outside, laughing as they ran out the door. With their new personalities, they were just like children. Yusei now had the personality of a sweet and innocent young girl, while Akiza had the personality of an excitable young boy. The two

"No running you two." Carly said as she walked out. "And don't go too far ahead."

"Okay." the two agreed and slowed down.

"Those two can be a handful sometimes." Carly said as Jack walked out and alongside her.

"Yes, but I suppose there isn't anything wrong with that. After all, let them enjoy theirselves, honey." Jack said. His stride was different than usual, walking with a mincing gait.

"If you insist. You know I can't say no to you." Jack and Carly now had the personalities of a typical mother and father respectively, and thus now treated Yusei and Akiza like a parent would their own young children. Their attatchment to each other had also been made to match that of a loving husband and wife, and while they weren't actually married, they certainly acted that way.

Leo was next outside, and he walked in a feminine fashion with his hips swaying with each step. He now had the personality of a typical teenage girly-girl, with a love of fashion and shopping. His sister followed right behind him, walking casually with her hands in her pockets, Luna now hacing the personality of a relaxed teenage boy. Crow and Sherry were the last out. Crow was also walking in a bit of a feminine way, also having the feminine personality of a young woman, but with a more mature attitude than Leo's new personality. While Sherry seemed to have a bit of a more masculine stride, having the personality of a young man.
1533322211.title: Yes

choices: Follow Yusei, Akiza, and Carly's group
Follow one of the other groups
15333222111.content:
After a long walk, the group reached the city. The first area they reached was a large shopping mall, and walking inside, Leo quickly became exited. "Oh my god! There is a sale going on! I am soo excited! This is perfect! Now I totally have to get some new clothes!" he

"Maybe I'll come too." Crow said. "I could use a change of clothes myself."

"Actually, I think I could also use a change of clothes." Jack agreed.

"Me too!" Yusei chimed in.

"From the sounds of it, we all want some new clothes, don't we?" Carly asked and everyone agreed. And with that, they headed into a nearby clothing store. The eight of them then split off into two groups, with them heading into the men and women's sections. However, it was the guys heading into the women's section and the girl into the men's.

Walking around, Leo spotted several things he would want. "Oh my god, these are just so cute!" Leo said as picked it up. He then ran over to grab more. He was planning to go on a spree, as he could afford anything here thanks to the monet his parents sent him and Luna, he was quite rich. He then took the stuff to a nearby clerk. "Excuse me, does any of this come in my size?" he asked her.

Not seeming to find anything odd about a twelve year old boy asking if clothes meant for a teenage girl came in his size, she replied "Well, not normally, but this store has state of the art tech that lets us modify anything here to any size so that we can make sure people can find what they want in their size. Just take anything you want to get fitted for you to the 'Alterations' section, and they'll take care of it."

"Thanks a lot." Leo said before joining the others.

After about a few hours later, the four of them had picked out new clothes for each of them. Leo now wore a blue tank top with a white miniskirt. On his feet were a pair of heels that were open at the toes. He had also bought a designer purse, which was now slung over his shoulder.

He admired himself in the mirror and struck a pose. "I look so hot." he said. Normally, such clothes wouldn't fit them, but he had paid the store extra to have them, and all the other clothes he had bought modified to fit him.

Crow meanwhile now wore an orange blouse with a pair of black pants with a black jacket, and a pair of heels on his feet. A black purse was slung over his shoulder.

As for Jack, he had picked a simple white dress. On his feet were a pair of high heels, and he now had a simple purse slung over his shoulders.

And finally, Yusei was now wearing a frilly blue dress. On his feet were socks that went up to his knees and a pair of mary janes. In his hair was a pink ribbon. Normally such clothes wouldn't come in his size, but Leo had helped out and paid for his new clothes to be modified for him.

Though these were what they were wearing, they had all bought completely new wardrobes.

"Well, lets go join the others. I'm sure they've waited long enough." Jack said as they walked out of the store and saw the others waiting. All of them were now dressed differently as well.

Luna now wore a red t shirt and a pair of baggy jeans. Carly was now wearing a white shirt and a pair kahki pants. Akiza now wore a red t shirt with a cartoon character on it and a pair of boys jean shorts. And Sherry now wore a black shirt and a pair of jeans. "Finally! Took you guys long enough." Akiza complained.

"Hey, you can't rush beauty." Leo said with a wink, and the Akiza and Luna rolled their eyes.

"But really, how do we look?" Crow said as he placed a hand on his hip.

"Not bad, I guess." Luna replied.

"And me?" Jack said as he walked over to Carly.

"You look beautiful, Jack." Carly replied. "As usual, of course."

Yusei then walked over to Akiza. "And what about me?" he asked her sweetly.

"Uh, well, I guess you look pretty, and uh, cute, Yusei." Akiza said with a bit of a blush, averting her eyes a bit.

"Thank you!" Yusei said, seeming to become even more cheerful at her compliment, then kissed her on the cheek. He giggles as she becomes more flustered. Her crush on Yusei from her previous personality remained, and evidently Yusei's new personality seemed to have one om her as well.

"Aw, aren't you two just the cutest little couple?" Leo teased, causing Akiza to blush even more.

"Anyway, now what are we going to do?" Sherry asked.

"Well, me, Crow and Leo were thinking about heading over to do a bit of shopping for some other stuff." Jack said. "What about you guys?"

"Well, Sherry and me were thinking about heading somewhere by ourselves." Luna said.

"And you, Carly?"

"I've got nothing in mind right now." she replied with a shrug.

"Then why don't you take a walk with Yusei and Akiza." Jack suggested. "Why not get the two something nice, like some ice cream. Or maybe take them to the toy store."

"Sure, why not? I'll do that for them."

"Really?" the two asked, becoming excited thanks to their new childlike personalities. "Yay!"

"Okay then. We'll meet back up in about two hours when we're all done then." Jack said.

153332221111.content:
Parting ways into the three group, Jack went with Crow and Leo, giving Carly a quick peck on the cheek. Luna and Sherry then headed off in another direction, leaving Carly with Yusei and Akiza. "Now, don't wander off too far you two." she said sternly.

"Okay." they agreed.

The three of them then walked over to a nearby ice cream stand and Carly bought the pair an ice cream cone each. The two happily licked at their cones as they walked through the mall and headed towards the shopping center's toy store and went in.

Inside, the two young adults with the personalities of children looked absolutely ecstatic. "Now, you two can each pick out two toys and I'll get them for you."

"Yay!" the two said before heading off into the store, with Akiza running over towards the boy's toys, and Yusei heading towards the girl's section almost skipping. With Akiza, she ran through the aisles, looking at a variety of action figures that she thought were just so cool, looking for the best one. With Yusei, he was looking at a variety of dolls that had caught his eye, looking for the prettiest one. After a while, the two returned to Carly who was waiting near the registers. Akiza had picked a pair toy robot while Yusei had gotten a doll that came with a variety of clothes, and a stuffed animal.

After paying for them, the trio left with Akiza immediately opening up her toys and pretending to have the robots fight while providing voices and sound effects. Yusei meanwhile held his new stuffed animal in his arms while holding the bag with his other toy.

The three of them then looked around. "Well, we got some time to kill before meeting up with Jack and the others. What do you two want to do?" Carly asked.

Thinking about it for a bit, Yusei and Akiza looked at each other and knew what they wanted to do. "Lets go to the park!" Yusei said.

"Yeah!" Akiza agreed.

"Well, okay then." And with that, the two left the complex and went to the park that was accross the street. Carly took a seat as Yusei and Akiza started running over to play, leaving their new toys with Carly. "Don't ruin your new clothes." Carly told them. "Jack would never let me hear the end of it." she added to herslf. She then took out her phone and sent a text telling the others to meet them here when they were done.

Walking into the park, Yusei almost immediately saw a group of young girls playing and went over to join them. "Hello!" he greeted them cheerfully. "My name is Yusei. Can I play with you?" he aked them and the group agreed without a second thought.

Akiza meanwhile saw a pair of boys playing around and headed over to join them. "Hey, I'm Akiza! Can I play with you guys?" she asked, and the two agreed.

Since the two groups matched their new mental ages and mindsets, the two of them enjoyed themselves as they played with then.

choices: After dinner, its late, so its Yusei and Akiza's bedtime
153332221111112.content:
After thinking about it for all that time, they couldn't come up with anything. To them, everything seemed completely normal.

"I sure can't think of anything wrong." Luna said with a shrug.

"Yeah, like, everything seems normal to me." Leo agreed, applying some make up to his face with a compact mirror. He had bought make up and some other stuff earlier.

"We're all acting normal and we all look normal. Maybe we're just being paranoid." Sherry said.

"You know, I've had this feeling ever since that card that Leo found glowed like that." Crow said.

"Yeah, but nothing happened, right?" Akiza asked, only barely paying attention, she and Yusei sat together on the couch, watching cartoons on the TV. Yusei held his new stuffed animal in front of him, leaning a bit close to Akiza with a smile. The others thought the two were cute together, and even though they were older than Leo and Luna, treated the two like the children that they now acted like.

"I don't get it, but if nothing seems wrong, then everything is olay, right?" Yusei said sweetly.

"Well, lets just ignore it, then." Carly said.

"That sounds fine." Jack said, coming in. "Dinner is ready everyone!" he said and everyone gathered at a table Jack had set up. No one seemed to recall how terrible of a chef Jack was with his old personality, now only remembering him as an excellent cook.

"This is yummy!" Yusei complimented as he and Akiza were the first at the table, and started eating.

"Yeah!" Akiza agreed.

"Oh, you two always say that." Jack said, but knowing the two meant it. He then looked over at Leo. "Put that phone away." he said strictly as he took a seat, instictively crossing his legs as he did.

"Yeah, I know." Leo said, as he sat down(also crossing his legs), putting a yellow phone that he had bought today away. It had a picture of his Life Stream Dragon on the back. "I was just checking the time. I only got it today, so its not like I can text people I don't know with it."

"Even so, I want everyone to enjoy a nice meal together without distractions. Like a proper family."

"We're not really, a family, though." Sherry said.

"I know. But we feel like one." Jack said.

"Yes, I agree." Carly said from her seat next to Jack. "Jack and I are the parents while Yusei, Akiza, Leo, and Luna feel like our own cheldren most of the time."

"So, you think of yourself as their father, Jack?" Sherry asked.

"Oh, I don't know." Crow said. "Jack acts more like the mother to me, while Carly is the father." he said with a slight laugh.

"I don't really see anything wrong with that." Jack said. "I don't mind being either the mother or father. As long as I've got Carly and a loving family."

"You both feel like my real parents!" Yusei said sweetly.

"Oh, thank you Yusei. You're such a little angel." Jack said.
153332221111112.title: they go on with how they are

1533322211111121.content:
"Anyway, its getting late, and you two need to get to bed." Jack said to Yusei and Akiza, who groaned. "Since its late, Akiza, I'll call your parents to let them know you'll stay the night."

"Ok." she said.

"Go brush your teeth and get ready." Carly said, and the two went to the bathroom.

"Hello Mrs. Izinski, its me Jack." Jack said over the phone. "I just wanted to call you and say that since its getting so late, and its almost Akiza's bedtime, I was thinking she should just spend the night here. I just want to call and make sure it was okay with her parents."

"Oh no, we don't mind." Akiza's mother said over the phone. "She loves spending time with you all so much that she practically lives with you all. Its almost like you're her mother sometimes. As long as Akiza is enjoying herself, we're fine with it."

"Okay then. Have a good night." Jack said, and Mrs. Izinski returned before the two hung up. Jack then went over to the bags that they had brought home and looked for a pair of boxes and took them out just as Yusei and Akiza came out of the bathroom. "By the way, I got these for you while shopping. I had them made just for you both." Jack said, handing Yusei and Akiza a box each. In Yusei's was a sky blue frilly nightie with a picture of his Stardust Dragon on the front that was drawn in a way to make it look a bit cuter, while Akiza's had a set of red boys pajamas with a picture of Black Rose Dragon roaring on the front of the shirt.

"Wow, thanks Jack!" Akiza said.

"Thank you, Jack!" Yusei said. The two childish young adults then hugged him happily before going to get changed for bed. Once readym they went into the bedroom, and got into the beds there. Sitting in bed, the two begged Jack to tell them a bedtime story, who happily agreed. Once the story was done, the two were just dozing off, and nearly asleep.

"Thank you, mommy." Yusei said just before the two fell asleep.

The comment from Yusei made Jack happy, even if he was called the "mom" by the half asleep Yusei, it warmed his heart to know Yusei thought of him enough as a parent to sometimes refer to him as one. With a smile on his face, he headed back into the main room, and took a seat on the couch next to Carly and lovingly cuddled like the married couple they acted like. "Anyway Carly, Crow and I were talking today, and we were thinking that Yusei and I would move out." Jack said. "I was thinking of finally moving in together with you, and obviously I'd take Yusei with me since we can keep and eye on him better than Crow."

"I wouldn't be against that, but where would we stay, dear? My apparetment isn't big enough for three people, and of course Akiza will be over so much that she'd practically live with us as well." Carly reasoned. "We'd need a bigger place."

"Oh that easy." Leo said as he joined the conversation. "I told him you guys can like move in with with me and Luna. Besides, you are our "parents" after all, so its totally okay." he joked, refferencing the eariler conversation.

"Well, there is plenty of room." Luna said. "Our place is so big, we could have two families stay there comfortably."

"What do you say?" Jack said.

"That sounds perfect." Carly said. "I've been wanting you to move in wirh me forever. And with a set up like that, we'll be a as close to being a real family as you can get without actually being one."
1533322211111121.title: After dinner, its late, so its Yusei and Akiza&...

choices: They split up, Yusei with Leo and Akiza with Luna
15333222111111211.content:
The next morning, the group was all awake and eating breakfast. Along with Akiza, Sherry and the twins had also spent the night. "So, whats the plan for today?" Leo asked.

"Well, its Sunday, so nothing much." Jack said. "Carly and I were going to start moving our stuff over to what will be our new house, and Crow and Sherry are going to help out."

"What are we going to do?" Yusei asked, refering to Akiza and himself.

"Thats a good question." Carly said. "We don't really need you two to help out."

"If you want, Leo and I could take care of them for the day." Luna suggested.

"That would be great." Jack said. "You two are big help."

"Its no problem." Leo said.

"What say we head out now and get out of their way?" Luna asked the two young adults with the personality of children.

"Okay!" Yusei and Akiza agreed, and they left the garage with the twins
15333222111111211.title: The next morning

153332221111112112.content:
As Yusei left the garage, he was currently dressed in one of his new outfits of a blue jumper over a white shirt. His new ribbon was in his hair, and he wore knee socks and mary janes again. Akiza wore a red t shirt with a white circle on the chest and a pair of shorts, as well as a baseball cap and sneakers. As for the twins, Leo was wearing a yellow dress, a pair of high heels, and his new purse slung over his shoulder. And Luna was wearing a simple white shirt and jeans with a pair of sneakers.

"Hey Leo, how about we split up." Luna suggested. "I'll take Akiza for the day, and you take care of Yusei."

"That sounds fine." Leo agreed. "You two fine with it too?"

"Sure." Akiza agreed, and Yusei nodded in agreement as well.

"Okay then." Luna said. "We'll meet up here again later." And with that, the two groups headed off in separate directions.
153332221111112112.title: They split up, Yusei with Leo and Akiza with Luna

1533322211111121121.content:
As the two groups parted ways, Yusei skipped ahead of Leo. "Hey, don't like go to far ahead of me." he said.

"Okay." Yusei said, slowing down and walking alongside the boy.

"So like, what should we do first?" Leo asked.

"I don't know." Yusei said. "What do you want to do?"

"Dunno either. I guess we'll just walk around for now until we find something to do."

"Okay."

As the two just went for a walk around, after a while, they got a bit hungry so they decided to stop off at a nearby snack stand to get something to eat. As they reached it, the woman working there took a look at them and smiled. "Oh, are you taking care of your sibling today?" the woman asked Leo.

"Well, I'm watching Yusei, but hes not really my sibling. We're not related." Leo replied.

"Really? You two seem like a real pair siblings." the woman said. "You remind me of how me and my younger sister were. You two seem just like we used to be."

After getting something to eat, the two resumed their walk. "You hear that Yusei? We're like sisters." Leo said as the two walked away.

"I wouldn't mind if you were my big sister." Yusei said with a smile. It was quite an odd situation. Before their personalities had been altered, Leo had looked up to Yusei as an older brother figure. But now, their roles were reversed, with Yusei now looking up to Leo as an older sibling.

"Yeah, I guess I wouldn't mind being your big sister." Leo said with a bit of a girlish giggle.

"Then can I call you 'Big sis?'" Yusei asked innocently.

It was an odd question, the young man asking the child if it was to call him his older sibling, let alone as one of the opposite gender. But rather than noticing the odditity, Leo was flattered. "Sure, but then only if I can like call you 'Little sis' then." he replied.

"Okay! Thats fine with me, Big sis!" Yusei said happily. "We're sisters now!" It didn't really seem odd to either of them that a pair of boys being sisters was strange.

"I guess we are." Leo said. "So then, what do you want to do now, Little sis?"

Looking around, Yusei noticed a poster on a nearby wall. The poster had a picture of a pair of female Duel Monsters called Pikeru and Curran, and it was for a movie about them called "Trial of the Princesses" that was inspired by the cards about the two Magicians becoming princesses.

"Can we go see that?" Yusei asked hopefully. "It looks like a great movie!"

"Well, I guess I can take you." Leo agreed.

"You're the best, Big sis!" Yusei said as he kneeled over and gave Leo a hug.

As Yusei and Leo headed to their destination, Akiza and Luna had their own plans in mind. The two were currently hanging out in an arcade playing video games together.

"This is awesome!" Akiza said as they finished up a beat em up game together.

"Yeah, I thought you'd have fun." Luna said. "So, what do you want to play next?"

Looking around the arcade, Akiza spotted one. "That one!" she said as she pointed at it. "I wanna play that fighting game next!"

"Sure." Luna agreed and they walked over to it. As they played against one anoher, the matches were just about even, both winning as much as the other. After a while, they decided to play another game, and looked around

They saw a pair of boys, a younger one and an older playing another game, beating another pair of boys at one of the games, and bragging about it.

Walking over, they decided to challenge the two boys. "Hey, can we play?" Akiza asked.

"Why bother? We'd just beat you!" the younger boy taunted. "Me and my brother are the best!

"Yeah, well Luna and I are just as good as you and your brother!" Akiza argued with the boy, not liking his attitude. "We can beat you guys!"

"Yeah, but we're better because we're brothers!" the boy retorted, his logic not really making much sense, but being young, he thought he and his brother were unbeatable at the game.

"Yeah, well then me and Luna are brothers because we're gonna beat you!" Akiza said, sticking out her tongue at the boy.

"Yeah right. Prove it!"

"Fine! C'mon Luna, lets beat them!"

"Okay." she said, shaking her head a bit at Akiza's childishness. The four began playing the game. At first things were even, but then the two brothers started to gain the upper hand. But after a bit, Akiza and Luna began to make a comeback, and in the end they beat their opponents.

"Yeah!" Akiza said as she threw her arms up in triumph. "Told you we could beat you two!" Akiza bragged, and being sore losers, the two boys left. "Heh, guess me and you are just as good as real brothers, 'Big bro.'"

"Sure, why not, 'Little bro.'" Luna said.

After a moment, the flash of light stopped, and Trudge and Mina were confused by what had just happened.

"Hm? What was that all about?" Trudge asked, now speaking with softer tone than usual.

"I'm not quite sure..." Mina replied, also speaking differently than normal, with a bit of a masculine tone, then setting the card down. The two then took a seat, suddenly feeling a bit tired. "Whew, guess I need a break."

"Don't tire yourselves out, you two." Carly said to them. "You two just relax. We can handle everything."

"Oh, don't worry about us." Trudge said.

Similarly had Yusei, Akiza, and the twins were treated almost as if they were Jack's kid with his new motherly woman personality, Jack treated the two akin to his own parents due to their new relative mentality in comaparison to his own, and they now viewed him as an elderly couple would their own daughter. "In fact, I insist that you two move in with us."

"I told you, we're not helpless." Mina insisted.

"I know, but you two need to accept your limits." Jack reasoned. "And after all, with you around, you could help take care of Yusei and the others. Please, do it for me."

"Oh fine." Mina relented. "I can't say no to you, Jack."

"Now you know how I feel." Carly added as she continued to pack up.

"I guess it would be nice." Trudge said. "I love spending time with the kids." With his new personality, he was looking forward to being the kindly old 'grandmother' to Yusei and the others.

153332221111112112122212.content:
Much later in the day, Yusei and the others were returning to the garage. "Today was so fun, Big sis!" Yusei said to Leo.

"Yeah, it wasn't so bad." Leo said. He had fun spending time as well. He enjoyed the time the two had spent together, and had come to really enjoy their new 'sisterly' relationship.

As the two made their way to the garage, they saw Akiza and Luna on the way. At the sight of them, Yusei became even move exited. "Hey Akiza!" he said, running over to her with a girlish run, and hugging her. Akiza became all flustered at his actions.

"H-hi, Y-yusei." she managed to let out.

Releasing her, he put his hand behind his back. "Today was sooo fun! Me and Leo did went to the movies, and did some other stuff, and now we're sisters!" he said.

"Yeah?" Akiza asked, recovering her composure. "Me and Luna had fun at the arcade. And we're brothers now."

"Yeah, Akiza is my Little Bro." Luna said to Leo.

"And like, I'm Yusei's Big Sis." Leo told her.

As the four of the made their way back to the garage together, they saw everybody outside. "Oh good, you guys got here just in time." Carly said as she spotted the group. "We were just finished moving everything to the new house."

"We were just about to call you all and let you know." Jack said. "By the way, I'm having Mina and Trudge moving in with us as well."

"Really?" Yusei asked.

"Yes, Mina and I are going to stay with you all." Trudge said in a kindly tone befitting his new personality.

"Anyway, we can all talk more about this when we get to the new home. We should get going." Carly said walking over to her car, and Akiza and the twins followed her. Jack and Yusei walked over to say goodbye to Crow.

"Remember, you're welcome to stop by whenever you want." Crow said, he and Jack hugging each other like a pair of siblings, having a sort of sisterly relationship.

"Oh, of course." Jack said.

"And Yusei, make sure you behave." Crow told him.

"I know." Yusei said. "I'll miss you, Crow." he said, hugging him tightly, sounding sad and had a bit of tears in his eyes.

"Oh, don't worry." Crow reassured him. "You can come visit whenever you want."

"Really?" he said, wiping his tears.

"Of course."

"Okay!"

"C'mon Yusei, lets get going." Jack said, and the two joined the others in Carly's car, and the group drove off with Trudge and Mina following behind in the car they had come to the garage in.
153332221111112112122212.title: Later that day, the others are back, and everyt...

1533322211111121121222121.content:
After a bit of a drive, the group pulled into the Tops building where Leo and Luna's penthouse that they all now shared. Taking the elevator to the top, they entered into the large home on top.

"Wow, I can't believe we're going to live here from now on." Yusei said. He had been here many times before, but he never thought he'd ever live here.

"It is a pretty big home." Trudge said.

"Yeah, I can't believe you two lived here on your own for so long." Mina commented.

"Most of our stuff has been moved in already." Jack said. "Why don't you all pick a room and move your stuff into it while I start dinner."

Doing as he said, Yusei picked a room for herself, while Akiza picked one for her to use whenever she spent the night, which would be most of the time, and Trudge and Mina picked one for them to share. Jack and Carly had already picked a room for them to share earlier.

After picking their rooms, Leo and Yusei moved the clothing they had bought yestersay into their rooms, while Luna and Akiza did the same with theirs. Trudge and Mina didn't really have much to do until dinner.

Not long after, dinner was ready, and everyone sat at the kitchen table. "And this will be the first family meal at our new home."

"Family, huh?" Mina said. "Does that make you the 'father,' Jack?"

"No, Jack is the mommy!" Yusei said. "Carly is the daddy, and Leo is my big sister and I'm his little sister." he explained with his young girl's personality's childlike innocence.

"And Luna is my Big Bro!" Akiza added.

"Well, sounds like you two have everything figured out." Trudge said. "And what does that make me? The grandmother?" he joked.

"Okay, Grandma Trudge!" Yusei replied, not having recognized it as a joke.

Trudge was about to tell Yusei his wasn't serious, but couldn't bring himself to spoil his fun. And he had to admit, the name did have a nice ring to it. "Well then, I guess that leaves you as the grandfather, Mina." he says.

"I suppose so." Mina said.

"By the way, Yusei." Jack said.

"Yes?" Yusei asked as he looked over to him.

"Carly and I were talking earlier, and we thought that maybe you should start going to school." he told him.

"School? You mean with Akiza and Big Sis at Duel Acadmey?"

"Well, not exactly." Carly said. "We think you should start with the basics first. After all, you're good enough so you do't really need to learn anything about dueling. We've already enrolled you at the local elementary school."

"Well, okay." Yusei said. No one seemed to find the idea of some one Yusei's age attending elementary school to be strange.

"Then I want to go to school with Yusei." Akiza said.

"Well, if thats what you want." Jack said. "And I'm sure you'll both have more fun going to school with one another. I'll call your parents and have them get everything sorted out for tomorrow."

"Yay! Me and Akiza get to go to school together!" Yusei cheered with girlish glee.

The next day, Yusei woke up and got dressed, wondering what school would be like. He put on a frilly pink dress and a pair of knee socks and his mary janes, then tying his ribbon in his hair.

Because of his mental age being too young for New Domino's Duel Academy, he would actually be starting school at the local elemantary school. Akiza would also be going with him, having decided she wanted to go to school with Yusei. It would be both of their first day, and they were both a little nervous but still looking forward to it. As he walked out of his room, Akiza also came out of hers, which was right accross from his new room, having spent the night. She currently wore a blue t shirt and a pair of shorts. The two then headed into the kitchen for breakfast.

After a bit, Leo came into the kitchen, now wearing what had used to be Luna's Duel Academy female uniform, but now believed it to be his own. Luna followed behind him, and the same applied to her and the male uniform that had been Leo's. "So Little Sis, you looking forward to starting school today?" Leo asked as they all sat at the table, waiting for Jack to finish breakfast.

"A little." he replied. "But I'm a bit nervous, too."

"Oh, don't be, sweety." Jack replied. He currently wore a light blue sundress with a white apron over it, and a pair of ballet flats on his feet. "I'm sure you'll have lots of fun at school. Plus, Akiza will be going with you, and today will be her first day at that school too."

Carly then entered in and took a seat at the table, and opened the newspaper to read as she waited. She currently wore a pair of kahki pants and a white dress shirt.

"By the way, I got these for you two." Jack said, holding out a pair of childish looking backpacks. One was pink, with a picture of his Stardust Dragon made to look cuter. The other was red with a picture of Black Rose Dragon shooting flames from its mouth.

"Wow, thanks Jack!" Akiza said taking the red one.

"Thank you, mommy!" Yusei said taking the pink one.

"Mommy, huh? So then I take it that name is sticking?" Carly asked.

"Uh-huh!" Yusei said with a smile.

"Well, I like it." Jack said, serving breakfast for everyone. As he served Carly's, she gave him a kiss on the lips, and he rturned the action. "Anyway, hurry up and eat you four. You've got to get to school!"

---

Not long after, Yusei and Akiza were dropped off by Carly at the local elementary school. No one there found the anything wrong with the two walking into the building and taking a seat in their new classroom.

---

Elsewhere, Leo and Luna arrived at the Duel Academy. However, rather than walking into their usual classroom, they headed into the classes for the older students of high school age. No one found anything odd about that.

Heading into the elementary school, Yusei was getting pretty nervous. He had never gone to school before, and with his personality now being that of a little girl, he was just as nervous as any young girl would be on her first day of school.

"I'm scared, Akiza." he said to her, grabbing her arm a bit for comfort. "I wanna go home."

Though their new personalities caused them to display it in childlike ways, the two cared about each other a lot, and as more than friends or siblings. So, seeing Yusei getting like this, Akiza had to reassure him. "Oh, don't worry, Yusei." she said, giving him a smile. "Theres nothing to be afraid of. And even if there was, I'd protect you." he said.

"Really? Thank you Akiza." he said giving her a quick hug.

The two then walked over to what would be their classroom, and waited outside for the the teacher to cal them in.

"Class, we have a couple of new students joining us today." their teacher said and Yusei and Akiza entered. "Go on, introduce yourselves."

"Hi, I'm Yusei Fudo." he said sweetly and waved a bit.

"And I'm Akiza Izinski." she said.

The teacher then told them to take a pair open seats, though they were a bit disappointed that their seats weren't next to each other. Yusei's had a pair of young girl's on either side who were imediately friendly with him. Akiza's seat was on the end next to another boy with who was immediately friendly with her. As class began, Yusei and Akiza payed attention to the teacher's lessons. As they did, they didn't seem to realize that both of them should know all of this stuff already, and in fact were even struggling a bit. Their personalities evidentally weren't the only things affected by the card. Even though Yusei was 19, and Akiza was 17, they now had the intelligence of their new mental ages as well, and were the equivalent of the class of kindergarteners they were now part of.

"I'm Johnny." one introduced himself.

After a while, their free time ended, and they all returned to their seets and the lessons resumed. They also had an art class, and the students were told to draw themselves as somerthing they'd like to be, real or not. Yusei drew a crude drawing of himself as a princess, coloring in the dress he wore in the picture pink, and he was being saved by a knight that looked suspiciously like Akiza. "So then, like, what just happened?" Jack asked

"It doesn't look like anything happened." Carly said.

"Thats kinda boring." Sherry complained.

"Well, at least we're all okay." Yusei said in a caring voice. "Hey, you know what? Its such a nice day. Why don't we spend it outside the garage?"

"What did you have in mind, Yusei?" Akiza asked.

"I don't know. We could go for a walk around the city, maybe get something to eat later." he said with a gentle smile.

Leo, who was currently looking at his reflection in the mirror, turned over to Yusei. "Hey, would anyone mind if we also stopped to do some shopping? I was just thinking about getting some new clothes. These are just too childish for my tastes."

"That sounds like a good idea." Jack agreed. "I could like, totally go for some shopping."

After agreeing on what to do, the group of eight all left the garage to head to their destination. The group was completely oblivious that their personalities had been altered, and now viewed as they way that they each acted to be completely normal. Crow and Sherry were the first outside, laughing as they ran out the door. With their new personalities, they were just like children. Crow now had the personality of a sweet and innocent young girl, while Sherry had the personality of an excitable young boy. "Bet you can't catch me!" Sherry taunted Crow.

"No fair! You got a head start!" Crow whined. The two were acting like a pair of young siblings playing with each other.

"No running you two." Akiza said as she walked out. "And don't go too far ahead."

"Awe, okay." the two reluctantly agreed and slowed down.

"Those two can be a handful sometimes." Akiza said as Yusei walked out and alongside her.

"Yes, but I suppose there isn't anything wrong with that. After all, let them enjoy theirselves, honey." Yusei said. His stride was different than usual, walking with a mincing gait.

"If you insist. You know I can't say no to you." Yusei and Akiza now had the personalities of a typical mother and father respectively, and thus now treated Crow and Sherry like a parent would their own young children. Their attatchment to each other had also been made to match that of a loving husband and wife, and while they weren't actually married, they certainly acted that way.

Leo was next outside, and he walked in a feminine fashion with his hips swaying with each step. He now had the personality of a more mature and feminine young woman at least twice his real age. As for his sister Luna, she now had a more masculine stride, having the personality of a young man.

As for Jack and Carly, the two walked out with Jack lovingly hugging onto Carly's shoulder. The two now had the personalities of teenagers of their opposite gender. Jack had the personality of a teenage giry-girl with a love of fashion and shopping, and Carly now having the personality of a relaxed teenage boy. Another thing that had altered thanks to their personalities was that they acted like a pair of teenagers in love, and now believed they were dating.
15333222121.title: Yes

choices: Follow one of the other two groups
153332221211.content:
After a long walk, the group reached the city. The first area they reached was a large shopping mall, and walking inside, Jack quickly became exited. "Oh my god! There is a sale going on! I am soo excited! This is perfect! Now I totally have to get some new clothes!" he squealed with delight.

"Like I said, I'll come too." Leo said. "I could definitely use a change of clothes myself."

"Actually, I think I could also use a change of clothes." Yusei agreed.

"Me too!" Crow chimed in. "I want something pretty and cute!"

"From the sounds of it, we all want some new clothes, don't we?" Akiza asked and everyone agreed. And with that, they headed into a nearby clothing store. The eight of them then split off into two groups, with them heading into the men and women's sections. However, it was the guys heading into the women's section and the girl into the men's.

Walking around, Jack spotted several things he would want. "Oh my god, these are just so cute!" he said as picked it up. He then ran over to grab more. He was planning to go on a spree.

With Leo, he took a few articles to a nearby clerk. "Excuse me, but does any of this come in my size?" he asked her.

Not seeming to find anything odd about a twelve year old boy asking if clothes meant for a grown woman came in his size, she replied "Well, not normally, but this store has state of the art tech that lets us modify anything here to any size so that we can make sure people can find what they want in their size. Just take anything you want to get fitted for you to the 'Alterations' section, and they'll take care of it."

"That sounds perfect. Thank you." Leo said before joining the others.

After about a few hours later, the four of them had picked out new clothes for each of them.
Leo now wore a crisp, white, womens blouse, and from his waist was a short, tight, black skirt that came down to mid-thigh. A pair of shiny, black pantyhose were on his legs and a pair of two inch tall pumps were on his feet. Strangely enough, he had also gotten a lacy bra that he now wore underneath, modified for his flat, boy chest. He had also gotten a a purse. He looked at himself in the mirror. "Much better." he commented.

Yusei now wore a simple sky blue sundress, and a pair of heels. Like Leo, he had also gotten a bra and had it modified for his flat chest. A simple purse hung from his shoulders.

Jack now wore a white sleeveless too that would have showed off some cleevage on a woman, but since he was male, just gave people a view of his chest. He also wore a blue miniskirt, and a pair of stockings and a pair of black high heels. Like the other two, he also now wore a bra. A designer purse now hung from his shoulder.

And last amongst the group was Crow, who now wore a frilly yellow dress, and on his feet were socks that went up to his knees and a pair of mary janes. He also had a bow in his hair.

And this was only they were currently wearing. They had also bought completely new wardrobes, and had delivered back to the garage for them so that they wouldn't have to carry around the bags.

"Well, lets go join the others. I'm sure they've waited long enough." Yusei said as they walked out of the store and saw the others waiting. All of them were now dressed differently as well.

Luna now wore a white shirt and a pair of jeans. Carly was now wearing a white t shirt under a blue jacket and a pair kahki pants. Akiza now wore a white dress shirt and a pair of kahki pants. And Sherry now wore a black t shirt white a cartoon character on it and a baggy pair of jeans. "Finally! Took you guys long enough." Sherry complained.

"Hey, you can't rush beauty." Jack said with a pose and a wink, and the Sherry and Luna rolled their eyes.

"Well, you definitely look hot, Jack." Carly complimented.

"Oh, thanks! You're so sweet!" Jack said as he hugged her.

"But really, how do we look?" Leo said as he placed a hand on his hip.

"Not bad, I guess." Luna replied.

"And me?" Yusei said as he walked over to Akiza.

"You look beautiful, Yusei." Akiza replied, giving her a light embrace. "As usual, of course."

Crow then walked over to Akiza. "And what about me?" he asked her sweetly.

"Oh, you look very cute, Crow!" Akiza said with a tone that one would use when speaking with a child.

"Yay!" Crow said, seeming to become even more cheerful at her compliment.

"Anyway, now what are we going to do?" Sherry asked, rolling her eyes at Crow.

"Well, I was thinking about getting some other stuff" Jack said. "What about you guys?"

"Well, I was going to also do shopping." Yusei said.

"Me too." Leo said. "We could go together."

"Sure, why not?" Yusei agreed.

"Well, Luna and me were thinking about heading somewhere by ourselves." Akiza said.

"And you, Carly?" Jack asked.

"I've got nothing in mind right now." she replied with a shrug.

"Then why don't you take a walk with Crow and Carly?" Yusei suggested. "Why not get the two something nice, like some ice cream. Or maybe take them to the toy store."

"Sure, why not? I'll do that for them."

"Really?" the two asked, becoming excited thanks to their new childlike personalities. "Yay!"

"Okay then. We'll meet back up in about two hours when we're all done then." Yusei said. He then handed Carly some money to spend on the kids. "Here. And thank you for watching the two for me."

"No problem."
153332221211.title: They arrive at the mall

15333222122.content: How about Yusei, Jack, and Crow get the personalities of very girly little girls, Akiza, Carly, and Sherry get the personalities of childish little boys, Leo gets a mature woman's personality, and Luna gets a mature man's personality.
15333222122.title: Other personality change options

153332221221.content:
As the flash of light died down, the group was confused by what had just happened. "What was that all about?" Akiza wondered aloud. Her tone of voice was different, speaking with a more childish tone.

"I don't know." Yusei replied, speaking with a soft, yet cheerful tone.

"Doesn't look like anything happened." Leo said with a calm tone as he place a hand on his hip in a feminine manner.

"I guess not." Luna replied in a gruffer tone than she normally spoke in. "Sure was weird though."

"Yeah, it certainly was." Leo said as he looked down at himself. He suddenly felt distatse with what he was wearing. It was too childish.

"Can I see the card, Yusei?" Akiza asked, and Yusei handed it to her like she asked. She then held it out and loudly commanded it. "C'mon, do it again!" she said waving it around. Yusei, Jack, and Crow giggled girlishly at her display.

"Looks like its not gonna do it again." Carly complained.

"I was hoping something cool might happen." Sherry added.

The reason that the group was acting this way was because the card had completely altered their personalities. Yusei, Jack and Crow now had personalities were now those of sweet, innoncent, and very girly little girls. Their thoughts were now occupied by things befitting their new personalities such as dolls, cute things, and other such stuff.

Akiza, Carly, and Sherry had undergone the exact opposite kind of change, and now had the personalities of exciteable and childish little boys. They now thought of "cooler" things like those that little boys would like.

Leo's new personality was now that of a mature woman in her mid twenties. He was now feminine, but in a much more mature way than the other males. And as for Luna, her personality was now a that of a man in his mid twenties. The reverse of her bother, her personality was now much more masculine.

But none of them seemed to realize that they were acting was strange or different. They all believed that the way they were acting was perfectly normal.

As Akiza kept trying to make the card flash again to the amusement of the guys, Leo started to make his way to the door. "Where are you going, Leo?" Luna asked.

"To do some shopping." he replied. "I need something different to wear."

"Oh." Luna said, then looked down at her own clothes, . "I think I'll come to."

"But what about Yusei and the others? We can't leave them here alone."

"Then can we come?" Yusei asked hopefully, and he and the others all pleaded with their eyes.

"Okay, you can come." Leo said.

"Yay!" Yusei cheered, and he, Jack and Crow skipped to the door as Akiza, Carly, and Sherry ran out.

"They're such a handful sometimes." Luna remarked as the twins followed them out.

1533322212211.content:
After a while, the group all arrived at the mall, and they headed into a nearby clothing store. Inside, Leo turned to everybody. "Now, you all behave while Luna and I get some new clothes."

"Can I get some?" Yusei asked. "I want to get something pretty and cute!"

"Me too?" Jack asked.

"And me?" Crow asked.

"And I want something instead of a dress!" Akiza joined in.

Thinking it over, Leo turned to his sister who nodded. "Sure, why not? You guys pick out whatever you want and we'll get it for you." Leo said, and all six were happy.

"Can I get this?" Yusei asked as he ran to the little girls section nearby, picking a little girl's pink dress off a rack and holding it up to his body. Being a 19 year old male, it didn't look like it would be even close to fitting him.

"It looks too small for you. Lets see if it comes in your size." Leo said, and the pair walked over to a nearby clerk. "Excuse me, my friend wants this dress, but its too small for him. Does it come in his size?" he asked her.

Not seeming to find anything odd about a 19 year old male asking if clothes meant for a little girl came in his size, she replied "Well, not normally, but this store has state of the art tech that lets us modify anything here to any size so that we can make sure people can find what they want in their size. Just take anything you want to get fitted for you to the 'Alterations' section, and they'll take care of it."

"That sounds perfect. Thank you." Leo said to her.

"Yay!" Yusei cheered, glad he could get the dress.

The two then walked back over the others, and told them about the Alterations section. A few hours later, they had bought new clothes for themselves, and each now wore a new outfit. Leo now wore a crisp, white, womens blouse, and from his waist was a short, tight, black skirt that came down to mid-thigh. A pair of shiny, black pantyhose were on his legs and a pair of two inch tall pumps were on his feet. Strangely enough, he had also gotten a lacy bra that he now wore underneath, modified for his flat, boy chest. He had also gotten a a purse, and his face was now decorated with expertly applied make up. As for Luna, she was dressed simply, and now wore a white collared shirt, and a pair of kahki pants.

Yusei, Jack, and Crow now wore frilly dresses, with Yusei wearing a pink one, Jack wearing a blue one, and Crow in a yellow one. And on their feet, they all wore socks that went up to their knees, and mary janes. They also now had new hair adornments, with Yusei having pink ribbon that matched his new dress, Jack having a black alice band, and Crow with a yellow bow.

And as for Akiza, Carly, and Sherry, their clothes were now the kind one might see a young boy wear. Akiza wore a red t shirt with jean shorts and a baseball cap. Carly wore a blue shirt with jeans. And Sherry wore a yellow shirt and jean overalls. All three of their shirts had cartoon pictures on them.

And this was only they were currently wearing. They had also bought completely new wardrobes, and had delivered back to the garage for them so that they wouldn't have to carry around the bags.

"There we go. Much better." Leo said as the group left the clothing store, his hips swaying wth each step and his new heels clicking with each step.

"Yeah!" Yusei said as he skipped out of the store. He then turnned to Akiza. "Akiza, does my new dress look pretty?" he asked her.

"Uh, well, yeah, it looks very pretty on you." she replied with a blush.

"Akiza and Yusei, sitting in a tree!" Carly and Sherry teased.

"Sh-shut up!" she protested as she and Yusei blushed at the comment.

"Quit picking on them, Carly!" Jack said, and Carly stopped instantly.

"Sorry..." she said. The six young adults were acting like a group of little kids, but no one in the mall seemed to find anything odd about the sight. When the card had altered their personalities, it had also altered reality to make their new attitudes seem normal to other people.

Crow then noticed another nearby store. "Leo, Luna! Can we go to the toy store?" he begged.

"Can we?" Akiza asked with excitement.

"Yeah! Pretty please?" Yusei joined in.

"Pleeeaaaaase?" the other three joined in.
1533322212211.title: They arrive at the mall

choices: The twins take the group to a park to play
15333222122111.content:
"Well, okay, I suppose we could." Leo relented.

"Yay!" the six cheered with childish glee. They all went into the toy store with Leo and Luna following, and inside the the six of them splitting up into two groups.

Yusei, Jack, and Crow had gone into a section full of dolls, the three of them giggling like the young girls they now acted like. "Ooh, I like this one!" Yusei said as he picked one off the shelf for himself. "And then we can get this one too. And this one! And that one!" he said as he picked several more out for them to play with.

"Lets also get this stuff." Jack said as he picked out some doll accessories such as extra clothes, other stuff.

"And we've got to get this doll house!" Crow said, pointing at the large doll house.

With Akiza, Carly, and Sherry, they were picking out action figures. They had chosen out stuff such as superhero ones, robots, and other stuff that young boys would like. "This one is so cool!" Akiza said as she picked one out.

"And if we get that one, we've gotta get this guy for him to fight against!" Carly said as she grabbed the enemy of Akiza's figure.

"And this too!" Sherry said as she grabbed a vehicle that went with Akiza's figure.

After a while, the two groups met back up with the twins who had been waiting for them. Both groups were pushing shopping carts full of toys. In the boys' carts, other than the doll stuff, they also had several cute stuffed animals, several other girlish toys like a tea set, and a whole pile of dress-up costumes that they wanted to get modified to fit them. For the girls, their cart was full of different kinds of action figures and toys that went with them, as well as other typical toys that young boys would like.

"My, isn't that an awful lot of toys you all picked out?" Leo asked. "Don't you think you picked out a little too much?"

"Please? We don't really have any toys, so we got a whole bunch." Yusei said.

"And its not like these are all for only one of us." Akiza said. "We're gonna share 'em."

"Pleeeaase?" the other four joined in the begging.

"Okay, we'll get you all this stuff, but only because you guys don't have any toys." Luna said sternly. "And its just this once."

"Okay." the six agreed.

With the agreement reached, the group brought the full carts to the cashier to check officially purchase the toys. "Wow, you've got a lot of stuff here." the cashier remarked.

"Its not a problem." Luna said.

"And we'll need the sizes of the costumes altered to fit them." Leo said, gesturing to Yusei, Jack, and Crow, and handed the measurements for them to the cashier.

"No problem." the cashier replied.

"And have all of this delivered to this address." Luna said giving another paper.

And with that done, the group left the toy store. "So, now what should we do?" Leo asked.

153332222222.title: IT'S YUGO!

154.content:
It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma and his friends Tori, Bronk, Caswell, Flip, Cathy, and Anna as well as his sister Kari were walking down the road, with Astral floating along behind Yuma, unseen by all but him. As they made their way there, Yuma noticed something on the ground. "Huh? Whats that?" he wondered aloud as he walked over to it to pick it up.

"Whats up, Yuma?" Tori asked as she followed him.

"I saw something." he said, reaching it, and picking it up. "Huh? A card. And its completely blank." he said as he looked it over. There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"Hey guys, check this out." Yuma said as he and Tori walked back over to his friends.

"Huh? A blank card?" Bronk commented.

"I just found iton the ground over there." Yuma said.

"It is pretty weird." Caswell said.

"Where'd it come from?" Flip asked.

As they were all wondering about the blank card, a familliar motorcycle was riding by as Yuma called over to is rider. "Hey, Shark!" he said with a wave.

Seeing them, Shark pulled over. "Hey." he said.

"Hey Shark, check out this weird card I found." Yuma said as he held it out for him to see. "its this weird blank card."

"A blank card?" the heard a voice bheind them ask, and saw Kite, Nistro, and Dextra.

"Oh, hey you guys. No clue. But I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

One day in domino city Rebecca Hawkins was walking down the street. She was wearing her usual outfit, a blue blouse with an orange bow attached to the front, a miniskirt that hung from her waist and knee high socks and shoes. Her hair was in twin ponytails and she was wearing her red glasses

"Time to see my precious Yugipoo" Rebecca said happily. Despite being a college student she was still a little girl who had a big crush on Yugi and squeeled like one too. Even if she was more intelligent than the average 12 year old being skilled with computers to a high degree as well a dueling prodigy she couldn't help but like dolls, flowers and other little girl stuff. However when it came to her crush she had some competition, Tea. Rebecca and Tea have been competing for Yugi's love since the day she met her. She rival's Tea, but likes her for her tenacity.

Rebecca was on her way to meet Yugi in the city, her freckled face smiling like a giddy schoolgirl, which is what she is. she practically skipped down the sidewalk happily when she saw something that caught her eye. "Huh, what's that" she said as she saw something blowing in the wind. Looking closer she saw it was a duel monsters card. She watched as it twisted and turned in the air and finally settled down on the ground in front of her gently, almost as though it wanted her to pick it up.

"That's weird, cards don't just fly through the air like that" Rebecca said as she picked up the card with her little fingers. Fidgeting with her glasses using her other hand she examined the card. "And they certainly aren't blank either" she said.

Suddenly the card began glowing in her hand. Rebecca closed her eyes in surprise as she was blinded by a bright light that blasted through the card.

155131221221.content:
As the light died down Rebecca found that she was no longer in domino city. Looking around she saw that she was no longer in any city. She stood with sand blowing in her face outside of a large pyramid. "Whe-where am I" she said in shock of the sight in front of her. As she looked onward she saw nothing but sand, dunes of sand below a bright sun. As she lifted her hand to shield her eyes from the sun she noticed that her arm was bare, no longer clad in her blouse sleeve, which led her to look down, suspecting that her clothes were no longer the same. She was right. Rebecca was no longer wearing her blouse. Instead, she wore a white silk dress that was strapless, the kind of dress that went down to your knees. It revealed her shoulders and lower legs and had a hood, presumably for the sun. Her arms were adorned with a pair of bracelets attached to her wrists and her biceps. Her hair no longer in twin ponytails was now let loose down behind her, two of her bangs hanging down her face. On her feet she no longer wore any socks or her shoes, but a pair of simple brown slippers in bare feet. On her ankles were two gold anklets, adding to her outfit’s Egyptian theme. She wore a choker on her neck, golden colored like her bracelets and anklets, and although she couldn’t see it, a jewel encrusted circlet was on her forehead. All in all she was dressed like an Egyptian, adorned with beautiful jewelry.
“Hey, where am I, hello” she shouted towards the desert landscape. “Oh man, am I in Egypt? And what’s with these white clothes” she said. “Darn, that card did this to me” she said. Looking around for the card, to no avail, she saw that there was nobody else, just her in the middle of a desert. She wanted to take off her Egyptian clothing but there was nothing else for her to wear. Curiously she tugged at her dress. As she tugged at her new dress she noticed something sticking out of the sand. “What’s that” she said. Bending down to pick it up from the sand she found...
155131221221.title: Rebecca the Egypt girl

15523211.content:
It was a beautiful day at duel academy. The sun was shining brightly on the campus grounds. Alexis was walking happily, her blue high heeled boots clacking against the floors of the academy while her hips swayed as she walked, which was her own personal fashion of walking. She was known as the most beautiful girl in duel academy. Every male student wanted to be with her but she was interested in only two students in particular, Jaden Yuki and Syrus Truesdale. There was no doubt that Alexis had a crush on Jaden. He was funny, friendly and a great duelist. She had feelings for him as soon as he entered the academy, and even before that. As for Syrus, she adored his cute demeanor and small size. Considering he was so small he was like a little boy and she just wanted to put on an apron, cook a meal and place the dish in front of his cute little head. His cute little bug eyes, small stature and adorable appearance made him a little puppy that every girl in the academy, even some of the teachers just wanted to hug and smooch. Of course, it wasn’t good for Syrus that he was so adorable. Sometimes he would have to run to class to avoid the mobs of overexcited fangirls that would love to get their manicured hands on his soft little baby cheeks and smother him with home cooked food, kisses and love altogether. Alexis however was more mature than practically all the girls as she was willing to help the poor boy avoid the love crazy girls in student uniforms. Despite her more mature demeanor she secretly wished to pinch his little boy cheeks and kiss them while hugging him in her bare arms.

On her way to her next class she heard a loud rumbling, but to her the rumbling was all too familiar. Tilting her heel she turned around to see a petit blue haired little boy running for the hills, a terrified look on his face as a cloud of dust blown by a mob of love filled girls were right on his tail, hands reaching out to grab the little boy teen. It wasn’t too long before the boy screamed for help. “Aaaaaahhh”. To his luck he saw Alexis and she hinted him to go inside the room she was next to. Syrus wholeheartedly agreed and quickly turned to enter the room with Alexis. Slamming the door shut he was relieved to be rid of the ravenous fangirls that were always after him. Taking a breather, he slumped to the floor, gasping for breath from running. “You can’t keep running like this you know, sooner or later their gonna catch you” Alexis said, her arms folded across her large chest and her bare feet moving in her shoes as she stood with them pointing at different directions. “Well, what am I gonna do, you heard what they said. When they capture me, they’ll stuff me full of food till I get fat, I don’t want that” Syrus said about to cry. Alexis, feeling empathetic, bet down towards him and spread her arms across him and hugged him gently. “Don’t worry you’ll get through this” she said gently towards him.

Looking forward, Syrus noticed the room that he was in. It looked like a kitchen. In the rush, Alexis probably didn’t know which room she was going into. Turning around, Alexis and Syrus stood up to look around the room. There were many pots and pans hanging on shelves. They knew right away that it was Mrs Dorothy’s kitchen. “Wow, never been inside this place before” Syrus said. The kitchen was the worst place for Syrus to be. He knew what those girls wanted and that was to hold him down and stuff him up till his small tummy fattened up into a big jiggling belly that bounced up and down out of his to be too small shirt. Syrus and Alexis both looked around the kitchen. As they turned they saw something that caught their attention. They saw

1552321121.content:
"Hey, look" Syrus said, pointing to a cup full of breadsticks. Walkng over ahead of Syrus, Alexis picked up a breadstick from the cup. "It looks like Ms Dorothy made breadsticks" she said. "Yeah but why, I've never seen breadsticks being served in the cafeteria" Syrus stated. "Neither have I" Alexis replied.

"Oh, there are my breadsticks" said a deep yet feminine voice coming from behind Alexis and Syrus. Turning around the two saw the ever friendly Ms Dorothy. "Thank you so much for finding them" said the friendly lunch lady. She walked over to where Alexis was and picked up the cup.

"Oh, hi Ms Dorothy" said Syrus, a bit nervous havng snuck into her kitchen without her knowing. "Hello, sweet syrus" Dorothy said, smiling at the boy. "Alexis, how are you doing. Thank you so much for finding my breadsticks" she said holding the cup with them. "Oh, um, your welcome Ms Dorothy" said the blonde girl.

"If it wasn't for you two I would never have found them so quickly. I thought i took them with me to the cafe but they weren't with me at all. I came back here to double check but they were here all along. Guess I shouldn't have panicked so much giggle". Alexis and Syrus just stood there, not able to respond due to the lack of words to say. Not wanting to be rude, they muttered a small chuckle.

"But i wonder, what are you two doing here"? Realizing they were caught, they tried to hide the panic in their faces. Then Alexis spat out an answer. "We were just curious that's all" she said with a smile. "Yeah, never saw the kitchen of duel academy before" said Syrus following along.

"As a reward for finding my breadsticks I'd like you to try them" Ms Dorothy said. "Um, sure" Syrus said. Taking one out with a slightly porky finger, Ms Dorothy lowered towered Syrus first. giving him a stick. Taking it Syrus held it in his hand. "Thank you" said the boy. "Oh your welcome sweety" Dorothy said patting his head. Moving towards Alexis she took out another stick and gestured it toward her. "Here's one for you Alexis dear" she said happily. Being a top student and a very neat girl, Alexis avoided any kind of fatty substance so as to not ruin her slim figure. she was proud of her skinny body and wanted to keep it that way. But she also knew it would be rude to turn down an offer like that. After all it was one breadstick. What harm could that do?

"Ok" Alexis said, taking the bread in her dainty long nailed fingers.

Taking a bite out the bread, they chewed as Ms Dorothy watched eagerly as they consumed her latest...concoction.

Biting the last piece of bread they chewed happily and swallowed as the bread landed in their stomachs. Gurgling peculiarly, but not extraordinarily.

"Mmm, that was really good" syrus said. "Yeah, I don't think I've ever had a breadstick that good before" Alexis added. "Good" Dorothy said. "Because its my special science experiment bread I made". Looking wide eyed, the two teens loudly said "WHAT"?

All of a sudden Alexis and Syrus's stomachs started to growl.

15531221222211221.content:
Yusei shook his his head and blinked to get the stars out of his eyes. What had just happened? He had been working on the Duel Runners, when Akiza and the twins had entered the garage and wanted to show him something they had found; an odd looking Duel Monsters card. He had just taken the card to look at it, when it let out a very bright light, that engulfed all of them; hence his current head-shaking.

"Is everyone alright?" he asked. A small scream then came from Luna's direction. "We're fine physically," she said meekly, "but I wouldn't say the same thing about our clothes." A small pause was followed by two more screams, this time from Leo and Akiza. Yusei finally blinked the stars out of his eyes, took a look at himself and also let out a shout of surprise.

Yusei was wearing his usual attire; the black T-shirt with the red markings on it, the dark-blue jacket and blueish-black pants, both with orange pads on them, a brown belt and gloves and boots of roughly the same brown colour. However, the mysterious card had altered his and his friends' perception on whose clothes belonged to whom, so everyone now thought that the clothes Yusei was wearing, were actually Luna's! Similarly, they also thought that the clothes Luna was wearing, (the white shorts with the red belt, the long-sleaved red undershirt with gold markings, the light-pink vest, close-to-knee-high white socks and white and pink sneakers), were actually Yusei's!

Yusei then turned his attention to Luna, who looked ready to burst into tears. "Yusei, what's going on?" she halfway sobbed. "Why am I suddenly wearing your clothes, while you are wearing mine?" Yusei went over to Luna to comfort her. "Don't cry, Luna," he told her. "We're going to figure everything out, I promise. But right now, I've got to calm down your brother, first."

Leo was also wearing his usual clothes; the white shorts with a blue belt, a blue undershirt with gold markings, a white vest, black and white armbands, and blue and white sneakers, but everyone now thought that those clothes belonged to Akiza, and that Akiza's clothes, (the dark red top and skirt, black stockings, red high-heeled shoes, black long fingerless gloves, the necklace, the red choker, and the red and white, long femenine jacket), were really Leo's! Because he now thought he was wearing Akiza's clothes, Leo was understandably freaking out, a lot more than his sister was.

"WhatisgoingonherewhyamIwearingAkiza'sclotheswhyisshewearingminethis isreallyfreaky!!!" he rambled off very quickly; not to mention, very loudly. Yusei hurried over to try to calm him down, before he got too freaked out. "Calm down, Leo! Take it easy, okay?" said Yusei with raised voice. "Take it easy? Take it easy?!?" yelled Leo. "You can't be serious! Look at what I'm wearing!" He gestured to his clothes, that they all now thought were Azkiza's. "These are Akiza's clothes! I can't be seen in these! I'd be the laughing stock at Duel Academy! And you are wearing my sisters clothes! This is horrible! What are we going to do?!!"

"Calm down, Leo!" bellowed Yusei. The loud shout instantly stopped Leo's tirade. Yusei sighed, looked Leo in the eyes and said: "Look, I know how you feel. This is just as awkward for me as it is for you." He stopped and started fidgeting with the gloves he was wearing. Because of the alterations that the card had made, Yusei thought he didn't wear gloves normally, so they felt really odd and constricting on his hands.

"Hey, stop that, Yusei," complained Leo. "Those are my sisters clothes, remember? I don't want you to ruin her gloves. Those are her favorite pair." Yusei stopped fidgeting right away and apologized. "Sorry about that, Leo. It's just, I don't normally wear gloves, so I just thought they felt wierd and I was trying to make it a little more comfortable for me."

"Oh, well, I can understand that," said Leo and pulled on 'Akiza's' shorts. "I think these feel really wierd to wear. They are so... inclosed compared to my skirt. I'm used to having a bit more room to move my legs, when I'm wearing my skirt; I don't have that with this. I feel like I can barely move with these on."

"Hey, hands off, Leo!" said Akiza. Leo, Luna and Yusei all turned to look at her, Leo letting go of the shorts immediately. "Those shorts are the best pair I have. Anyway, speaking of movement problems, I have some too," Sure enough, she was trying, and failing, to walk around in 'Leo's' high-heels. She wobbled around, barely able to keep her balance and she kept on falling everytime she had taken just a few steps. After her ninth fall in a row, she looked at Leo and said: "You know what, Leo? I honestly don't know how you can even walk around with these things on. They are almost like mini-stilts strapped to your foot."

"It's all thanks to skill. Something which I happen to have a lot off," said Leo proudly. Akiza huffed and retorted: "Maybe so, but I think I look ridiculous wearing these shoes; even more ridiculous than I look with this skirt on." As she said the last part, she tugged on the skirt, almost like she was trying to make it cover more of her legs. Of course, the fact that Akiza was a girl, and so there was nothing wrong or silly about her wearing high-heeled shoes and a skirt, was completely lost on all of them.

"Hey, be careful, Akiza!" exclaimed Leo. "That's my favorite skirt and I don't want you to rip it!" "I'm sorry, Leo," said Akiza and let go of the skirt right away. "I just feel so exposed around my legs, with this silly thing on." "Since we all feel wierd about this," said Luna, "then we should switch our clothes back as soon as possible. Preferably very soon; this thing just doesn't fit me at all." she added and pulled on 'Yusei's' shirt. The fact that it was actually her clothes, and so it did fit her perfectly, went unnoticed by all of them.

"Please, don't pull on that shirt, Luna," said Yusei. "It's my best one, so I am a bit sensitive about that." "Oh, my! I'm so sorry about that, Yusei," apologized Luna and stopped the pulling. "It's alright," said Yusei. "You are right, though. We need to switch back our clothes, before anyone sees us like this." "I agree," said Akiza. She had decided to take off 'Leo's' high-heeled shoes, so she could stand without falling. "But we can't just take them off right here and now; thät would be quite embarrassing." "So, what do we do?" said Luna. "I don't know," said Leo, "but we'd better think of something fast."

They stod there, thinking, for a little while; both trying to come up with ideas on how to change their clothes, with out making it too awkward, and trying to avoid touching and pulling on the clothes that they now thought belonged to each other. The last part was by far the hardest, because all of them felt very uncomfortable with the clothes that they currently wore, and they wanted to get out of them really bad and into the clothes that they thought were their own.

"I've got it!" exclaimed Yusei suddenly. "We can use one of the screens that me, Jack and Crow use to divide our workspaces. One of us will be one each side of the screen and hand the clothes over to each other. The other two will have to go upstairs, to make it less awkward, and when the two of us down here are finished, they go upstairs and then the other two can change their clothes down here."

"Good idea, Yusei," said Leo, as Yusei found the screen in question. "But, who do you think should change their clothes back, first?"

"Well..."
