155312212222112211.content:
"...I was thinking me and Luna should go first," said Yusei, "if that's okay with you guys." "I don't have a problem with it," said Akiza. "What about you, Leo?" "Well, I suppose I can handle wearing these stuffy shorts and this uncomfortable shirt for a little while longer," sighed Leo. "Oh, thank you so much, Leo," exclaimed Luna, as she ran over and gave Leo a hug. "Alright, Luna! You can let go, now!" complained Leo. Luna did as Leo wanted and let him out of the hug. That's when Akiza reminded him, that they should get upstairs, so Yusei and Luna could change their clothes in private. "Well, see you in a few minutes, sis," said Leo, and followed Akiza up the stairs.

Now, Yusei and Luna were alone in the garage. "Well, we'd better get to it," said Yusei. "Right, and let's do it fast," said Luna, as she and Yusei placed themselves on each side of the screen. "My feet are starting to icth, from being in your sneakers, Yusei." "Speaking of that," said Yusei, as both of them began to remove their footwear, "I don't get how you even wear those boots. They feel so stiff, to me. I personally prefer my sneakers. At least I feel I can move around in them." "Hey, I happen to like those boots," said Luna, as they finished taking off their footwear and moved on to their shirts and jackets. "But what I don't get is how we even swapped clothes in the first place."

"I think it was thanks to that strange card you guys brought," said Yusei, as he got ready to take 'Luna's' pants off. He then heard Luna gasp: "Well, if it was the card that did this, then it was very thorough. It even swapped our underwear!" "What?!?" yelled Yusei, and quickly pulled 'Luna's' pants off, so he could check for himself. Sure enough, he was wearing what he thought to be Luna's blue boxer-shorts! "Hey, Luna," he said. "Are you really wearing..." "Yup," answered Luna, timidly. "I'm wearing your panties, Yusei." "I figured," said Yusei back, "because I'm wearing your boxers, Luna." Neither of them noticed the sheer oddity of those statements.

Yusei looked at the boxers again and said: "You know, Luna, these things are actually quite comfortable." As soon as he had said it, he heard a sound from Luna's side of the screen. Sobbing. Luna was crying! "I can't believe you said that, Yusei!" she sobbed. "I just want my clothes back! I want my boxers back! And I don't want to wear your panties anymore; they are too thight, they itch, they are so boyish..." "Don't cry, Luna! It wasn't meant like that!" Yusei hurriedly apologized. "It was just a statement, nothing more! Here..." he took of 'Luna's' boxers, put them with the other clothes and reached over the screen to give them to Luna. "Here's all of your clothes, Luna. Are we good, now?" "Yeah, we're good," said Luna, as she stopped crying and took the clothes that she thought were hers. She then took off 'Yusei's' panties and gave them, and the rest of the clothes, that they now thought were Yusei's, back to him, as she said: "And here's your clothes back. Now let's get dressed properly." "Agreed," said Yusei.

The two of them, then started to put on the clothes that they thought were theirs. But, because those clothes really belonged to the other, it would be a very awkward sight to see, for anyone whose perceptions weren't changed by the strange card.

Yusei was putting on Luna's clothes, but thanks to the card, he percieved them as his own, so he didn't realize that they were actually too small for him to wear properly. He started by putting on Luna's panties; Being much too small for him in reality, they rode up the crack of his butt and didn't even cover his manhood fully. He then turned his attention to Luna's red shirt. Somehow, he managed to squeeze his arms and his head through the appropriate holes in the shirt, without ripping it, though because of it's size, the sleaves of the shirt didn't even reach down to Yusei's elbow, and the shirt itself barely covered his upper torso, and didn't even reach his stomach. Then came the shorts. Because of their size, they snagged before Yusei even got them past his knees, but, again, he succeded in putting on clothes that should, by all counts, have ripped when he put them on, but didn't. He even managed to tighten the belt on them! And even though Luna's shorts could barely be considered boxers on Yusei's large frame, and should have been painfully tight, especially on his manhood, he didn't seem to be in pain at all. If anything, he seemed to be relieved that he was finally wearing what he thought were his own clothes again. Then, he put on Luna's light-pink jacket and, once more, he fitted the much too small jacket on his much too large body, without causing as much as a single thread to tear. Then, it was time for him to put on Luna's footwear. Whereas the socks would have gone up close to knee-hight on Luna, on Yusei, they only went up to his ankles. And finally, the shoes. Now, one wouldn't think that someone of Yusei's size, could ever manage to get his feet into sneakers that were, at least, six sizes too small for him; but he did it! Now Yusei was completely dressed in Luna's clothes, which he percieved to be his own, but incredibly, even though those clothes were way too small on him, he wasn't in pain from any of it; neither from the shirt, the shorts, or even from his feet being squeezed into Luna's much too small (for him) sneakers.

That was because, when the strange card changed the four friends' perceptions on clothes, it also made three other modifications. First, it made it so that the none of the clothes would ever rip apart; no matter who wore them. Second, it made it so that the clothes would always be comfortable on anyone wearing them, exept for the original owners of the clothes (in most cases). Lastly, it made it so that the wearers of the clothes, would not suffer from constriction on the bloodvessels, tightness, ect. for wearing clothes too small for them. That was why Yusei now stood there, wearing all of Luna's clothes and not feeling any uncomfortableness from that, and being glad that he was once more wearing what he thought to be his own clothes.

Meanwhile, it was also awkward on Luna's side of the screen, but for the exact opposite reason. Luna was putting on Yusei's clothes, but thanks to the card, she percieved them as her own, so she didn't realize that they were actually too large for her to wear properly. She started by putting on Yusei's boxers; being much too large for her, they actually looked like slightly bigger shorts on her, than those she wore before, and she had to hold them up, to keep them from sliding down all the time. She then proceeded to put on Yusei's shirt. It was so big, that it covered nearly her whole body, bar the lower part of her legs. Of course, she needed both arms to put on the shirt, so Yusei's boxers slipped off of her legs, as she put the shirt on. She quickly pulled them back up though, when she had put the shirt on. The next article of clothing she put on was Yusei's pants. Of course, due to the size of the pants, she had to roll up the pant-legs, just to be able to get her comparetively tiny legs to fit in them, but even so, they were still too big for her to put them on normally. She had to tighten the belt extra much, so she'd be able to hold up both the pants, and the boxers too. Next up, was Yusei's jacket. She had to roll up the sleaves to be able to put it on, but even so, it was still so big, that the ends on the jacket scraped across the ground as she moved. Then she put on Yusei's footwear. The socks were big enough to actually go up over her knees. The boots were almost just as big, going up to her knees, which would have made it difficult for her to walk, normally. But since she now thought that the boots were really hers, she knew how to move about with them on. Finally, she put on Yusei's gloves. It didn't matter to her, that the gloves went all the way up to her elbows; she was just happy to have, what she thought was her clothes, on again.

"That's it, I'm done," called Luna. "Me, too," answered Yusei. They stepped out from their respective sides of the screen, to look at each other. To any onlooker, they would have looked ridiculous; Yusei was squeezed into the clothes of a 12-year old, little girl, while Luna was almost swimming in the clothes of a 19-year old, young adult male. Yusei and Luna did not find anything strange though, as they both thought that this was how they normally dressed.

"I feel so much better, now that I have my own clothes on," said Luna, as she adjusted 'her' gloves. "You said it," said Yusei, while he smoothed out a wrinkle in 'his' shirt. "We'd better go up and tell Akiza and Leo, that it's their turn, now," he added. "I'm sure he'll be trilled," said Luna and smiled, as she walked upstairs after Yusei.

1553122122221122111.content:
Leo and Akiza were patiently waiting on a sofa, still wearing what they thought to be each others clothes, when Yusei and Luna came up the stairs. Although the two of them were presently wearing each others clothing, everyone thought that it was how they normally dressed. Leo was excited to see Luna dressed as usual (to him). "Hey, sis," he said and hurried over to them. "It's good to see you in your normal outfit, again." "It's good to BE back in my normal outfit again," said Luna back. "Yusei's shorts and sneakers were really uncomfortable to wear, not to mention his shirt. It felt very odd to be dressed as a boy."

"I know exactly how you feel, Luna," said Akiza, who as far as everyone thought, were dressed as Leo. "Anyway," said Yusei, as he adjusted 'his' jacket, "We just came to tell you, that it's your turn to change your clothes back." "Really?" exclamed Leo. "Yep," answered Yusei. "It's all ready for you, downstairs." "Great!" shouted a very happy Leo. He almost ran to the stairs as he said: "Come on, Akiza! The sooner we get down there, the sooner we'll be back in our own clothes. I don't want to wear your girlish shorts, anymore than I have already!" "I'm coming!" said Akiza and followed Leo. "I want out of your boyish skirt, as much as you want out of my shorts." "We'll be waiting up here for you," said Luna, as her brother and Akiza went downstairs.

One short moment later, and Akiza and Leo were standing on each side of the same screen, that Yusei and Luna had changed their clothes behind. "Guess there's nothing left, but to go for it," said Leo, as he started to remove 'Akiza's' clothes from his body. "Finally," said Akiza, she too began to take off 'Leo's' clothes. "Your clothes were starting to itch on my chest. I don't think I could have handled being dressed as a boy much longer." "You're telling me," Leo called back. He had already removed 'Akiza's' sneakers and socks, and was well on the way to removing 'her' jacket. "I know I definitely couldn't handle being dressed like a girl, anymore. My feet felt so cramped inside your sneakers, Akiza. I'd much prefer my high-heels to your sneakers, any day. Speaking of wich, did you bring them with you?" "Of course I did," said Akiza. So far, she had removed 'Leo's' stockings, gloves and jacket. "I wasn't wearing them, though. I couldn't walk in them, at all."

"Of course not," said Leo, as he took of 'Akiza's' shorts, without noticing what was under there, and then moving on to the shirt. "It requires a lot of practice to walk in them. And that's something that I..." His voice trailed off as he was looking at his bare torso. Then he screamed. "Is something wrong, Leo?" asked Akiza with concern. She was almost done taking off 'Leo's clothes; all she was missing was the combined top/skirt, that she thought Leo usually wore. "Y-yes," stuttered Leo. "Something i-is very w-wrong Akiza. M-my bra... It's gone!" "What do you mean 'gone'?" asked Akiza. "I meant exactly what I said!" Leo half-way screamed. "I had just finished removing your clothes, when I looked down, and both my bra and my panties were gone! Instead, I'm now wearing blue boxers!"

Akiza froze, as she heard Leo say that. She had suddenly gotten a creepy hunch about what Leo said and the itching on her chest. She slowly took off the top/skirt combo, looked down and screamed, when she saw her hunch was right. "Leo," she said, "whatever swapped our clothes, also swapped our underwear. I'm wearing your panties and bra and you are wearing my boxers!" "Eeewww!" shrieked Leo, and pulled the boxers down as fast he could. "I can't believe I wore girl underwear! Gross! Here are your clothes, Akiza. Now, give me mine back, before I really flip out!" He hurriedly send all of 'Akiza's' clothes over to her.

"I'm trying, Leo, but this thing is hard to get off," said Akiza, as she fumbled with the straps of the bra. One short moment later, and she had unfastened it, leaving her breasts to bounce freely without anything holding them in place. She then placed the bra and the panties with the rest of 'Leo's' clothes and handed them back to him, while saying: "It was so constricting on my breasts, that I don't get how you can even wear that." "Speak for yourself," huffed Leo. "I wouldn't be able to make it through the day without it." The fact that Leo, being a boy, shouldn't wear a bra, and that Akiza, being a girl, should, was lost on both of them. "Well, now that we have our own clothes back," said Leo, "what do you say to; less talking and more wearing them?" "I'm all for that," said Akiza and began to do just that.

Akiza started with putting on Leo's boxers. Due to the magic of the strange card, they did not rip, but they were still much too small for her. They only covered about two-thirds of her sizeable butt, yet she was still satisfied, because she thought she was wearing her regular underwear again. Then, she put on Leo's shirt. Because of it's small size, it only managed to cover about two-thirds of her boobs, leaving the remaining third bare. The jacket was next. It went on easily enough, in spite of being quite small on her. Although, the jacket did emphasize, just how much her boobs were pushing out on Leo's shirt. Then it was time for her, to put on Leo's shorts. Though the shorts were only slightly bigger than the boxers, she managed to put them on too, but this time, she did manage to get them to cover her whole backside, unlike the boxers. Leo's wristbands were next. They were by far the easiest to put on; she just put them around her own wrists, and that was pretty much it. It was also relatively easy for her to put on Leo's socks and sneakers, even though they were vrey small compared to her. And there was Akiza, dressed up in Leo's clothes, but thinking they were hers all along.

On Leo's side of the screen, it was somewhat similar, yet for the opposite reason, since he was putting on Akiza's clothes, that were too big for him in reality. He started by putting on Akiza's panties. Fortunately, they were of the kind that can be tightened with a string, so Leo could get them on like that. Otherwise, the big woman panties would not have been able to fit on his small boy body, at all. Next, he put on Akiza's bra. He put it on easily, almost as though he had had years of practice in doing that.He dressed up in the rest of the clothes very quickly. He had to roll up Akiza's fingerless gloves, and her stockings to be able to fit in them, the top/skirt combo was almost covering his body completely, even with his feet in the high-heels and the lower part of Akiza's jacket was dragging behind him on the ground, but he took no notice of that. He was just happy that he wore what he thought to be his normal clothes again.

"So, now that we are properly dressed," said Leo, "what do you think we should do now?"

"Well..." said Akiza.

15531222222122211.content:
The light from the card faded away leaving a confused Leo wondering what had happened. He couldn't see anything different and the card was gone. Leo shrugged it off and was about to continue heading to Yusei's garage when he got a weird feeling. Instead of wanting to go to Yusei's garage now he felt like he had to go to Akiza's place. He went over to her place and knocked at the door, but she didn't answer. Leo remembered that Akiza said she had a lot of errands to run earlier. He was about to leave, but he couldn't get rid of the feeling that he needed to get in there. Akiza gave him and Luna's spare keys to her place in case they needed to get in there for some sort of emergency. Leo went in, though he still had no idea what he wanted to do now that he was there. Leo felt another urge to move to another place, and found himself in front of Akiza's drawer. Leo wondered why he wanted to be here so bad, until he noticed that he was taking off all of his clothes. He felt like he couldn't control himself as he opened up the drawer. Leo blushed as he stared at dozens of pairs of Akiza's panties.

As hard as he tried, he couldn't fight the urge to try them off as he put on a pair of frilly red panties. Moving on, Leo opened another one of the drawers and was greeted with the sight of dozens of red corsets. Leo didn't know what it was, but still couldn't help himself as he tightened the corset. The corset was really painful, though Leo was more concerned that something didn't look right. He figured it out as he grabbed some of Akiza's socks and filled the cups of the corset with them. Leo closed the drawers and went over to Akiza's closet and looked inside. It had a couple different types of outfits, but there dozens of copies of Akiza's normal dress that she wore. Before he could put on the dress he tried on the short skirt that Akiza wore with the dress. He felt drawn to the dress and became blissful as he grabbed the dress. The dress was magenta colored with big puffy light green sleeves, it was shorter and pleated in the front. Putting it on made Leo feel much more relaxed, and he stopped thinking of wearing these clothes as weird. He was close, though he still had a couple of things left to put on. He slid up some long fingerless black gloves, and some black leggings. He attached the leggings to the skirt with some suspenders. Finally Leo grabbed a pair of high heeled red pumps, although he had trouble walking in them. After a bit of practice he made it to the mirror and looked himself over. He was in a bit of a trance as he happily admired his reflection, but he felt that something was missing. Eventually he realized what it was and finished out the outfit with a red choker as he twirled in front of the mirror. Looking around he caught sight of some makeup that Akiza had, but also what she sued to style and maintain her hair. Leo felt the urge to try them both, though he would have to pick one to do first.

155322221.content:
It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma was was walking down the street, with Astral floating along behind, unseen by all but him. As he did, he noticed something on the ground. "Huh? Whats that?" he said as he walked over to it to see what it was. He found that it was a strange blank card. "Thats weird. Its blank." There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"Yeah."

As he wondered about the card, he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Yuma! Whats up!" Looking around, he saw someone flying toward him on a familiar flying cannon. He knew only one person with such an object.

"Oh, hey Anna." he greeted her.

"Whats up?" she replied as she jumped off of the vehicle/weapon.

"I was just walking and found this weird card." he told his friend as he held it out for her to see.

"Huh? Its completely blank." she said as she looked at it.

"Yeah, its really weird."

"I wonder if it does anything." Anna wondered aloud as she looked it over. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.
155322221.title: Yuma and Anna

15532222112.content:
When the flash of light died down and their vision cleared, Yuma and Anna were confused. Looking around, Yuma now saw a boy with red and orange hair standing next to him. The boy wore a white and red shirt that looked similar to Anna dress, only shorter and replaced the pink with red, as well as a pair of black pants. He also had on a pair of red and black glove, a red belt, and a pair of white and red shoes. Yuma couldn't help but think this boy looked familiar, and he even had a cannon just like Anna's, though his was red..

"Who are you?" Yuma asked the boy, and noticed that his voice sounded strange.

"Who am I? Who are you?" the boy asked. "Hey, whats wrong with my voice?"

"Huh? My name is Yuma." Yuma replied.

"Yuma...? Ah, it is you!" the boy said looking surprised. "But... how are you a girl all of a sudden!?"

"What!?" Yuma said as he looked down, and saw that he now had a pair of breasts comparable to Anna's! His clothes hadn't changed much, only his pants had been replaced with a white skirt, and the rest of his clothes had been modified to fit a girl. He then hestitantly reached down and felt that it was flat, and his little friend wasn't there any more! "Gah, I'm a girl!"

"Wait, then..." he boy looked down at himself and started to freak out. "Ah! I'm a boy!" he said.

"Huh? Wait, Anna, is that you?"

"Yeah..." he replied.

"This turn of events is most strange." Astral chimed in. "Though I'm surprised it took you both so long to realize you had changed."

"Shut up, Astral..." Yuma complained. "Now what are we going to do? I don't want to be a girl!"

"And I don't want to be a boy!"

As the two thought about their situation, Yuma then spotted some familiar people. It was Tori, Bronk, Caswell, Flip, and Cathy, and they were coming toawrds them.

Tori meadows was on her way to school, her backpack on her back and shoes clacking against the sidewalk. She wanted to walk with Yuma but he had already gone ahead of her, something that peeved her a bit. She looked at the ground while walking when she saw something that was quite peculiar. It was a card, but it wasn't just a card, it was a card with no picture on it. It was green framed so she guessed it was a spell card, since she's seen enough duels with Yuma to know green cards were spell cards.

"That's weird" Tori said as she picked up the card and held it up to look at it. "Don't cards usually have pictures on them"?

just as she said that, the card began to glow. It shone a light on Tori. "Woah, what's happening" she asked surprised by what was going on.

What happens?

15532222211221.content:
As the light died down Kotori could see she was still in the same place on the sidewalk as she was before, but everything looked...bigger. "Wha-what happened" she exclaimed as she took her arm away from her eyes. As she looked up the mailbox beside her was the size of a building.

"Wh-whaaaa" she said in a panic, but she noticed her voice was very shrill and squeaky, like she was a mouse. She had apparently shrunk down to a foot tall.

As she panicked she looked down at herself. Her school uniform consisting of a white and pink blouse with a pink miniskirt, was replaced by a frilly pink dress with a super small skirt and lot of hearts and ribbons. The dress was a thin plain form fitting garment that left her arms bare as it was sleeveless. It ended with a skirt that barely covered her upper legs with the outer part a pink flower shaped tutu that flared out. The hearts were on the front of her dress and colored a very bright pink, 2 small ones on opposite sides of her front waist with a huge heart on the front, taking up the entire torso and waist are of her dress. Kotori felt one of the small hearts with her fingers, which now had pink nail polish on them. They felt solid and bulgy like jewels, but they were very real. On her waist was a very large ribbon tied around her dress. It ended in a large pink present bow behind her, keeping the dress tied together. Her hair and hairstyle were the same, but her ribbon was now longer and extended down her head to her neck as well as having a large heart shaped hair clip on her hair on the ribbon. She looked down at her neck to see a cute looking red choker attached to her neck with a pink heart on the center of it. Looking down below the dress, her feet were barefoot, not a single shoe or sock to be seen as she felt the cement sidewalk on her soles. Her toenails however were adorned with bright pink nail polish.

"Ah-ah-AAAH what happened to me, i'm super small and ended up in this dress" she said tugging on her hair with both hands. As she did though, she noticed something pointy touch her arm as she lifted it. Feeling her ear, she noticed it was huge and pointy. She had grown pointy ears that were as big as an elf's.

"You have to be kidding me, i have pointy ears? What am i an elf" she asked in frustration. By reflex she felt something on her twitch behind her. It felt like it was connected to her body. Tori turned around and noticed she now had a large pair of wings. They were see-through and bug like and stuck out gracefully behind her back as they were clasped together. An extra tiny set of fairy wings were below the large and long set, barely visible but still there. The wings protruded from her back through her dress.
"Fairy wings"? She said curiously. She brushed her left hand against her left wing. It felt soft like a curtain, but it was also like she was touching her own arm. She could feel it as she rubbed it, the feeling of an appendage coming out of her back, confirming the wings were indeed coming out of her skin. "I wonder if i can fly..." she said to herself. She tried triggering her brain to flap her wings. She managed to get one flap, but couldn't get any more than that.

"Pant, pant" Tori went as she put her hands on her bare knees, exhausted from attempting to fly. Looking down at herself she was a bit taken back by her new form. "I can't believe i'm a fairy" she said looking at her soft smooth dainty hands which seemed more petit and childlike now. Once again she pulled at and touched her now pointy ears. They weren't sharp but they had hard tips and definitely felt real. She always liked fairies and despite not being a duelist, fairies were her favorite type of monster cards. She didn't know if it was the girl in her acting out but they were just so cute to her. She just couldn't believe she was one now and she didn't know if she was ok with this. She looked herself over again and looked at her dress. The big puffy flower tutu was too girly in her opinion, although a part of her loved it. All in all she looked like a very pink, cute girly heart themed fairy.
Examining her dress, she blushed and hoped she didn't lose any important clothing, so she decided to check what was underneath her tutu. She sighed in relief as she put a hand underneath and discovered she was wearing panties, which were a bright pink as well.

Realizing that she would be seen she decided to find a place to hide. Looking around she saw a bush and ran to it, her feet pattering on the ground. She felt disgusted at how dirty they were becoming. She ran inside the bush, peeking outside as she saw the tall legs of people walking by.

She turned around and looked at her see-through wings. She felt them again and they twitched from how sensitive they were. She could definitely feel them like they were her arms.
Despite being curious about being a fairy, she didn't exactly like being small and wanted to go back to her human self as she wasn't comfortable with her body.

"I have to become normal sized and human again.." she said worried she could be stuck like this forever, feeling her wings brush up against a large leaf in the bush.

Suddenly she noticed something in her dress collar. Pulling it out, she saw it was the card from before that turned her into a fairy. It was now extremely small, the size of her hand, as it accommodated itself to Tori's size.

"YOU, YOU DID THIS TO ME" Tori yelled in her squeaky voice at the card in her hand. "CHANGE ME BACK" she yelled to the card.
The card began glowing and...

She jumped but there was no flapping or flying and she fell on her face again. "Ugh...." She said picking herself up and spitting out some grass.

Suddenly she saw an exit to this endless meadow. It looked like some sort of treetop city.

1553222222121.content:
As the flash of light died down, Yuma and Anna were confused. Nothing had happened to them. "Well that was weird." Yuma said.

"Yeah." Anna agreed.

"But it doesn't look like anything happened." Yuma said.

"I wouldn't be so sure." Astral said. "Take a look at Tori."

"Huh? What about Tori?" Yuma said, and he turned to his friend and was met with surprise,

Tori was sitting on the ground in a crouching position with her hands planted in front of her just like a dog, and she was completely naked with a pink collar around her neck with a tag that had her name on it, connected to a leash that Yuma realized he was holding. She had a strangely vacant look on her face, eyes wide and glazed, while her tongue was sticking out slightly from her mouth.

"Tori? What happened to you?" Yuma asked in concern.

She then turned to look at him with a inquisitve look, then with a happy look on her face, she stood up on her legs, but put her hands on him for balance as if she couldn't stand up on her own, and licked him in the face.

"Woah, Tori! What are you doing?"

But instead of replying, she merely made a barking noise. "Woof woof!" she let out cheerfully. She backed off Yuma and then when down to the ground. She stood on all fours and panted as she let her tongue hang out a bit. She then started to walk and Yuma was forced to follow or let go of the leash. Wondering what was going on with his friend, he followed and Anna trailed behind him just as confused. As Tori walked, they watched her sniff the ground a bit.

"This is so weird..." Anna commented.

"Tori, why are you acting like a dog?" Yuma asked.

"I don't think she is acting." Astral said as he floated next to him. "I think that the card did something to her. From the way she is behaving, I think she really believes that she is a dog. This is very peculiar."

Yuma then looked at the card in his free hand. It was still blank. "We've got to find a way to get Tori back to normal."

"Uh, yeah." Anna said. She hated to admit it, but part of her liked this strange turn of events. If Tori was a dog, then that took away a bit of competition for Yuma.

"Arf Arf!" they heard Tori bark, and they looked ahead. They saw some of their friends, and Tori was leading him right to them.
