It was a seemingly normal day in Domino City, and Yugi and his friends were just meeting up. With him were his friends from school Joey, Tea, Tristan, Duke, as well as Joey's sister Serenity, and Mai and Rebecca who were also in the area visting.

As they made their way to their destination, Yugi spotted something on the ground, and saw that it was a Duel Monsters card. But strangely enough, it was blank. Other than its green color that told him it was a spell card, it had no name, text, or picture.

"What an odd card." he commented as he examined it.

"Whatcha got there, Yugi?" Joey asked as he saw his friend looking something over.

"I just found this weird card on the ground." he said as he showed it to his friends.

"Huh? Its blank?" Tea questioned as she saw it.

"Why is it blank?" Joey wondered.

"It probably means its as useless as you." another voice said, and the group saw Kaiba walking up to them.

"What was that, Kaiba!?" Joey demanded. However, he was ignored.

"I was hoping to get a chance to duel you again." he said to Yugi.

"Well, maybe another time Kaiba." Yugi replied. "I was going to spend the day with the others. Besides, I'm interested in this card." Then suddenly, as if on cue, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the group.

---

It was a seemingly normal at Duel Academy, and Jaden was making his way to class. Suddenly, he noticed something lying on the ground, and picked it up to see that it was a card. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but other than that, it was blank. No picture, name, or text.

"Whats with this weird card?" he wondered out loud.

"Be careful." Yubel said. "It doesn't feel normal. There is something weird about it..."

Jaden was examing the card when he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Jaden." Alexis said as she walked up to him, accompanied by the rest of his friends; Syrus, Hassleberry, Chazz, Blair, Jesse, Aster, and Alexis's friends Jasmine and Mindy.

"What are you doing alone?" Blair asked.

"Hm? Whats that card you've got there, Jaden?" Jesse asked as he walked up next to him to get a better look at it.

"I don't know. I just found it." he responded.

"Sure looks weird." Syrus remarked.

"And useless. Its completely blank." Chazz said.

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the group.

---

It was a seemingly normal day, and Yusei was currently working on Duel Runners in the garage. Along with his own, Crow's and Jack's were there as usual, as well as Akiza's, and even Sherry had come to him for some help. As he was working on them, Crow, Akiza, and Sherry stood nearby. Jack meanwhile was enjoying a cup of ramen.

As he was working, he heard the sound of the door opening. "Yusei? Are you here?" he could Luna ask as the twins entered.

"Yes, I'm here. I'm just working on the Duel Runners." he replied.

The twins came into the main area, Carly with them. "Hey Yusei, on our way here, we ran into Carly, and then we found this really weird card." Leo said as he held out the card for everyonre else to see.

"Its blank?" Sherry questioned as she examined it.

"Yeah. We just found it lying on the ground and picked it up and figured that We'd show it to you guys." Carly explained.

"I don't see whats so interesting about it." Jack said. "If its blank, its not a very useful card."

"It is weird, though." Akiza said.

"Yeah. I wonder where it came from."

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma and his friends Tori, Bronk, Caswell, Flip, Cathy, and Anna were had all met up outside Yuma's home, with Astral floating behind Yuma, unseen by all but him. As they gathered outside the house, Yuma noticed something on the ground nearby the door. "Huh? Whats that?" he wondered aloud as he walked over to it to pick it up.

"Whats up, Yuma?" his older sister Kari asked as she followed him.

"I saw something." he said, reaching it, and picking it up. "Huh? A card. And its completely blank." he said as he looked it over. There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"Hey guys, check this out. I just found a weird card outside my house." Yuma said as he and Tori walked back over to his friends.

"Huh? Why do you think its weird?" Tori asked, with her being the only one of the group not being well knowledged when it came to duel monsters.

"Its blank." Bronk explained. "Thats not exactly normal.

"I just found iton the ground over there." Yuma said.

"It is pretty weird." Caswell said.

"Where'd it come from?" Flip asked.

"Hm... Maybe this could be an interesting scoop." Kari commented to herself.

As they were all wondering about the blank card, a familliar motorcycle was pulling by as Yuma called over to is rider. "Hey, Shark!" he said with a wave.

"Hey." Shark said as he took off his helmet. As he did, another motorcycle pulled up, the rider of this one being Kaito.

"Hey Shark, Kairo, check out this weird card I found." Yuma said as he held it out for him to see.

"Why is it blank?" Kaito questioned.

"No clue. But I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over.

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

As the bright light died down for each of them, and the four groups from different times all found themselves somewhere else, now in an empty field.

They each looked around in confusion, and noticed all the others who had been transported there as well. But before they could say anything, the four cards began to glow again, and they were all once again engulfed by a bright light.


What will happen?

15533222221221222221.title: Life swap with people from our reality

155332222212212222212.content: How about the group swap lives with some members of a cheerleading team?
155332222212212222212.title: life swap with a group that have the same occup...

1553322222122122222121.content:
After a moment, the flash of light died down, and their vision cleared. When it did, it was quite obvious that their location had changed. No longer near wherever they were, they were now indoors, and in some kind of locker room.
"Where are we?" Jaden asked as he saw their surroundings.
"How'd we get here?" Alexis asked.
"Uh, guys... what are we wearing?" Yugi questioned, drawing everyone to their clothes. What they had been wearing moments ago was gone, and they were all now clad in identical uniforms. Cheerleading uniforms. They now all wore the same pink and white uniform clearly made for female cheerleaders. Téa, Tori, and Akiza couldn't help but giggle at the sight of the boys dressed in such attire as the boys blushed in embarrassment.
It was then that Jaden noticed something else, that there were now eleven of them in the group, with Yubel, Yami Yugi and Astral (To Yuma's surprise) all now with a physical body each and, like them, was also dressed in the same cheerleader uniform. Yubel looked amused by the current situation.
"Yubel?" Jaden questioned. "You've got a body again?"
"I suppose so." she replied.
"Uh, guys, I think you might want to check this out..." Yuma said as he looked into a mirror.
"What? You want us to see how ridiculous we look like this?" Yusei asked as the group all walked over to the mirror where Yuma was looking into and were met with shock. Instead of their own reflections, they instead saw something else. All eleven members of the group now had completely different reflections. Instead of the eleven of them, there was a group of teenage girls who looked much more normal dressed in the uniforms than the five boys, plus Astral and Yubel.
Jaden now had the beautiful reflection of girl with long blond hair. Yuma now had a red headed girl for his reflection. Yugi's reflection was now that of a cute Asian girl. Yusei now had a black girl with long dark hair for his reflection. Yami's reflection was now a busty girl with brunette hair. And Yubel, despite her non-human looking body, now had the reflection of a regular girl with long black hair.As for Astral, despite his non-human looking body, he had a pale skin girl with milky-blue hair as his reflection. And it wasn't just them, as the real girls in their group also had different reflections. Alexis's reflection was that of a brunette girl. Téa's reflection was a girl with black hair. Akiza had a pink headed girl with a heart tattoo on her left arm for her reflection and Tori now had the reflection of a girl with blond hair with pink streaks.
"What is going on?" Alexis asked. She looked around the room, with everyone looking normal to her, but in the mirror she saw a group of girls in their place. Jaden waved his hand in front of the mirror and then placed his hand on it, the blond girl that was his reflection mimicking his movements perfectly.
"I don't know, but this sure is weird." Akiza replied.
"You're telling me." Tori said.
Just as they were about to discuss what was going on, a few other girls entered the locker room, and saw the group. Now rather than react badly to the sight of boys in the girl’s locker room, or the sight of Yubel's monstrous form, they didn't seem to react much at all. "Great, you guys are already here." one of them said as they began to undress, and the boys blushed as they averted their eyes. Once they were all dressed in the same uniform that Jaden and his friends wore. "Okay, now that we're all here and ready, let’s go out there and..."
1553322222122122222121.title: Cheerleaders

155332222212222.content: How about they swap personalities?
155332222212222.title: Something else

15533222222.content: No reason we have to use characters from all four series at one. How about Yugi, Tea, Jaden, and Alexis?
15533222222.title: A different combination

155332222221.content:
It was a seemingly normal day in Domino City, and Yugi was on his way to school.

"Hey Yugi! Wait up!" he heard someone call out to him, and turned around to see Tea walking over to him.

"Oh, good morning Tea." Yugi greeted her.

"Good morning." she replied. "Oh, by the way, I just found something." she said as she held out a blank duel monsters card.

"Its blank? Thats weird." he said as he took it from her. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but there was no name, picture or text.

"I just found it on the ground and figured that I'd show it to you since you know more about the cards than I do."

"Its deffinitely wierd." he said as he looked it over. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

---

It was a seemingly normal at Duel Academy, and Jaden was making his way to class. Suddenly, he noticed something lying on the ground, and picked it up to see that it was a card. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but other than that, it was blank. No picture, name, or text.

"Whats with this weird card?" he wondered out loud.

"Be careful." Yubel said. "It doesn't feel normal. There is something weird about it..."

Jaden was examing the card when he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Jaden." Alexis said as she walked up to him. "Hm? Whats that card you've got there?" she asked as she walked up next to him to get a better look at it.

"I don't know. I just found it." he responded. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

---

As the bright light died down for each of them, and the two groups from different times all found themselves somewhere else, now in an empty field.

They each looked around in confusion, and noticed all the others who had been transported there as well. But before they could say anything, the two cards began to glow again, and they were all once again engulfed by a bright light.


What will happen to them?
155332222221.title: Yugi, Tea, Jaden, and Alexis

155332222222.title: A different combination

1553322222221.content:
It was a seemingly normal day, and Yusei was currently working on his Duel Runner in the garage. Crow was out on deliveries, and Jack was elsewhere, most likely at his favorite coffee place, leaving Yusei the only one in their home.

As he was working, he heard the sound of the door opening. "Yusei? Are you here?" he could Akiza ask as she entered.

"Yes, I'm here. I'm just working on my Duel Runner." he replied.

"Jack and Crow aren't here?"

"No. Crow is working, and I don't know where Jack is." he said as he stood up and walked over to her.

"I see. By the way, I found this strange card on the way here." Akiza said as she held out the blank card.

"Its blank?"

"Yeah. I just found it on the ground and picked it up and figured that I'd show it to you." she explained. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

---

It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma was walking down the street, with Astral floating along behind, unseen by all but him.

"Hey Yuma! Wait up!" he heard someone call out to him, and turned around to see Tori walking over to him.

"Oh, good morning Tori." he greeted her.

"Good morning." she replied. "I just found something that I wanted to show you." she said, showing him a blank card.

"Huh? Its completely blank." he said as he took it from her. There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"I just found it a little while ago. I thought I should show it to you since I don't really know much about the game." she explained.

"I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

As the bright light died down for each of them, and the two groups from different times all found themselves somewhere else, now in an empty field.

They each looked around in confusion, and noticed all the others who had been transported there as well. But before they could say anything, the two cards began to glow again, and they were all once again engulfed by a bright light.


What will happen to them?

15533222222221.content:
It was a seemingly normal at Duel Academy, and Jaden was making his way to class. Suddenly, he noticed something lying on the ground, and picked it up to see that it was a card. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but other than that, it was blank. No picture, name, or text.

"Whats with this weird card?" he wondered out loud.

"Be careful." Yubel said. "It doesn't feel normal. There is something weird about it..."

Jaden was examing the card when he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Jaden." Alexis said as she walked up to him, accompanied by the rest of his friends; Syrus, Hassleberry, Chazz, Blair, Jesse, and Alexis's friends Jasmine and Mindy.

"What are you doing alone?" Blair asked.

"Hm? Whats that card you've got there, Jaden?" Jesse asked as he walked up next to him to get a better look at it.

"I don't know. I just found it." he responded.

"Sure looks weird." Syrus remarked.

"And useless. Its completely blank." Chazz said.

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the group.

---

It was a seemingly normal day in New Domino, and Yusei was currently meeting with with his friends. Currently, he, Akiza, Jack, Crow, and Sherry were outside of a cafe long with Kalin and Misty, who were also visiting. The group was talking amongst each other, catching up.

"Hey Yusei!" they heard Leo call out to them. The group turned to see the twins walking over to them, and Carly was with them. "Hey Yusei, on our way here, we ran into Carly, and then we found this really weird card." he said as he held out the card for everyonre else to see.

"Its blank?" Sherry questioned as she examined it.

"Yeah. We just found it lying on the ground and picked it up and figured that we'd show it to you guys." Carly explained.

"I don't see whats so interesting about it." Jack said. "If its blank, its not a very useful card."

"It is weird, though." Akiza said.

"Yeah. I wonder where it came from."

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma and his friends Tori, Bronk, Caswell, Flip, Cathy, and Anna were had all met up outside Yuma's home, with Astral floating behind Yuma, unseen by all but him. As they gathered outside the house, Yuma noticed something on the ground nearby the door. "Huh? Whats that?" he wondered aloud as he walked over to it to pick it up.

"Whats up, Yuma?" his older sister Kari asked as she followed him.

"I saw something." he said, reaching it, and picking it up. "Huh? A card. And its completely blank." he said as he looked it over. There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"Hey guys, check this out. I just found a weird card outside my house." Yuma said as he and Tori walked back over to his friends.

"Huh? Why do you think its weird?" Tori asked, with her being the only one of the group not being well knowledged when it came to duel monsters.

"Its blank." Bronk explained. "Thats not exactly normal.

"I just found iton the ground over there." Yuma said.

"It is pretty weird." Caswell said.

"Where'd it come from?" Flip asked.

"Hm... Maybe this could be an interesting scoop." Kari commented to herself.

As they were all wondering about the blank card, a familliar motorcycle was pulling by as Yuma called over to is rider. "Hey, Shark!" he said with a wave.

"Hey Shark, check out this weird card I found." Yuma said as he held it out for him to see.

"Why is it blank?" Shark questioned.

"No clue. But I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over.

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

As the bright light died down for each of them, and the three groups from different times all found themselves somewhere else, now in an empty field.

They each looked around in confusion, and noticed all the others who had been transported there as well. But before they could say anything, the four cards began to glow again, and they were all once again engulfed by a bright light.


What will happen?

15533222222222222.content: How about a group of Jaden, Alexis, Yusei, Akiza, Yuma, and Tori?
15533222222222222.title: A different combination

155332222222222221.content:
It was a seemingly normal at Duel Academy, and Jaden was making his way to class. Suddenly, he noticed something lying on the ground, and picked it up to see that it was a card. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but other than that, it was blank. No picture, name, or text.

"Whats with this weird card?" he wondered out loud.

"Be careful." Yubel said. "It doesn't feel normal. There is something weird about it..."

Jaden was examing the card when he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Jaden." Alexis said as she walked up to him. "Hm? Whats that card you've got there?" she asked as she walked up next to him to get a better look at it.

"I don't know. I just found it." he responded. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

---

It was a seemingly normal day, and Yusei was currently working on his Duel Runner in the garage. Crow was out on deliveries, and Jack was elsewhere, most likely at his favorite coffee place, leaving Yusei the only one in their home.

As he was working, he heard the sound of the door opening. "Yusei? Are you here?" he could Akiza ask as she entered.

"Yes, I'm here. I'm just working on my Duel Runner." he replied.

"Jack and Crow aren't here?"

"No. Crow is working, and I don't know where Jack is." he said as he stood up and walked over to her.

"I see. By the way, I found this strange card on the way here." Akiza said as she held out the blank card.

"Its blank?"

"Yeah. I just found it on the ground and picked it up and figured that I'd show it to you." she explained. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

---

It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma was walking down the street, with Astral floating along behind, unseen by all but him.

"Hey Yuma! Wait up!" he heard someone call out to him, and turned around to see Tori walking over to him.

"Oh, good morning Tori." he greeted her.

"Good morning." she replied. "I just found something that I wanted to show you." she said, showing him a blank card.

"Huh? Its completely blank." he said as he took it from her. There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"I just found it a little while ago. I thought I should show it to you since I don't really know much about the game." she explained.

"I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over. Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.

---

As the bright light died down for each of them, and the three groups from different times all found themselves somewhere else, now in an empty field.

They each looked around in confusion, and noticed all the others who had been transported there as well. But before they could say anything, the four cards began to glow again, and they were all once again engulfed by a bright light.


What will happen to them?
155332222222222221.title: Jaden, Alexis, Yusei, Akiza, Yuma, and Tori

1553322222222222212.content: How about they all turn into ponies from my little pony and get teleported to ponyville?
1553322222222222212.title: Something else

155332222222222222.content: How about a group consisting of Yugi, Tea, Joey and Mai from the original series, Jaden and Alexis from GX, the 6 Signers of Yusei, Jack, Akiza, Crow, Leo and Luna from 5D's, and Yuma and Tori from ZEXAL?
155332222222222222.title: A different combination

1553322222222222221.content:
Yugi groaned as he began to regain consciousness. He didn't remember passing out, but here he was picking himself off the ground. As he did, he caught sight of a strange blank Duel Monsters card on the ground. It was the that things started to come back to him. He had been hanging out with Joey and Tea when the three of them had run into Mai. The four of them had decided to catch up since Mai hadn't been around for a while. As they hung out, Yugi had found the strange card he was looking at. As the examined it, it suddenly started glowing and a bright light engulfed the four of them, and that was the last thing he remembered before waking up here.

Yugi then picked up the card and looked around, seeing that he was now in an empty clearing, which was definitely not where he was before the flash of light. He also saw Tea, Joey, and Mai nearby. However, the four of them weren't the only ones there. Several other people were there as well. Amongst them were two he recognized, and they were Jaden and Yusei, the two duelists from the future that he had teamed up with to stop Paradox from erasing Duel Monsters from history. Nearby Jaden was a blond girl wearing a uniform with a white top and blue miniskirt. With Yusei were more people, such as a blond man wearing a white coat, an orange haired man with yellow markings on his face, a girl with red hair and a red dress that looked victorian inspired, and finally a pair of nearly identical children with green hair. And finally, there was another pair of kids separate from the others, a boy with black hair and two red spikes in the front, and a girl with green hair. Like him, everybody was starting to come to.

"Uh, where are we?" one of the twin children, the one with a ponytails was the first to ask what was on every body's mind.

"I don't think anyone knows, Leo." the other other twin, who had twin pigtails, said.

Yusei looked around, noticing Jaden and Yugi, and recognizing them immediately. "Yugi, Jaden, its a surprise to see you two." he said.

"I'll say." Jaden agreed. "Didn't expect to see you guys so soon again."

"Oh, wow!" the boy with the black and red hair said. "I can't believe it! Yugi Muto, Jaden Yuki, and Yusei Fudo! You guys are three of the greatest duelists ever! I don't know how I'm getting to meet you guys, but you won't hear me complaining!"

"Uh, thanks." Yugi said, a bit embarrassed.

"Since you recognize us, I take it you're from a different time after our own, aren't you?" Yusei asked.

"Oh, right. Yeah, I'm from a different time in the future after you guys." the boy explained. "By the way, my name is Yuma Tsukumo. And this is my friend, Tori." he said as he pointed to the girl with him.

"Um, hello." she said with a wave.

"Since we're all confused, maybe we should all introduce ourselves and talk about how we got here." Yugi suggested, and everyone agreed. "These are my friends, Tea, Joey, and Mai."

"Uh, hi." Tea greeted.

"Hey." Joey said.

"Nice to meet you." Mai said.

"I guess I'll go next." Jaden said. "I'm Jaden, and this is my friend, Alexis." he said gesturing to the blond girl with him.

"Hello." she greeted.

"And I'm Yusei." Yusei introduced. "The rest are my friends. Jack, Crow, Akiza, and the twins, Leo and Luna." he said as he pointed to each one. "How did everyone come to be here?" he then asked.

"Well, I was with my friends, when suddenly I found a card and it started glowing and a light engulfed us when we suddenly woke up here." Yugi explained as he held out the card.

"Wait, you too?" Jaden said, then held out a card that was exactly the same as the one Yugi had. "I was meeting with Alexis, when we found the card and the same thing happened."

"The same thing happened to me and my friends." Yusei said, also holding out a blank card.

"Woah, this is too weird. The exact same thing happened to me and Tori!" Yuma said holding up a blank card as well.

"Well, this certainly is a strange turn of events." a ghostly figure of a demonic looking woman said as she appeared next to Jaden. She was a duel spirit by the name of Yubel, and normally, she would only be visible to Jaden and others who could see duel spirits, but that was currently not the case, and her sudden appearance surprised almost everyone else.

"Woah, what the hell!?" Joey let out in shock.

"Huh?" Jaden let out in confusion. "You guys can see Yubel?"

"You have a duel spirit too, Jaden?" Luna questioned.

"Oh, you know about them, huh?" Jaden said to the young girl with a smile. "Anyway, Yubel here is one of my duel spirits, which are spirits that live in cards that only certain people can see. She is a bit special though, since shes actually a part of my soul. Long story there, though."

"Yeah, enough about that." Jack said. "I think the important thing we should worry about right now is why we're here, and how we're gonna get back to where we belong."

"Gotta agree with Jack here." Crow said.

"Yeah, but how are we supposed to do that?" Joey asked.

"I don't know." Akiza said. "Maybe we should take a look at those cards since they brought us all here."

"Well, it is a start." Tea agreed, and everybody gathered around Yugi, Jaden, Yusei, and Yuma.

"They really are weird cards." Mai said. "They're almost completely blank, other than being green which tells us they're spell cards."

"But how did a card suddenly bring us here, especially if we're all from different times?" Tori wondered.

"You'd be surprised what cards can do sometimes." Alexis said. "I've seen some pretty strange things done by cards."

"It really is strange that this card can bring people from different times together like this." Yugi said. As they all looked over the four cards, they suddenly began to glow, and emitted a bright, blinding light that engulfed them all.



Now, what will happen to them?

Yugi has to do Katherine's job
15533222222222222212122222211.content:
Suddenly Yugi discovered his entire perspective had shifted.

He was now standing midway down a long office corridor and was carrying a rather heavy stack of papers and file folders.

“What the hell?” Yugi muttered.

He tried setting down the stack of papers on the floor, but instead suddenly lost his balance and crashed to the ground in a crumpled heap.

As he lay on the hallway floor momentarily stunned, Yugi spotted the reason he had toppled to the ground: he was now wearing shiny, black, high-heeled shoes!

In fact, all of Yugi's clothing had completely changed.

He was now clad in a crisp, white, woman's blouse (and could see a lacy, cream colored bra underneath). About his waist was a short, tight, black skirt that came down to mid-thigh. A pair of shiny, black pantyhose were on his legs (which seemed to be shaved now), and the aforementioned two inch tall pumps were on his feet and big, dangly, hoop earrings now hung from his ears as well.

Yugi eventually recovered his wits and started scooping up the spilled papers and folders from the floor. Standing up, Yugi spotted a mirror, and looking at his reflection he saw an attractive woman in her thirties with red hair wearing the same clothing as him.

Before he could wonder further on what was going on in this crazy situation, someone walked over to him.

"Katherine, do you have the contracts ready?"

Looking up Yugi saw a man in his early fifties wearing expensive clothes.
15533222222222222212122222211.title: Yugi the secretary

choices: Elsewhere, one of the others takes on their new role
Tea has to go to cheer practice in Sally's place
155332222222222222121222222111.content:
Somewhere else, Tea found herself standing in a different place than where she had been. Rather than being in that field with her friends and those other people, she was now standing alone in a locker room of some sort.

"Oh, what's going on now?" she said.

As she reached up to rub her head in frustration, she noticed out of the corner of her eye that her sleeve was the wrong color. Looking down at herself, she was shocked to see that her clothes had changed.

Rather than her own clothes, she was wearing a red and blue cheerleader outfit. Looking around for some sort of explanation, she happened to look at a nearby mirror, and received another shock as she saw that, rather than her own reflection, she was seeing a teenage girl slightly shorter than herself, with long strawberry blond hair, wearing the same uniform she was, and whose arm was raised to her head, just as Tea's still was in shock.

As Tea stared at the reflection, another girl wearing the same uniform suddenly popped into the room.

"Sally, are you done changing yet? We're running late for practice."
155332222222222222121222222111.title: Tea the cheerleader

choices: Elsewhere, one of the others takes on their new role
Joey has to work Madison's shift
1553322222222222221212222221111.content:
As the flash of light died down, Joey suddenly noticed that he was in a different location. Instead of being in a field with his friends and those other people, he was standing in what appeared to be a crowded restaurant, behind a bar counter.

"Where am I?" he wondered aloud.

As he looked down he could see that he was wearing a white t-shirt with some logo on it and he had on some bright orange shorts and what felt like nylons on his legs. This all meet at the bottom in a pair of white socks and tennis shoes. It looked like he was wearing women's clothing.

Joey was woken by the sound of a group of men yelling things at him.

"Hey hot stuff, you okay?" a male voice rumbled loudly enough for Joey to realize he was holding a piece of paper and pencil, writing something down. Looking in the mirror behind the counter, he saw the reflection of a beautiful woman with long blond hair and big breasts wearing the same clothes as him, which looked ridiculous on his male body, but much better on the beautiful woman that was now his reflection.

That's when Joey caught a glimpse of his name tag. It said Madison.
1553322222222222221212222221111.title: Joey the waitress

155332222222222222122.title: Something else

1553322222222222221221.content: WIll the change be gradual or instant?
1553322222222222221221.title: Yes

15533222222222222212211.content:
As the light began to fade everyone looked around to check if everyone else was ok. As everyone unshielded their eyes Yusei asked "Hey, is everyone Ok?"

Jaden replied by saying, "looks like it."

"Well that's a relief" Yugi said.

"What's the deal with these cards anyway", Leo asked. As he asked this he heard a sound that sounded like someone gasping for air. He turned around and saw Luna holding her chest as she breathed heavily. Being the big brother he was Leo immediately aided his little sister. "Luna are you OK”. She looked up at him as everyone else began to gather around her, worried about her.

"I don’t know, it’s like the air, the air is choking me. My throat feels so dry, I… I think I need water.”

Leo was shocked to hear this. “The air is choking you? What do you.. aagh”. Suddenly Leo began having shortness of breath. Everyone looked as he stumbled to the ground on his knees gasping for air and holding his throat with his right hand. “Gasp , gasp, can’t breathe” Leo said desperately. Whatever was happening seemed to have hit him pretty hard.

“Leo, not you too” Yusei said. The two kids sat on the ground, gasping a little bit like fish out of water.

“Need water, don’t know why but I need water”.

“Water?” Yusei said.

Crow came into the issue to say “It’s like they’re fish or something”

To which Yusei nodded in agreement with a small “Yeah”.

Just then Jaden began to notice something. Something was forming on Leo and Luna’s throats. Looking down on closer examination he saw that two pairs of crescent shaped lines sprouted on their throats. “Woah, uh guys, you may wanna check this out” Jaden said with a stutter. Everyone had replied with a bunch of gasps, oohs and aahs.

Akiza then said, realizing how the familiar looking crescent lines and need for water come together “They’re, They’re growing gills”.

“Woah, that’s insane” Yuma said loudly. Just then as if it was a virus infection, everyone began feeling something on their throats. They saw that they were beginning to grow gills as well.

Putting a finger on her neck Alexis said “Uh oh” as she felt a gap on her throat. As she looked among the crowd she saw gills on everyone’s throats, however she noticed nobody was suffocating. She figured that either the first victims of the effect succumb to it or that the age of whoever acquires the gills determines if they suffocate faster or slower than others.

As Yuma felt the tingling feeling on his throat he started to panic as he felt the unusual pair of lines on his neck. “Aaaah, I’ve got creepy lines on my neck” Yuma said in his usual panicked expression. “Help, help” Yuma said as he continued panicking, drawing embarrassing attention to himself as he received looks of embarrassment.

Tori, standing next to him handled the situation a bit more calmly. Despite also having grown gills she wasn’t as hysteric as her pink and black haired friend. Putting a hand on his shoulder she stopped Yuma and said “Calm down Yuma, you just grew gills”.

“Yeah right, how can I be calm when I’m gonna suffocate and- as Yuma was going to continue he suddenly noticed something surprising about Tori’s hand . “Uh, T-Tori” Yuma said stuttering as he gestured towards Tori’s hand.

“What, what is, GASP” Tori gasped in shock as she looked at her hand. It had grown webs between the fingers, the kind of webs you see on flippers that help your hands push water to swim. “My- my hands are becoming fins” she said, looking at her flippers. Looking up to Yuma she also looked at his hands. “Yuma, your growing flippers too” Tori said, this time with panic in her voice.

“Huh” Yuma said. He looked at his hands and was even more shocked then Tori. “AAAAAAHHH, m-m-m-my hands are getting all webby” Yuma said as he looked at his hands that he held up to his head, webs between the fingers. Suddenly Tori felt something on her elbows. “What the?” she said. Lifting her arm she looked at her elbow and saw a fin on it. She presumed that her other arm had it too. The fin was the same color as her hair, green.

It was then that Yugi stepped in to explain what he though was happening in this situation.”Well it looks like we’re all growing aquatic features. “No way, I’m not gonna be a walkin’ fish” Joey said.

“Look, we’ve got to assess the situation” Yugi said.

What happens next?

15533222222222222222112.title: Another thing!

155332222222222222221121.content:
A seeming normal day in Miyami City.....and Yuya and Yuzu were out buying supplies for the You Show Duel School. They had gotten everything they needed, and were heading back when Yuzu spotted something; a Duel mOnsters card lodged in a nearby wall. The two rushed over to pull it out.

"Huh? It's......completely blank." Yuya said as he took it out from the wall. "Excuse me?" Yuzu said in shock. Yuya was right; There was no name, picture or text on the card. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told them it was a spell card.

"What is....this?" Yuya mutered in confusion.

Yuzu took a closer look at it. "Some sick idea of joke?" she half muttered, half snarled.

"I wonder what it does." Yuma wondered aloud as he looked it over. Then suddenly, Yuya's Pendant began to glow, and then the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed them, blinding them. The two teens screamed, and then as quickly as it had begun, it ended. Shocked, it took a moment for the two to regain their eyesight.

info.brief_description: The characters of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise find a strange and mysterious blank card
info.description:
The characters of the Yu-Gi-Oh! series undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistant.
For the paths with two characters, the changes don't always need to affect both.

They can also swap lives or turn into characters from other anime series or video games.

As for changes, don't always try to make everything lead to the same conclusion. Be creative and with similar stuff, don't always make ito go the same direction as other paths.

Also, while it only starts with the selected character(s), feel free to involve others on the character list, and even have similar paths from a selected Yu-Gi-Oh! series intersect. For example, say Yusei and Akiza of Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's swap lives with a character from another series, and their fellow 5D's characters, Jack and Carly swap lives with different characters from the same series in one of their options, feel free to have them meet up in either path.

No sex. EDIT: If you would like to include acts of sex in this story, please contact me first. Depending on your plans, I may allow it.
No killing off characters
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such

And of course, have fun!
